content: I bought the Flex because of its low price and the ability tyo easily add a night light or motion detector using its USB port. I got the nightlight, and it works great in the hallway to our bedrooms. The light is very bright but can be dimmed and has color options - neat! Set up was simple - just plug it in, and it connects to previously installed Alexa devices automatically.
title: Inexpensive way to add Alexa flexibility

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: L. S. Brodsky
content: This fills a nice niche for when a smaller echo device is needed and you do not really care about sound quality. Although it is about 12 ft direct sight from the main router, I am dropping the connection occasionally, which is not true of any of my 9 other echo devices or other wireless devices. So, I am not sure about it.
title: Nice footprint, but may not be as reliable as other devices

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: L. J. Jessee
content: I bought this device as a more aesthetically pleasing replacement for an Echo Dot I have mounted in a plug bracket.  This seemed like a perfect solution....it is not.  The audio is so bad I can't even understand what it is saying unless my ear is within 2 feet of the unit.  The microphone also seems to be more sensitive than the one on my Dot as this one keeps picking up commands meant for other rooms.  I like to use the "turn lights on" feature and when this unit picks up the audio, it turns on the lights in the wrong room.  I would not recommend this unit to anyone, as I believe it has very limited use.
title: Terrible Device, not worth of the Echo name

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: CodonAUG
content: Terrible voice recognition.  Everything else is fine.  For the price and size the sound quality and volume is what you would expect but the voice recognition is really bad.  It has a lot of trouble hearing the wake phrase. The echo flex is at least half as bad as the original Echo at voice recognition.
title: Terrible voice recognition.  Everything else is fine.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Saimei Kinjo
content: I really want to like it as much as my other Alexa devices, however, this particular Alexa enabled device wont stay connected. I am constantly having to unplug and replug it in to get it to work. Happens on average twice a day. A shame too because it otherwise would be a great addition to my morning routines as well as operating a bathroom night light.
title: Almost on par

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: LH
content: It operates just like a normal Alexa and seems to detect my voice at the same range and reliability as an echo dot. This is useful for places with an outlet but not a table/area for a dedicated Echo (such as a foyer area). I also appreciate the ability to integrate with motion sensors to trigger Alexa routines (the night light is far less useful).
title: Great, cheap way to add Alexa in tight place

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: BeckyL
content: I actually really like the Echo flex. It was easy to get started and plug into the wall and use in my kitchen. kept updated on time, weather, news. Played some of my favorite 90's music. I quickly discovered that the sound on the device is high and very whiny. Still, I like the device and find it fun and useful.
title: Sounds Whiny

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Momma2aldoboys
content: I got this for each of my sons’ rooms so that I could communicate with them without yelling from the kitchen or my room or having to stop what I’m doing to go find them and get them to come to me. They like it bc they can listen to our Amazon Prime music through the speaker. The audio quality is not as rich for music but works fine for them.
title: Great when used as an intercom

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Bdiddy
content: I bought this knowing the sound quality was not great after reading several other reviews. That being said, I think it is very convenient and a great way to get Alexa in different parts of your house. I bought three and will keep them. I might just need to buy a dot to put in the common area we listen to music.
title: Like other reviews said the sound is not their

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: L. Patrick
content: On the whole this is a great little cabinet.  I would have given 5stars if it was not for the instructions.  They were so small and difficult to read. I had to enlarge them on my printer. Even then they were not clear. I ended up guessing which way the pins went in and how the hinges worked.  Drawings only and no descriptions which would have helped.
title: Nice cabinet

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: storman75
content: This is the missing product, in my opinion, that Amazon needed in terms of the Echo devices.  I have a show, dot or spot in every room of the house and in some rooms, I had to use the adapters that allow you to hold the adapter and device near the socket.  These can be bulky and unsightly.  You definitely won't be hearing great music on this device but that's not the intention.  I put this device in my garage and will put it in a few bathrooms to have a smaller device than the current dots.  The nightlight and other attachments were a nice addition as well.
title: Excellent Device Depending On Need

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: The Hens
content: These are great to put in the bathroom (I.e. no cord hanging around) though I want to see how well they hold up to the steam from showers. Al for one I did get a battery powered bluetooth speaker that’s water resistant so I can listen to the Music in the shower. Over all pleased and okay to play music if you’re wanting background music but not necessarily for be loud for full sounding
title: I like it but....

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Shane
content: It plays music about almost as loud as a cell phone. Absolutely no louder than that. You also have to yell Alexa vs the other Alexa products, if you're playing music. Would be a better product if the speaker was better but I guess it would be an echo dot if that were the case. Overall, not a bad item for the price
title: Overall, not bad for the price.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: AmazonCustomer
content: The concept seemed like a good idea, but it's a really poor echo device. You have to either be facing the device or yelling for it to hear you. I knew the speaker would be too low quality for music, but I still expected it to be louder than it is. I think coupled with the motion detector it would have some good uses, but as a stand alone device it'll probably just frustrate you.
title: Alexa's half-deaf Grandma

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Sydney Tokunaga
content: Great product for it expands the voice range to access Alexa around our home with the combination of the digital smart clock. Only 2 star review would be the sound but what can you expect from something that small. I wasn't even expecting sound to come out from it and was surprised when it played music from my pandora, I am impressed! Overall great product I'd highly recommend this to anyone who wants the option to expand Alexa voice recognition and utilizing smart clock or motion sensor to voice activate your smart plug and listen to music while getting ready in the bathroom, awesome product I'm glad I purchased at least 2 during prime day sale. 👍
title: Amazon flex

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Wardell
content: Brought this to communicate with other echo device for drop in and alerts so I plugged in kitchen. No volume control so does not sound or as clear as echo device but for the money you can talk to other devices and use as inter com. Also music is not the quality of over echo devices.  Sorry. Hope this helps.
title: Great for were you need plug out the way.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: N. Solberg
content: It was a gift I got for Christmas. Since I already have the latest Echo Dot, that's what I'm comparing it to. The Flex is super easy to set up and does all the basics of an Echo, but it's sound is terrible -- not surprising given it's price and size. I certainly would choose a different Alexa device it I wanted better sound.
title: Easy setup, but basic

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: runner
content: Just what was missing from Amazon, no cords,can place just about anywhere. Sound is not good good for music but that’s not what it’s for..with the accessories for motion and night light this is a must for the kitchen,bathroom or Garage. I just turned off the speaker and use the motion for turning on lights.
title: Great addition to the Echo lineup

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: John M
content: I love the portability. I have every Alexa device, and I use this for hotel travel. One complaint is not related to this product but Alexa in general. The sound variances in each flash news briefing is bad. Your catching up on the news late at night. Most stories are at the level you want; them all of a sudden one comes on and the sound is jacked up high enough to wake the dead.
title: Great for Traveling Alexa Lovers!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Stangman517
content: Echo Flex works very well. I'm actually impressed with it ability to hear my voice even around corners at times. Small and compact and doesn't look gaudy plugged into the outlet.  I bought two and like them very much. However,  if you want better sound you'll be forced to buy a Bluetooth speaker or use a 3.5m audio cable. The sound is, and I hate to say, horribly low like the cheapest piezo speaker ever made.  Cosmetically it's very nice.
title: Works well, cosmetically attractive, sound not good. Buy a seconardy sound (bluetooth speaker)

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Fritz kuhlman
content: I love the flex. I put it in my kitchen. I'm sorry to to only give it 3 stars for sound, but you have to keep in mind how small it is. This isn't made to listen to music, and you shouldn't expect to do that with the flex. If you want an out of the way echo that doesn't take up counter space, this is a great device.
title: Small and out of the way.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Raghallch
content: I have one in my garage and one in my laundry room, giving me access to music, time, weather and ordering at hand.  They plug directly into an outlet, which keeps them off of useful flat surfaces and are much more compact than the Dot and the Dot hangars.  They do the job when I don't have much space to work with.
title: good for small spaces

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: David
content: A very good way to extend Alexa voice activation to areas of the house you might not need an echo dot like the garage, bathroom, or a garage. You can still pair it with a better bluetooth speaker for that premium sound if you like. I have not tried the extensions you plug in. I am a bit disappointed that does not double as a smart plug. I feel that was a wasted opportunity. Maybe on the next iteration.
title: Wish it was also a smart plug.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: BSG
content: Works great, Amazon shopping pre order setup, a lil spooky (& invasive). Was not crazy about the deceptive image of a nightlight (sold separately), appearing as if part of the unit. Sound playback is bearable, listening range incredible (from bathroom) 20+ ft. Overall a decent device for a prime day deal.
title: Does the job, Great Prime Day Deal !

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: David I.
content: I needed Alexa in my hallway without hooking up a full size Echo Dot and the Echo Flex was perfect for the task.  It is small and has no problem with voice commands.  Not recommended for playing music.  There is a 3.5mm jack for an external speaker if you desire better sound. Very happy with my new Echo product!
title: Small and perfect for hallways!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Arlen Kyle Forsstrom
content: Have a high mounted electrical box in a bathroom or kitchen and want to use Alexa? Look no further. Sure it sounds like a vintage radio when playing music (though its kinda nice, and does not distort at max volume), but this is great for light music in the morning when making food or listening to NPR. The audio quality is just fine and does well when paired with other echo devices in a room, the flex just adds a little bit more sound reach and treble in small rooms when needed. Its also great so you dont have to shout across the room to set a kitchen timer or the like. Works great with the optional clock module to show current timers.
title: Does the Job (great supplement kitchen speaker)

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Jennifer De La Rosa
content: These are pretty cool. It’s an effective intercom system for my house. I bought these to talk to people upstairs vs shouting in the house. You can set an alarm for one flex and another for the other. I only have one alexa and this was a cost effective way for me to expand alexa. The plugs also play music.
title: Great alexa expansion

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: JLW in WBL
content: The Flex is great for conveniently extending Alexa around the home, especially for “smart home” functions.  It’s nice to just plug into an outlet without needing a space to sit on.  Not so good for listening to things... anything.  Amazon should come out with a better speaker that plugs into the USB jack.
title: Good for extending Alexa

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Hagarpun
content: I love this small form Alexa. I integrated it as a glass break sensor for our Ring Alarm system. I also added the Night Light adapter, which is also awesome. But, just to let anyone reading this know, this is not an Alexa to buy if you’re buying it to listen to music, unless you’re adding a speaker to it. But it does have good sound quality for Alexa to talk though.
title: I Love This Echo!!!!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Bryon D Coombs
content: Yep, that's right her voice box sucks besides that she works, and another thing, why cant she sound a timer alarm through all echo's, that be nice or through the app chose which ones that can remind you that dinner is burning in the oven cuz your in your basement and cant hear the kitchen timer going off?
title: teeny weeny speaker :(

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: just me
content: Bought this for the bathroom. Works great for what we needed. We have 3 different lighted areas on 1 switch. This allows us to leave a nightlight on and turn shower & main lights on (smart bulbs) only when needed. Of course the speaker quality is less than other devices, but it's adequate for the job. + Fits neatly into outlet. No shelf space required. + Doesn't block other outlet on double outlet. + Functions just like other Alexa devices + Can even play some shower music
title: Nice, compact device. Works great.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Christy P.
content: Considering the price, I am okay with the fact that the speaker sound isn't great/loud. If I would have wanted better, I knew we should have purchased another echo dot. It does control all of the smart home devices I have hooked up through Alexa, so I am very pleased with its functionality for the price.
title: Surprised by how well it works

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: William Kramer
content: The microphone quality does not work nearly as well as the Echo Dots. I have this in a room, against a wall in a floor outlet (the outlet is in the baseboard) and the microphones only work in very quiet settings. The Flex also has lost connection to my UniFi access points more than once, requiring a restart. None of my other Echo Dots or Echo Spots (all 7 of them) ever loose a signal. I think this is a great concept but it is obviously a generation 1 product. It might work well if you plan to use it at counter height but I still suggest waiting for generation 2.
title: Not good if used on a ground outlet

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Hector M Lopez
content: I made my TV sound bar an Alexa speaker for multi room music. The device itself has low quality sound so I gave it 3 stars but it is great when you pair it, via bluetooth, with a good sound system.  I purchased a second one to connect my small amp receiver I use for a sound system connected to my bedroom TV using a 3.5mm cable.
title: Purchased for Alexa connectivity.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Carmie1050
content: Everyone who says the sound is tinny is correct; it does sound like a 70's clock radio.  That being said, I really like the concept & having a small Alexa handy to give me the weather & even play me a favorite tune.  I think amazon could possibly do a little better with the speaker/sound - even with the small size.  I hope for the next version the sound will be a bit better.
title: The sound isn't great, but I love having it in my bathroom

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: K M
content: I put this in my kitchen and really like it there. My Echo Dot was in another room and I had to raise my voice to get it to hear me, hence, the Echo Flex. It's great for timers, weather, recipes, lights, etc.
title: Love this little gadget!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Kris Randolph
content: I bought two and put these in my bathroom. Its nice to have something that gives you music,  the news, your calendar items in that space and using another device would not have worked.  I didn't even know it had motion detection. So that just makes this a better buy. My husband wanted more in more rooms.
title: I bought two

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: April M. Sandoval
content: The sounds quality and range make this product a not so good but. I would not recommend nor works I purchase this product again. I placed it on the other side of my bed but need to move closer to hear what Alexa is saying. Also, I need to roll over to the other side of the bed for her to hear my commands.
title: Would not buy again

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Darling Nikki
content: I have a full size echo and 2 dots so I was excited to try this one.  It works just as well as the regular ones, but much smaller.  The sound quality isn't as good,  but that was to be expected in such a small device.  I also appreciate that it has a usb port on the bottom.  This way it doesn't completely block off the outlet.
title: It's as good as the original

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: W. Williams
content: We plugged this into a kitchen outlet, and it's been ideal. Takes up no space. We use it as a timer and for entertainment (usually streaming music or answering random questions one ponders while washing dishes). The sound quality is tinny (a stark contrast from the wonderful sound you get with Echo Show or Echo Dot). If you like to stream 70s music, like we do, it will bring back happy memories of listening to tunes on your transistor radio. :) I understand there is a Bluetooth option to stream to better quality speaker. I haven't tried it, nor feel the need to as the Flex serves its purpose as-is.
title: A convenient option for small spaces

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Alex
content: A great way to have voice input in an area with the added bonus of a night light or motion detector. The sound output is very basic, sounds like a cellphone, but for what it's engineered to do it's great.  We use two of them for an audio zone, one in the bathroom to hear commands, and the other in the audio rack plugged into a signal sensing amplifier that turns itself on.  Now, we can just ask for a Pandora station, an amazon station or FM station to play  in this area and it does! Plug in the night light and you can have nice back light on a display, in a cabinet or in a closet with a glass door for a cool look.  The motion detector also has potential for automation.
title: Value piece for control or nightlight/motion sense.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Rocuba
content: I picked one of these up to put in my guest room instead of spending some extra money on a dot.  I got it for half off as a special and it does what I need it to - which is turn on a lamp that I have on a smart plug in the room without having to yell down the hall to one of my other Echos.  It's pretty straight forward - not an amazing speaker - but I wasn't expecting that.  Gives me the access that I need without breaking the bank.
title: Another valuable product

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: RFearns
content: Perfect for the bathroom! As a older person, falls are frightening occurrences and most falls happen in the home. With this  conveniently off the counter, I can call for help no matter where I am.
title: My new best friend!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Phillip Woon
content: We have Echoes all over the house.  The places where we didn't were our 4 bathrooms.  So when this came out, I jump on it.  I also purchased the night lights for them.  Now we can play music when on the throne, or have our books read to us, listen to news, etc.  I purchased 4 of them, and we love the night light feature with the different colors.
title: Love this thing

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Jeffrey R. Gresko
content: As stated in the description this version of Amazon’s smart speaker is not good for music and the volume is not adequate for hearing even news well over the sound of a shower or ceiling fan when used in a bathroom. I set mine up with a small Bluetooth speaker mounted on the wall of my bathroom just above the Flex. Problem solved.
title: Cute, but needs Bluetooth speaker for volume.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: arrrrrrrrrr
content: As long as your not expecting great audio this is a great device for Alexa integration in rooms where you already have other good speakers you can connect this to or somewhere you only need it for home automation commands or podcast/news like programs. I also have the motion sensor for it and it makes the device even better. it have it set to turn my lights in the room on when it detects motion and to turn them off when no motion is detected for 5 mins. It works perfectly.
title: A great device at a good price by only sacrificing audio quality...

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Wesley
content: I got this device to put in the hallway because it plugs into the wall rather than have to sit on a table. It is the perfect device to monitor the entrance into the house and manage Ring. I also got it to support a night light. So far, I'm a little disappointed in how much I can control that light. That said, I'd buy another Flex without qualms. It's worth the price.
title: A Good alternative to the Echo Dot in tight locations

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: KCarlile
content: I love the echo dot original, but it was always in the way with a cord and just sitting on the counter.  This echo flex is much more compact to me as it sits in its plug and does everything an original echo dot does and more.  I also bought the nightlight and really love it.  The nightlight can go from 0 to 100% bright and be any color you want.  It comes on and goes off automatically depending on the light in the room.
title: More than just a speaker

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: pat mcphail
content: I use Alexa for many functions around the house. We have an Echo in one room and a Dot in another. I wanted to use these as an input device so we didn't have to speak so loud to get things to work. If you ask for music, it does not come out of the Ecoh but the Echo flex. I was looking for an easier way to do this so I guess I will have to speak louder.
title: Wanted to use it as a Alexa input device not a speaker system

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Pedro J.
content: I had A terrible customer experience this item was delivered to the wrong address and I had to go out of my way to track it down myself that’s why I’m giving this a 1 star but here is my review: It features a low quality speaker my iPhone has better sound quality and it’s louder. Other than that it works like it should!
title: Delivered to the wrong address!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: MrsH
content: I got this so I can listen to music upstairs. The volume does not go very high even at max volume.  I do think it will work great to play sleep sounds when my grandchildren visit so I will put them into the spare bedrooms. I did see that I can play it through a Bluetooth speaker so I may still be able to use it for music.
title: Not very loud

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Jared Blanford
content: First, I would like to say, Thank you. These little devices have made my life simpler. I no longer need to get up to turn on the lights. I no longer burn my food because Alexa is always right there to set a timer. All I can say is, "It is AMAZING." I recently purchased 7 of the flexes, 2 echo dots, some Alexa light bulbs, and some Alexa plugs; as well as, a coffee maker. I tell Alexa to remind me to do homework, "She does!" If I am at the grocery store; sometimes, I need to contact my wife. I use the Alexa app to drop in on the flex or other devices. "BOOM!" I am in the house. My wife does not have to get out of the shower to grab the phone. She only has to yell. These devices are a game-changer.
title: This is a game changer.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: W. Lee
content: I was surprised at how well it detects my voice and I can clearly hear Alexa through the small speaker. The Echo Flex can be plugged into the wall outlet. I use this in my bedroom to help control a smart plug that a lamp is connected. I don't have to get out of bed to control my lamp.
title: Great Alexa Device

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Kendall K.
content: Great product for the bathroom or anywhere you need a night light or motion detector to turn on music or lights! What would have been perfect is if you could hook up both at the same time. Maybe an updated flex will have that addition. Aside from that, hook it up to another blue tooth speaker and it's an awesome unit to go along with your other echo devices!
title: Awesome Addition!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: West Coast Dreamer
content: We have dots everywhere - plus these Flex in the bathrooms in case someone were to fall and need to call for help (although they will NOT call 9-1-1, but could say call Bob if Bob is in phone contacts. Only downside is they block an outlet so everyone unplugs them and forgets to plug them in again.
title: Wish had an outlet

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Milagros Cuellar
content: I bough one to start and try out I have echos  in every room I liked the way flex blended in so I bough 3 more for hallway kitchen 2 bathrooms it sounds amazing and flex is pretty decent volume I want to get one more for garage so I can page my husband on flex and receive phone calls on flex too
title: Flex sounds great in echo group

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: 1RadMomof5
content: Not bad for a plug in, but the sound quality could be a little better. Works great for our bathroom & baby's room. Had to unplug the one in our baby's room 4x now because it wouldn't respond, it showed it was listening but just kept the blue "listeing" color on for a few mins. Other than that, great product.
title: Works pretty good...sound quality could be better, had to reset a few times.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Dane V
content: Alexa integration works well. Have it set up to play in my “Everywhere” group so the party keeps going in the bathroom! As everyone else has said before, the sound quality leaves much to be desired. Sounds great for speech during my flag briefings or a quick Alexa ask but I pair it to an Amazon basics waterproof Bluetooth speaker (BSK20) when music needs to be played. Got it at the $9 sale price and would highly recommend at that price.
title: Perfect for my needs.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: JRL
content: The app needs and overall more than the echo flex itself. Once you set up the routine it's pretty straightforward You just have to make sure the unit sees your Wi-Fi and it works from there. But the app is missing some features like how to have the weather alert only go off once and not every time.
title: Better than expected and works. It's the app that needs a tweak

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Brittany B.
content: I really like the echo flex. I like that it plugs straight into the outlet without a cord taking up space getting tangled up in everything. I use it in the kitchen. I love the hands free ability to send texts or even call with it by voice while cooking. We also have echo dots in each bedroom so I can drop in and tell my Kids when food is ready for them.
title: I love it ❤️

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Nikkig405
content: This was recommended to me by a friend. My echo device is in my living room and I placed the flex in my bedroom.  I can now get my reminders and updates while I am getting dressed versus walking to my living area to get these items.  Great idea if you do need all the other features of your primary echo device.
title: GREAT WAY TO EXTEND YOUR ECHO DEVICE

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Darren Klotz
content: I like the clean installation with no cord dangling from a table, I like that it's compact enough to allow access to open plug receptacle. Sadly, the mic is not very sensitive, and it takes multiple tries for it to follow through due to lack of listening capability. My echo dot has no problem hearing me from twice the distance, and with the tv on. This one you have to be in a 5-6 radius for it to hear you, then it doesn't accurately understand the directions given.
title: Pretty good, but room for improvement

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: DNA
content: It is nice to have an alexa in the kitchen and not have cords. Playing music is just ok. Volume 10 sounds a little fuzzy but its ok when im doing dishes or just cooking. It serves its purpose and I got ot for $10 on prime day. It could use some tweaking but over its not bad as a small area device.
title: It serves its purpose

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Sarah Musser
content: It works well enough. Doesn’t seem as responsive as the echo dots that we have but I like that it is up off the kitchen counter. The sound isn’t a good quality at all but I wasn't expecting it to be. It is good for timers and making announcements. I haven’t used the motion detection part of it yet.
title: Not sure I would buy another one.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Marie
content: I think it’s a good little device, I listen to it at night when I want some white noise music it’s not as loud as the echo but it does  the job for a small device , I take it to the kitchen to hear my music when I cook and wash dishes.. I also can hear it when I’m taking a shower .. it does the job .. I have the echo 3  with a clock on it ...  also echo 1 and the echo show 1 now I’m waiting on the echo show  5 ... that’s going in the bedroom  🙂 and I’m done .. I got the flex on prime day for 7.94 with a WiFi plug .. And also the echo show 5 I got it for 49.99 and that came with a security cam . Not bad for the price ..
title: The flex works fine for the  kitchen and bathroom ... 🙂

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Melinda Smith
content: This little alexa device is pretty good .. the sound is clear and crisp  pretty loud for such a small speaker.. I just plugged it up and it was already  ready to go of course I already have an amazon echo and chose to have it connected to my account  when purchased but it's great.  I need to get a few more for each room  in my house where my main echo is not at
title: Awesome alexa device

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: louie louie
content: perfect for any room ,compact size , set itself up and automatically connected to wifi. the only thing is the the speaker quality is like a dot but sounds good just not a lot of low end , it gets loud  . but this like for a small bathroom guest room garage . small kids room anywhere really
title: very good for what it is works great and useful

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: SecretShopper
content: I purchased this to put in my bathroom. I wanted an echo near by to add things to my to do/shopping list while I was in the shower and it was on my mind. I don’t think this echo would be good for anything else. The speakers is absolutely terrible. Lowest qualify I’ve experienced with the echo device. I wouldn’t use anywhere else in the house or for any other tasks. Simply just a quick way to set reminders and add things to lists. Speaker isn’t good enough to listen to music. Can barely understand response from device.
title: Poor quality speaker

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: rvinid
content: Poor sound detection and a tinny Alexa voice, but I use it in my shop to turn lights on and off in the shop, yard and house and play music over BT, get weather reports and ask for metric/English conversions which it does well enough. Blue light is not good for sleeping areas.
title: Low quality unit okay for occasional use

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Kristen Forhetz
content: Its very convenient as it acts as a plug AND Alexa. This is good for bedrooms that don’t really need an EchoDot. Connects with smart plugs easily. Operates commands just like my EchoDot does in the living room. I especially like the privacy feature of the Dot and the Flex. We can mute it when we don’t want to be heard. It gives my security conscious husband peace of mind.
title: Great to add to our Alexa family of devices

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: a Very prime Shopper
content: size matter... if you want good sound.  this one, nope!  and the size isn't that small either.  good if you need ALEXA in your bathroom, but not for music or radio play.  hope they can improve it.  well, you can connect to at BT speaker for solution.  Overall, i wish it can be smaller in size for what it can do... need major improvements, will wait for the next Echo Flex.
title: little Echo

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Dave
content: The flex is a wonderful add on for the bedroom, I use it to turn the lights off and on also to wake me up in the morning, check the weather etc.
title: great add on

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Brit in LA
content: bought this to fill a gap in my bathroom, where I am out of hearing of both my dot and my echo. Sadly it does not really help. sound is tinny at best usually have to repeat commands many times, Alexa often asks did you mean?????? or just does the wrong thing Finally gave up and returned
title: I so wanted this to work

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: bruff53
content: Does what it is designed to do for the most part.  I like the size of the Flex and the fact that it stays on the outlet.  The sound quality is ok for its purpose but the volume is much too low.  I bought mine to use in the garage but had to put the Echo back in the garage and put the Flex in an interior hallway.  At max volume, I could not hear the Flex from across the garage.
title: For the money, go for the Echo Dot.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: laptopcustomer
content: Great product for smaller rooms with not a lot of tabletop space. Moved it to my bathroom to stream music while in the shower. When streaming music, audio quality is better than expected. It takes 2-3 times for the Flex to recognize the Alexa wake word. However, on the positive side, I can activate Alexa while in the shower with the water running about 10 feet away.
title: Useful little gadget with Alexa recognition issues

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Stinaelza
content: This is very easy to use and was a breeze to add to my current system. I do like the fact that I don’t have another cord I have to plug in or a place to put the speaker as it plugs right into the wall. However, I recommend getting the dot if you want something with decent sound quality for listening to music.
title: Sound quality lacks. Still, it’s easy and convenient.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: K. P
content: I am using the echo flex in my garage and one in the bathroom.  Don't buy this size if you are expecting any visuals, great musical quality, and there is a limit on its loudness BUT it works for everything I need, like broadcast, emergency contact, reminders, weather, general alexa info/skills.
title: Portable, Functional echo/alexa package

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: DGMH
content: Didn’t want to pick up my voice. The Dot in the adjacent room kept wanting to pick up instead. Sound quality and volume wasn’t great. I purchased for a powder room and it’s really not much smaller than a Dot with far better sound quality. I sent it back, disappointed that it didn’t work for me.
title: Not much smaller than a Dot and sound quality was much less.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Kristina Mateo
content: This is an OK Product. DEFINITELY NOT for Listening To loud Music. I use it in my Kitchen to set Timers for baking and ask quick questions and it works great for that. It's also great  intercom. I would buy more then 1. The speaker recognition  needs to be improved  and Sound also but it is ok.
title: Speakers need to be improved on

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Paul Hobaica
content: I like the fact that the Flex doesn’t need to be set on the counter. I use it in the bathroom. However, the sound quality is very poor. It sounds like a tin can.
title: Echo flex sounds like a tin can.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: walt2810
content: This was the most simple/least cost to get Alexa in the garage to control a light (switch is on inside of house). With Alexa assisting, I can avoid re-wiring a switch to the interior of the garage, now the family can ask Alexa to turn on the light. Gots to love the technology so might as well use it :)
title: Just needed Alexa in the garage to control lights!!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Claire R
content: I bought this because it was cheaper than another echo & it would not be near a table to place it on. It works exactly the same as our other echo devices.  I use this in my bedroom and enjoy talking to Alexa in the morning to get the weather report. I also don’t mind the sound quality for listening to music.
title: Great device, cheaper than another echo.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Astrid
content: I recently moved to a bigger house and wanted to try this so the Alexa could work around the house. It certainly does! Think of this like an extender to the Alexa (that you already have). It recognizes your voice, set up is easy and fast, the volume/sound it’s not the best in the market but the best in a device of this make.
title: An extension of your Alexa.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Anthony A. Bennett, MD
content: We have a light switch in a difficult to reach position after we moved a wall in our laundry room.  We wanted to have the same look with a normal appearing light on the ceiling so we put the Echo flex in a outlet and used the motion detector add on.  We put Phillips Hue light bulbs in the ceiling light fixture and after I figured out how to set a routine configured for each device (the hardest part unfortunately to figure out), we are absolutely satisfied with this configuration.  No more trying to reach around the door awkwardly to get to the light switch.  And if the motion detector doesn't detect for whatever reason, we have a fail safe by just asking Alexa to turn on the laundry room lights.  Very nice..
title: Use in laundry room for motion detector activated light

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Mooniac
content: You can't expect good audio quality from this, it sounds like the intercom on a submarine. But it's great for wherever you need Alexa access, and it seems great for places where you can't place a delicate device like a dot or show, like in the bathroom or kitchen or garage. A good deal at this low price.
title: Simple and nifty

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: M. Reynolds
content: Wish Amazon started with this version first. I find myself replacing the dots in my house with these. Since I use auxiliary speakers with most of our devices the sound quality didn’t really matter. What did matter was not having more wires hanging out. Plug these discreetly in the wall and Alexa responds when needed and plays our music effortlessly.
title: Taking away the wires

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Mitz P
content: Love this mini Alexa! I only wish you could increase the Vikings a bit more. I know it's just for a small room. I use it in my bathroom, but if you could increase the Volume (I don't care about sound quality on this product) as it's hard to hear over the shower noise, then this would be a gem!
title: Love this little Alexa!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Kathy Z.
content: We bought this for a very small room. The sound is not as good as the other Alexa devices but its size must be considered. Speech is clear, great for talk radio. It fits nicely on a wall outlet and is very convenient to have it a space where a bigger, corded one, wont work or is inconvenient.
title: A great little device!!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: azdesert
content: I love it in my laundry room, it is a perfect size.  Might get one with night light for hallway for wandering in the dark.  I enjoy knowing that if I fall in the laundry room I can call for help.  Great for areas that you dont need the volume or sound quality but do want alexa for other uses.
title: perfect size

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Jorge Estela
content: never thought I'd dislike an echo product. Flex is not as responsive as other Echo products. Sometimes i have to yell on order for it to heare. Has gone off line for no reason. the price os good if they can work out the glitches. Speaker quality is ok for simple responses. Never expected  it to be great. paired it with a BT Speaker for music and it works fine.
title: Not Happy

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Linda C Little
content: I absolutely love being able to plug this small unit into a plug, yet use it the same way I use my bigger units that sit on surfaces.  My eventual plan is to have one of these in every room.  Really works well. Note:  didn't rate the motion detection feature as haven't used it yet.
title: small, out of the way, yet as powerful as the bigger units

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Peter Berkman
content: normal features of other Alexa devices.  I have it hooked up to a remove speaker (wired) and it sounds great. a good safety feature is an easy to "mute the mic" button.  Since it is in the garage, I don't want people outside to be able to say "Alexa, open garage door" :D... very happy with it!
title: Great little device for the garage!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: R D
content: Did Amazon forget that a decent speaker is a must?  The Flex would be good if it had a speaker that had more than a very high pitched range.  You are really stretching your imagination if you can understand the answer from Alexa.  The 30 day return has passed.  Please upgrade and replace the Echo Flex.
title: What speaker?

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: J. R. Stubbe
content: Okay, so this is a very simple device with a tiny speaker. But with the add on night light attachment it makes for a very cool working nightlight for my mom’s laundry room. One word of warning, the Alexa app does not allow you to return to automatic nightlight mode by itself. So if you turn the night light on and off by spoken command you need to unplug and replug the device in.
title: Makes for a very cool nightlight - with the right attachment

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: B. B. Wilson
content: I was a bit skeptical when I bought two of these, but I'm glad I did! Great extension of the Echo line of products. I added the night light to both of them and love it. The sound of course, is not optimal, but good enough for what I need. I have these grouped with Echo Dot's and my Echo Show to fill the house with music and it does the trick.
title: Very useful!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Whizzer
content: I knew this was no echo mini but I also didn't think Amazon made this junk quality of device.  It's best not to ask what is good about it...nothing.  Sound quality is worse than the cheapest pocket kids radio you can find, it often doesn't here its own name, thus it doesn't respond, the light on it is very annoying in a bedroom, and the sound quality and volume is so poor even for spoken responses that it is high near useless.  Very, very disappointed. Don't waste your money!
title: So cheaply made, it is expensive at half the price and nearly useless...

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: delite916
content: This little flex is great, it gave me the ability to add voice capabilities to my home office area.  It's also a nice feature that the flex can pair to a bluetooth speaker for enhanced sound.  I'll be adding a couple more around my house to cover aeas where my main echo can't hear so that I can have total voice features thoughout my house.
title: Great little addition

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Melissa Bickham
content: So excited I got these!!!!!!! I got these on prime day for $9!!!! They have all normal Alexa function the speaker is just not as good. However I don’t use Alexa to play music throughout the house at this time so I don’t mind. I’ve also read people use these as an extension to their echo dogs in large areas
title: YESSSSSS BUY IT

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Cliente de Amazon
content: Tengp 3 Alexas en la casa y lo compre para expandir el reconocimiento de voz de Alexa y funciona maravillosamente.
title: Buena compra.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Katina N Caulder
content: I bought this not sure if all that it did but I love Alexa devices and was tired of having to use my phone to turn lights off if I wasn’t in a room with my echo devices, or didn’t have my phone with me. Nobody else could use Alexa to turn lights off etc in my home without the app in their phone etc. This thing is AMAZING!!! I’m getting ready to purchase a few more 😉!
title: GREAT ADDITION TO MY OTHER DEVICES!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Mrs Jones
content: I have none of the problems that people have written about. This lil flex is perfect. Hears me access the room, it's very responsive, and the USB plug works. Overall, great buy for me!
title: Good buy!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Narles Nave
content: At last an Echo device that you can install without using table/dresser/etc space....I attached the night lite so I have been able to turn off a table lamp and still find my way to  the Broom at 3AM....Love it.  I suspect the motion detector attachment would prove just as useful if you are an Alexa skills programmer.
title: Echo Flex Plugin is neat

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Wandering Star
content: Works well for activating smart devices like lights, fans, thermostats etc. but is almost totally useless for requests for information that requires a verbal response from Alexa.  The speaker is low quality and even on highest volume it is difficult to hear or understand what is being said.
title: Works well for activating smart devices but

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Jo A.
content: I wanted this to use as an intercom to my garage. I knew it wasn’t going to be loud but it just wasn’t quite loud enough for my husband to hear over his drills,etc.  Instead I put it in my bathroom for music and weather, etc. I put a dot in the garage. All is good now with both locations c
title: Flex is good for small places.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: WhatevaWhatever
content: Fantastic device for the price! I already have a Spot as my nightstand clock, but we had been using a cheap plug in nightlight for our Corgi in the bedroom. For the price (about 2X than said nightlight) I get a smart speaker with motion detection (interstates with my ring alarm) and my corgi gets a light I can customize that’s plenty for him, without being too my much for us. I wish we were able to customize the color of the light more, I also would love to see a battery powered version with the light integrated..
title: Corgi loves his smart nightlight!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: David Timme
content: Ease of installation and integration. Allowed me to put an echo on the other side of my bed for stereo. Unbelievable depth and sound. Try it.
title: Great Addition Piece

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Ardzard
content: I have an older music surround system. I wanted to integrate voice control to that and this seemed like the easiest solution. The voice recognition is not as accurate as my Echo Show but it does the job. You don't buy this device for the speaker quality and it doesn't matter because I'm using it only for the AUX output. Otherwise, it works well for basic voice commands playing music to an external device.
title: Make any audio system "smart"

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Anthony
content: I like the ease of getting set up. Size is great for a small area. The downsize is the sound. I expected a little more. I own echos and dots both. The sound quality is outstanding and clear. This flex sounds clear but just too weak to be used in an open area, such as a big kitchen or even bathroom. But, over all i am pleased.
title: Great little alexa for a small space.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: C. J. Moen
content: Just like its big brothers, the Echo and Echo Spot, the Flex can be placed in any room where there is a wifi signal and can replicate most of the functions of other Echo devices in the house, garage, bathroom, etc. Plug it in within voice range, set it up quickly using the Alexa app, and forget its even there! It's a great value!
title: Convenience and diminutive size are the best features

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Vinter
content: i wish it had a better speaker.... not for music but mostly for weather updates and news. I have this placed in a bathroom. i also wish it had a motion sensor that would turn on the light. I have not use the 3.5mm jack but the usb charging seems to work with android.  Overall good effort and worth $20
title: Good concept and works but ....

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Vee
content: As other comments have mentioned the sound isn't great but it sounds good throigh the Bluetooth speaker I have it connected to. Works just like my Echo Dot and I've finally been able to get music everywhere at the same tome with NO DELAY. Great supplement for the Alexa system. I'll probably buy another.
title: Good Value.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Joel Sonnenfroh
content: Works like all other Echo devices, except the sound quality isn't that great. But for all intended purposes, city is perfect for small rooms, uncommon areas, laundry rooms, or any other room not used often but still needs the talents of Alexa. Don't count on rocking out to Spotify with this, unless it is quietly.
title: Works Great. Sound is meh!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Kat3y
content: I think I'm addicted to all things Alexa... she's everywhere in our home! This little gadget is great.. saves me a trip to the kids room..its fall season some nights get a bit chilly, I have a space heater plugged into it.. and can turn it off or on for them from my room or anywhere Alexa is enabled!
title: Nifty gadget...

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: TLV
content: Exactly what I expected and wanted--basic Alexa functionality without all the bells and whistles for an area of our house not used as much. Will give us the ability to control smart devices and, because it doesn't have the same speaker capabilities, it's much less expensive than an Echo or Echo Dot.
title: Essential Functions at Low Price

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: mab_710
content: I bought this for my 10yr old son for his 11th birthday, for his room. He really only wanted it to listen to music on his room and ask random questions. I know the speaker quality isn’t great for music. But I thought it would be ok for him. Not so sure. Maybe I should’ve just waited until the Alexa went on sale again and got it.
title: Not bad for an additional Alexa or for a child.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Stephan M.
content: Bought it to turn our outdoor speaker into a smart speaker. At first it seemed great. It connected via Bluetooth and all was great. Too bad it almost never wakes when I say “Alexa” or “Echo” (I tried changing the wake word). I’m 26 and have an amazon powered smart home, the issue isn’t me. Also the Bluetooth drops and disconnects often.
title: Good idea, bad execution

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: C Corbi
content: It's very small, so of course the sound quality is not great.  That said, if you have a purpose for it, it will serve it.  I use mine plugged in by the front door of my home to voice activate ADT e.g. Alex, ARM AWAY .. Alexa DISARM (it asks for your code).  VERY handy and no need for a larger unit.
title: Great if you have a PURPOSE for it

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Christina D.
content: The Echo Flex is not ideal for music. Amazon tells you that right off the bat. But if you're looking for reminders, news, alarms, and smart home control... This is perfect. I got this for my elderly father as a safety measure. It's in his bedroom in the event he needs to use Alexa to call a family member for assistance, control the lights, or get medication reminders. He also likes to listen to soft music at bedtime and the news before getting up. It is working great. I plan to get another for my own home to add to our smart home control.
title: Works great for small spaces

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Lou Platform
content: This item is Great!!! Will definitely recommend. Extra charging plug on top is a plus as You will not loose that receptacle. Have it in bath and it works perfectly for morning and night schedule. Sound it’s a bit strange but for bath it’s ok. You can add a speaker if you want. Overall great item great price. Thanks
title: Extra charging plug on top is a plus!!!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Gan Y.
content: This is my first echo so I don't know if other echo works better, but I often need to speak twice for it to pick up my voice. And my friend laugh at us saying Siri does a much better job. Speaker is OK to me since I don't expect to use it a lot for music. The best thing is the cordless design.
title: Does not pick up voice well

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: stormfrontproject
content: Overall I like the product,I was kind of questioning that when I bought it. Actually works pretty good for a bathroom. Haven't tried it in a larger room. If you're looking for better sound quality and a louder volume go with one of their other products. But for a bathroom works pretty good for me.
title: Kind of has a sound of a old portable pocket radio

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Philip Chin
content: Don’t expect hi-fidelity audio from this compact box. Way too small for decent quality speakers. However, this device goes anywhere where there is a wall outlet without a tangle of wires and adapters and without having to buy a third-party wall mount. Plus the night light/usb option is great! Will not hesitate to buy another one for the guest bathroom.
title: Convenience of Echoflex outweighs shortcomings.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: suzie
content: This is very convenient. I love having it in my kitchen to use as a timer or recipe help and turning lights off and on. I just wish I could turn up the sound more. I didn't think it would matter much since I hadn't planned on using it to listen to music, but sometimes it is a little difficult to hear.
title: Very useful alexa device with low sound quality

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: D. L Remington
content: I bought several of these and placed one in every room of my aging parents’ house, including the bathroom, then set the system up so they can call me or call 911 if one of them falls or needs help. It will do all the other normal functions as well, of course, but this gives all of us peace of mind. My parents love these, and I’m happy to know they can get help in an emergency.
title: Extra safety feature for aging parents

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Bradley
content: Easiest way to add Alexa to any outlet, but it has one HUGE missed opportunity. I currently have one in my bathroom where I also have a string of USB LED lights. I use a smart plug for the lights, yet the Flex has a powered USB port... If the Flex could add the ability to power on/off its onboard USB port so I could remove the smart plug (as shown)... I'd instantly but 5 more! Possibly a future firmware update?!?! 🙏🙏🙏
title: Wicked Simple; Should cost more like $10/15

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Leonard R Smith
content: Tried mine with motion sensor and it works extremely well setting off announcements throughout the house. In the garage...in the basement.... and even in my shed which is 100' away.  I have 90% of the alexa devices made some are better some are worse...this is one of the best.
title: On Sale it allows you to have communications everywhere in your home...super easy to use.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: amprg
content: This perfect for restroom/shower room. You can't expect much for quality. Its okay for listening the news and traffic while getting ready. Its microphones are quite sensitive and work pretty good. I attached the motion sensor to it to shut it down after 10 minutes without motion.
title: Good concept. Over price for full price.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Mitch Love
content: Excellent idea but the sound is HORRIBLE. If you have to plug a speaker up to it, why not just get the echo dot. Which is what I replaced the flex with and put flex in laundry room just because it was the only room that didn’t have an Alexia device in it. Don’t waste your money on this, just get an echo dot.
title: Nice idea, sound is HORRIBLE!!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Joseph R.
content: This is a great little device, I initially bought 2 to test with and echo dot gen3 and everything works great. Easy set up and integration. I plan on getting more and deploying to all rooms.  The speaker is loud enough, not a real music speaker but works great for communication. I also tested the light attachment and the motion sensor both work fine.
title: Good integration device, well made.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: J. Fera
content: Plug it in and go. No cables! I have an Echo Dot that I leave connected to my sound system via a headphone cable. So to hear it, I'd have to remove the cable, or turn the system on. So I got a Flex to use for simple things (checking weather, timers, etc.), and use the Dot exclusively for music. Different wake-up word for each and voila. The Flex speaker is cheap-sounding, even after some tweaking of the tone controls in the app. But for what I use it for, no issue.
title: Tinny sounding speaker (expected), but it works as advertised

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Tyi
content: I bought this for my sewing room to control the lights in there and to play some occasional music. I also add the clock add-on. It’s been perfect since I’m in the room occasionally and didn’t need a full Alexa device. The price point was perfect for the value I’m receiving from the device.
title: Little Device - Big Use

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: CCCG
content: Very good product. It works for small spaces like the laundry, which is exactly what I wanted it for. Came completely set up and integrated with my other devices and connects perfectly with Bluetooth speakers, which is good because the sound is not very good. Other than that, my only complain is that sometimes I need to yell to be heard because I think the mic is not powerful enough.
title: Almost as good as I expected

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Danny & Shelby
content: Linked to my echos on it's own, Awesome! And works great, does not have a loud speaker, it is more quiet than the 2nd gen echo dot at volume 10... wish it was louder but it's good, bought the night light attachment and love it, kids love to change colors!
title: Pretty cool

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: NetraPie
content: After my first order was lost my replacement came in and I'm in love! It's so cool being able to call on Alexa without having to bring out my phone or go to my room. My kids love being able to talk to Alexa and the light night is so cool! No chords to bother with.  The sound isn't too bad but the option to use a bluetooth speaker evens it out.  I just bought another one! I have no place for it but I couldn't ignore the deal for $12.50
title: Love the flex!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: JD3rdPig
content: An easy addition to provide smart access to other smart devices from places a bit too far from my other echo devices. I just move it with me if I am working in the garage and as simple as that I can drop in on any other echos in the house and control any smart device on the network.
title: It works as expected.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Ramiro
content: The product looks relly nice. The sound is not good, but conisdering the size of the speakers does not surprise me, it has probles detecting your voice when playing music over 80% of it's volumen you can yield at it, and won't respond, last time i had to disconnect it in order for flex to stop playing music. The sound is good for a room like a small bathroom only, but i don't thing is moisture resistant. In my opinion if you want to use it as speaker, it's better to spend a little more to buy an Echo dot.
title: Maybe you can use it as a small kitchen assistant, or as a bathroom speaker, but thats it.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Rose Black
content: I love these. They keep my family connected and allow us to listen what we love wherever we are in the house! The voice of Alexa sounds like an old timer radio but the sound quality of the music is pretty good for a small products
title: Small way to keep us connected.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: iRandy
content: Not at all loud enough. Can’t hear over shower. Almost redundant having honestly when I have the new Echo. This would be worth having in every room if it were loud enough. Being nothing but a basic Echo other wise, cant say it’s worth it.
title: No loud enough

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: J. Ross
content: I bought this to put in a bathroom, because it could be paired with a nightlight module, and would provide news and music while we get ready in the morning.  The voice part is a little low volume wise, but not a problem.  The music is loud enough that I can hear it well.  It isn't Bose quality, but I wouldn't expect that from a device priced this low.
title: Works as well as any Echo product

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: G. White
content: There is nothing I dislike about the Flex....the sound quality could be better but it's not bad as is. I'm using one in a bathroom just for a nightlight and info device. Its a pretty convenient little addition to the other Alexa devices and I definitely recommend giving it a try.
title: A surprising handy addition to the Alexa family

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Willie
content: I purchased 5.  These are great additions to complete a smart home. For me it was places where I wanted alexa but didn't want an echo. Hallways and bathrooms.  Works as good as a echo dot just with a lower speaker quality.  I grouped my 12 echos together for music playback. It sounds wonderful. Awesome
title: Dope af

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: KJK
content: I really like that I can move this plugin to any outlet anywhere with no connecting wire to it.  In some rooms I do not have an Alexa so I can just plug the flex in and it is ready to use.  The music is not as good as on the Dots but that is not a big issue for me.  Also making a phone call is a great feature.  I have 2 of them and have the Motion Sensors added to them.
title: Easy to use and move.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: JoseMonkey
content: This works fine as an Echo device, but I was surprised at how bad the speaker sounds. I guess I should have expected it, but for some reason I was still shocked when I heard it. I'm sure this is perfectly fine for regular usage, but don't think you're going to play music on this device!
title: Tin can speaker :-/

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: la-to
content: I got this for my bathroom because my daughter likes to listen music. It is nice but the voice recognition is not as good as echo dot and the sound doest even come closer to the dot. I will look into attaching a nightlight to it that way I dont use all the plugs in my bathroom. For a bathroom is a great feature, for a room I would not recomended. I have a echodot on each of the floors in my house and i am verry happy with them.
title: great for a bathroom

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Frank V. Deni
content: We have an Alexa Echo Show 8,  2 Echo Dots and now 2 Echo Flex.  Not only can we get information from each of them, we use them as intercoms from room-to-room.  They are all connected to our Smart Thermostat and Ring Doorbell.  All work perfectly-high quality at an extremely affordable price.  An outstanding value.
title: Alexa is now part of our Family

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Savvy Shopper
content: Works great. Installed immediately but the sound is kind of tinny. I can live with that. Excellent compliment to my Echo family.
title: So Easy to Set Up.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: joe1017
content: I was going to add an echo dot to the bedroom, then I saw this.  Easy to install, just plug it into an outlet, add your wifi password and you are good to go. Now I can turn the light out, set the thermostat, and set an alarm from the bed.  When I get up I can check the weather, traffic, news, etc before I go into the kitchen.
title: Great Device

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: ZiadTurk
content: the good thing about the Flex is, that it is compact, and doesnt require a power adapter, so, no wires hanging, the only place in our home without Alexa was the bathroom,  well, not anymore !! the audio quality is not SO great like the show, or the new Echo, but, it does the job.
title: economical addition to our Alexa family

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Michael Petra
content: I like it, nice device for an extra room it’s not used much. Connect easily and works fine like all other Alexa devices. Just the sound quality is rather tiny. If they come out with a speaker upgrade, I’d go for it immediately. I have other smaller devices that sound much better.
title: Great except for the speaker

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Francesca
content: I found the need to have an Alexa/EchoFlex in yet another room of the house and this was just the right size! It plugs directly into the outlet and responds as usual. I think it may respond better than the Dots, but our Dots are a couple of years' old, so they may just be worn out.
title: Got it covered!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: stretcharmy
content: Everything on this device works great. It sounds better than I expected it to. The only issue that I have with it is that the announcements play from this device first before the rest in the house. It is a bit annoying to hear it twice. Maybe Alexa knows my kids don’t listen for sh** and she’s being proactive.
title: Works great but announcements are out of sync

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: PB~
content: This is my 4th Echo product. I got this one to use in my garage so I can listen to music, ask questions, get notifications, while I work on projects. The sound is better than my 1st generation Echo Dot, but not nearly as good as my Echo 2  or Echo Show. It's good enough for the garage though!
title: Sweet little device

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Eric F. Cunningham
content: Great little product; I found this ready to power up and install. The sound quality is surprisingly good, I have also ordered the smart clock display (arriving today), for the Echo Flex. It looks like I'm going to have to order more... For family. Great Product.
title: Great little product...

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: W D F
content: the first light detector didn't work right and I returned it and they sent me a new one within two days.  All works just fine now.  Naturally, the sound leaves a bit to be desired but I use it in my bathroom as I have some Echos in the other rooms.. All in all... very satisfied.
title: Very satisfied.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Skiv Here
content: I already had an Echo Show 5 and Echo Dot. I wanted something that I thought works work good in the kitchen. It works, but sometimes tells me it doesn't understand. As for sounds quality? Don't even think about it. Music sounds tinny... And if you are listening to news, it's not much better. I though it would work good in my kitchen, not I'm not too happy with it. I guess you get what you pay for because the price is the good part.
title: It work... But just ok

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Chris B
content: I currently own 2 Echo Dot 3 which has amazing sound. The flex is great to add on to any smarthome or current Alexa users. Its uses are identical except of course with the flex being so small its sound is a little puny but I expected that. I would absolutely recommend it though.
title: Good addition to anyone who uses Echo

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Lissa
content: Hard to hear or be heard when dropping in to other alexa items around the house. Needs to be a little bit louder. I have one in the garage just to control a few things in there. I dropped in to speak to my husband and I could not hear what he was saying. Fyi you also have to be very close to it to be able to drop in and be heard.
title: Works great for commands.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Ben Bynum
content: It’s alright. I like that it makes it convenient to put Alexa in certain places, and I didn’t expect good sound quality, but what drives me crazy is that the mic doesn’t seem to be as good as the dot, so it just doesn’t hear me a lot of the time. That’s pretty annoying and sort of defeats the purpose.
title: You get what you pay for

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: JP
content: Placed in garage, Blue toothed to my garage stereo receiver. Works like a charm!!!! The built in speaker is perfect to hear her responses but I didn’t buy it to listen through the built in speaker, I bought it to stream music in my garage and control my smart devices, which works perfect!
title: So good my neighbor bought one for his garage!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: J Mills
content: I like my echo plug in. It travels easily with me. I have the same access as the echo dot except no pictures. The night light attachment is helpful especially if I need to get in or out of bed I can tell it to turn light on, off or up, down and at any color. I will get much use from this echo and won’t go anywhere with out it. I haven’t used the motion feature yet.
title: Alexa, a marvelous plug in.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: LCRD1
content: No escucha bien ni en ingles ni en español. Puedes hablarle al frente y no va a reaccionar. No es posible que un servicio como music unlimited no tenga canciones que otros proveedores si. Al menos solo se perdieron 8 dolares en prime day y no lo que originalmente cobran.
title: Decepcionante

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Hiker1226
content: Cute & small. Wish they were louder. Took me a while to realize the command is “Alexa turn volume up to 10.”  Have mine in the bathroom and with the shower running you can barely hear music; forget about hearing a podcast. Like the concept. Look forward to improved iterations.
title: Looking forward to improvements

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: John B Ross
content: Works great for what I bought it for. Use it as a kitchen timer when cooking, I can have meny timer at once and it doesn't need to be on my counter top. I have (3) dots, 1 show, (1) Fire TV, (2) Fire HD10 tablets and (1) recover switch. All using Alexa. I'm going to possibly replace the recover switch with a flex in my daughter's room. I need to test what I can do with the flex, I find that each device has limits on what Alexa features you can use on each device and the information isn't readily available.
title: Works great for what I bought it for.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Savvy Shopper in GA
content: Small plug-in device let me add Alexa to a room without taking up scarce surface space. I added the motion sensor and now the kitchen light (on a smart plug) comes on as I enter in the morning. The Flex must be pretty sensitive as it occasionally responds when I am speaking to a closer device, an Echo Dot. Note that it sounds a bit tinny, especially compared to the much improved Echo Dot 3.
title: Flex Adds Flexibilty

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Merredith Watkins
content: Nice product! If you looking for booming sound this is not the product. Though, it is a great item to have in the bathroom and kitchen. It is nice to be able to ask questions about things that run through your mind in lieu of picking up the phone! Highly Recommended!!! Get it on sale so you can buy plenty for gifts and enjoyment in your home!!!
title: Echo Flex

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: DoubleARanch
content: It works great for an easy interface to plug in another audio system. What I don't like is that the microphones aren't sensitive enough and it doesn't appear to hear me sometimes without speaking loudly in contrast to the echo input which has two more mics and can hear me even at a whisper.
title: Functional and does the job but needs better mics

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: marchee
content: It’s a great device but could be better if the sound was higher. It sounds like she’s mumbling when she speaks and I have the sound to max 10. Other than that she’s worth it but please please fix the sound issue. My echo dots are way louder that that device.  Please and thank you.
title: Echo Flex At Night

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Boyd V
content: It works as well as other alexa devices. The speaker is a little bit muddled. With it being the size it is, it's not a problem. I can still understand what it's saying and I'm not trying to play crisp high quality and volume music through it. I have other more capable electronics for that. It's convenient and out of the way. It gives you more options to talk to all your alexa devices without having to shout to one in another room. Plugs right into any available outlet.
title: Adds Alexa voice control to different rooms without a lot of expense.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Brian Ellis
