content: I didn't get a chance to use the Flex because it couldn't maintain a connection to my network even with it being in the same room as the router.  It was a pain trying to get it set up over multiple attempts. It was a refurbished item and maybe that had something to do with it.
title: Let down

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: jjhinjax
content: Our laundry room has a smart plug for our light. Even though our Echo Dot is within earshot of the entrance of the laundry room, Alexa would often miss our command to turn the light on. Echo Flex was a reasonably priced add-on that allows us to turn the light on and off as we walk in or out of the room. Installation was easy. I plugged it in, opened my Alex app, and a few moments later the device was online. The sound quality is not great, but that was in the description of the device.
title: Just What We Needed

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: JLF
content: I haven’t used it much yet.  I bought it for my greatroom to set timers and reminders.  And to access the echo dots in other rooms.  I am finding new uses for it.  The sound quality is okay, but not for listening to music.  I like it because it plugs into an outlet and is unobtrusive.
title: Useful for some things, not for music.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Kellikel
content: I love everything this device has to offer from reminders, appts, recipes, shopping list, jokes, weather, knowledge, my name and you name it Alexa will provide it.  These will make great Christmas presents and stocking stuffers.  Thinking of ordering another one for my house.
title: Echo Flex - a great small gift

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: TAD
content: I recently bought several Echo Dots and can't believe how wonderful they are.  So many features and it's very useful.  It's also very entertaining.  I can't believe I didn't have these before now.  Love it!
title: It's very versatile and convenient.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: C. M. Estle
content: Not a great speaker, but a great expansion of my home Alexa network. The sound quality if you try to use it as a speaker for music etc... is not great. However, as an assistant answering questions and adding reminders, alarms, and things to the shopping list it works great.
title: Not a great speaker, but a great expansion of my home Alexa network

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Vincent Starace
content: Terrific for those spaces that are farther from your main echo (s). Use like any echo and add speakers for better music quality.
title: Great addition great extension

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: L. Kunz
content: We needed to be able add to our shopping lists, play music, and ask questions from our kitchen and family room but didn't want to find space for another Echo Dot.  Our answer was to install an Echo flex speaker with a nightlight addition to an unused electrical outlet.  Works beautifully and is out of the way.  Win/Win for us.  Love Amazon Warehouse, Year end and Lightning Deals!
title: Great Addition to our Echo Dot!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: CR
content: Perfect for the garage - doesn’t have a volume adjustment but is loud enough to hear NPR and music while I work out there. Sound quality isn’t amazing but better than the old radio most folks have out in their garage.
title: I’m not mad at it.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Bruce
content: I have an echo and dots in the house and at my office. Bought this tiny plug in device for the garage. Works well and volume is fine for speaking, but probably wouldn't want to use it for music. Quick and easy setup just like the other devices. Use it to get time and weather and to drop in on echo or dot to use it like an intercom.
title: Very cool!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Mark P.
content: The Echo Flex works as I had hoped it would. I am using it with the motion detector add-on. It’s set up in the basement to turn on the lights when someone walks down the stairs. This is very helpful when carrying a load of laundry down to be washed or some bulky items to be put in storage. The lights can also be turned on or off with a voice command to Alexa of course. The cost of the Flex and add-on is comparable to a stand-alone motion detector. The device is powered through a connection to an electrical outlet so no dependence on batteries. Set-up of the device and the routine for controlling the lights was simple. I’m very satisfied with this purchase.
title: Echo Flex and motion detector works as expected.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: SLE
content: This little device is perfect for expanding your Alexa footprint affordably.  My main Echo in the dining room couldn’t hear me or be heard clearly in most other rooms of the home.  For less than a hundred bucks I’ve put devices in every room.  That’s the selling point of this little guy.
title: Perfect for adding Alexa to additional rooms

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: PETER
content: Used as a central hub for control of home and access to alexia. Did not need fancy sound system or another control device, just wanted something listening for the next command of lights microwave or other devices. picks up my voice anywhere in large central area of home.
title: Simple and effective

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Lee Manges
content: The main unit is slim as before but the sound is really lousy. The addon night light is always on even if you set up the third reality app to only run it at certain times it just keeps disconnecting and then staying on. One of the few positives is that it does allow it to be red light so easier on eyes at night. I will not be buying any more of these.
title: Small, sounds just ok, and the nightlight fails constantly on automation

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: JGD
content: Took less than three minutes to set up" I have an Echo Dot in my bedroom and Echo Flex in my office. I connected my second Echo Flex in my kitchen. Connected to all speakers [ multiple devices ] to listen to the news and weather. The sound is fine for news and weather. I also like the fact that this can be moved to any room so easily without any cords.
title: Perfect product

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Tedjen
content: The echo flex works just as advertised, the integration with your home and alexa skills it's like other echo device. The sounds it's not good but it's something that you know to expect. But for the price it's good. I can't comment about the accessories cause I don't have one. For the price of this device I recommend this article.
title: Nice anD efficient echo flex

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: ITATodd
content: This along with the motion sensor works great in our garage so when we enter the lights as well as our laundry area lights too. Then if needed we can talk to Alexa. If anyone forgets to turn off the lights they will go off after there is no movement after a certain amount of time. Was well worth the cost and simply to setup.
title: A must have add-on for your Alexa enabled home

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: adventure john
content: The Flex was described to me as a nightlight with Alexa. I bought two with that thought in mind. Truth is, it's a terrible nightlight. It provides already no light. The Flex makes up for that limitation by being an excellent stand alone Alexa unit. I use it to control lights, and if I'm in the mood for music it seamlessly connects to my Bluetooth speaker. I'm glad I bought it!
title: Not what I expected, but still enjoyable

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Jeremy denton
content: I only bought this because it was on sale half off. Really I bought it to supplement my other echo dots I have around the house. Some of my echos don't quite reach to the living room. overall it works really well. Don't expect the same quality sound out of it as a regular echo dot. But it definitely serves its purpose especially for the price. I'm a integrate motion sensors into it later on. We shall see.
title: Good little products for the money

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Buyer
content: I wanted to add some outdoor weatherproof Alexa speakers to my backyard. I had a few Echo Flex's inside my house, and with curiosity I grabbed an Echo Flex and plugged it in one of the Outdoor CFCI Weatherproof Outlet Box at my backyard (see attached pictures.) The Echo Flex fit perfectly inside the weatherproof CFGI box.  Bingo, I had an outdoor speaker that was weatherproof, and could be controlled by Alexa!  I did the same on my other outlets, so I had multiple outdoor speakers that I could play music as a 'Group' in my Alexa app. A simple inexpensive plug-and-play outdoor weatherproof speaker solution.  I am pretty happy about it.
title: The Echo Flex fits perfectly inside an Outdoor GFCI Weatherproof Outlet Box, as an outdoor speaker.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Rex Allen
content: Speaker is a little flat-sounding, but as would be expected for a very small Echo. The nightlight attachment is very cool! The motion sensor attachment works very well also. Very nice small unit, especially where space is limited to mount! The mounting of this device vs. a Echo Dot is better; however, the sound quality of the Echo Dot is superior.
title: Good price, easy to place

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: TXMomma2
content: I had already seen the reviews for this item so I knew that the music quality was not as good as the echo dot or echo show 5 we already own. We just plugged it in to our master bathroom so we could use it with Alexa for reminders and play music while we got ready. This little plug-in is a great addition to our Alexa system because we knew what to expect and it fit the bill just fine.
title: This fit the bill!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Brad Tharp
content: I have an echo dot in my living room and this one in the kitchen. It can hear me from one or the other and "talk back" from either/or. Its perfect. The only thing I don't like is that the sound quality is not very good. Not like the echo is wonderful but it's better than this one. Over all, though, it's a wonderful little inconspicuous thing behind my coffee maker.
title: Works great

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: JAKnarr
content: This accessory is exactly what I needed. Saves me from having to shout down to Alexa over the stairwell, to get lights turned on or off, get information I am seeking, etc.. Wish I had gotten this long before I did. If your house is on the larger side or just happens to sprawl,  you need this add-on.
title: Just what I needed....

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Buchmeister
content: Set-up couldn't be any simpler: just plugged it in & Alexa took care of the integration! Small size (and "small sound quality") is fine for my small bathroom. Some may prefer to spend a bit more and purchase the bigger (and better sound quality) produced by the Echo Dot.
title: Small size for small room

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: David D
content: A self contained Echo that plugs directly into an electrical outlet with no cords to worry about. At the present time there are two accessories for the flex. A sensor and a night light that can be plugged in and programmed to perform various tasks via Alexa. ( Still learning).
title: A Very Flexible Echo

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Al
content: I like it I just really don’t know why they made the audio so poor. Really wish they made the sound just a little better (with an option to make it louder as well). It’s fine for what I need it for but I can barely hear it sometimes. Definitely not for playing music!
title: Good with one flaw...

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Courtney r.
content: Buy this if you already have another echo device. I use it as a way for alexa to hear me where my echo speakers can not. I also hooked up a rechargeable speaker with bluetooth capability to the flex and it now operates the exact same way my echo speakers do. Buy this to make any bluetooth speaker a smart speaker. Just be sure to provide that bluetooth speaker with a power source if you intend to use it this way. The microphone pics up on me well, except for when the hooked up speaker (non smart bluetooth speaker) is playing loud music.
title: Make any bluetooth speaker a smart home device

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Todd D.
content: We use this in our kitchen to set timers and add things to the grocery list.  Needed something there as when I cook and my wife is playing music or watching TV the living room Alexa can't her me.  Works great for what we use it for.  Don't try to play music through it though.
title: Great addition to the kitchen!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Mary Donavon-Olabintan
content: I am normally a google fan so this was my first time trying the Alexa and I brought like three of these to put around the house. I love them I did not realize how much the Alexa can do compared to the Google dots. I am pleased with this product however, I wish the volume was a little louder.
title: Great Additions

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Cesar.Fastang25
content: I bought this for my bathroom. I love how it’s small and for places like bathroom etc. but problem is the speaker power is very weak/low volume. I mean my iPhone is louder then this. There’s small speaker I know that’s louder I’m surprised Amazon didn’t do that for this
title: Size is great but volume low

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Steve Andrade
content: I’m using my Echo Plus In my garage workshop. I’m aware that this version has a smaller speaker and is supposed to be an extension of your Alexa family.  It’s just that and is fine for that use! Sound quality alone is weak and because of that it gets a four.  Great idea and great product.
title: Nice addition to the Alexa family

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Grant394
content: The add-on motion detector and plug-in mounting sold me.  I purchased the unit for the workshop, where there is some noise.  I was aware that Echo Flex would not have adequate volume for the environment.  In the end, I added a set of computer speakers to achieve the necessary volume.  It works well.
title: Just what the doctor ordered...

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: James R
content: The echo flex is not intended as a replacement or substitute for the echo dot/show but provides for easy access to Alexa for areas where an dot or show are not convenient or practical. I plugged my echo flex into our downstairs half bathroom. The sound from the unit is not stellar but again you're not getting this unit for audio quality but for convenience. I also ordered an echo flex for my daughter's house- the unit is in the upstairs bathroom and allows complete access to control of lights for the house, news and traffic updates. Setup is extremely easy, basically just plug into the socket.
title: Convienence & accessibility to alexa skills

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Jennifer M.
content: Bought this to put in our game room to set reminders for our boys to stop playing video games and do their chores at scheduled times. Works like a dream! No more yelling up the stairs for them to come down! Great as an intercom too with the drop in option! Love it and will buy more!
title: Great Item!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Pat Lang
content: I wanted an Alexa for the lights in my bedroom. I NEEDED something small and unobtrusive. Echo Flex was perfect. Completely unobtrusive physically and since the room is small, our “conversations”  (Alexa and mine) can be carried on very softly. Incredibly easy to set up. I’m now wondering why it took me so long to buy it up in the first place. :-)
title: PERFECT for small rooms.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Anany
content: This device is well designed. I like the size of it and that it plugs in the outlet directly and does not require a separate power adapter or bulky holders. It also interfaces easily with a night light or a motion sensor (sold separately). The speaker sounds a little "thin" which is fine for communicating with Alexa but I would not recommend it if you plan on listening to music.
title: Echo Flex is great!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: HGB
content: I love this so much: My echo dot is in my bedroom but I now have the echo flex in my kitchen AND bathroom. The other night I showered to the dirty dancing sound track.. TMI?! Only thing i would change is to add a volume button on the flex itself. Would be a lot easier.
title: I love Alexa.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Forrest Gump
content: It’s speaker is very basic. But voice and spoken word recognition is the same as my echos. It was only $10 on Amazon Prime Day, so definitely worth the price. I keep it in my kitchen and it’s quite convenient. So, don’t expect great sound, but you will have good functionality.
title: Good if bought at Amazon Prime cost. Sound quality not great.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: William
content: Ok, serves its purpose if using with the optional night light or motion sensor (sold separately.) As a stand-alone, sound quality not as good as regular dots. If just using as an echo, you could buy a dot with an outlet holder for similar price and get better quality.
title: Serves its purpose, sound quality OK

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Bhargav
content: I bought them as a white elephant gift as I found it really interesting as its pretty compact smart speaker. My friends really like this gift as they were looking to buy Alexa for their home. I am also planning to buy these for my parents so that they can conveniently use them.
title: I am loving this smart speaker

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Special Occasions by Design LLC
content: This alexa does the same job as all other alexa devices such as the plus and dot. The sound quality is not great. This alexa sounds like it is far away and it just doesn't have a crisp sound. For the price, it is not worth it. It is better to get another echo dot.
title: Not worth it.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: afab9960
content: I think it actually has some pretty good volume. My 3 year old likes to plays songs and dance to them and it sounds fine to me. Might be different if we wanted the volume loud for a party but just for 4 of us, it's fine. It even recognizes when she tells it to turn on her light and she doesn't speak the clearest.
title: Nice volume

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Danjo77
content: I love the concept. The product is very compact and convenient and does everything that an Alexa device is expected to do. However, for the small size, you give away a lot of sound quality. Best recommended for communication and listening to content like the news.
title: All Alexa

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Star G.
content: First off, let me just say that the product itself is wonderful and it does what it should. However, the sound quality is TERRIBLE. I bought this to put in the bathroom since I’m always propping my phone up to listen to music while I take a shower and I figured this would be a better alternative to that, but you CANNOT hear it while the shower is running. I had to buy a small Bluetooth speaker to add to it and it’s great now.
title: Sound Volume is very Low

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: DELRAYSTU
content: GAVE MY DAUGHTER THIS AS A GIFT AND SHE KEEPS THNAKING ME... I GUESS I AM A PRETTY GOOD DAD AND POPPY DAD
title: PERFECT GIFT

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Tanya Clevenger
content: Okay, so it's an Echo device, so it already has that as a Pro, but the volume on this thing is terrible! And the fact you can only use the motion sensor accessory OR the night light accessory is really, quite a let down. I ordered two Echo Flex, two Motion Sensor accessories, and one Nightlight accessory. I'm probably gonna return them. The price point is very enticing, but the sound quality is horrible.
title: Not worth the hype.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Shopgirl 23
content: This is replacing an Input for me that I had connected to speakers. Because I am using my own speakers sound is not an issue and it does everything else. If you need a cheap way to integrate Alexa into your existing stereo setup then this might be a good solution for you
title: Great as a home stereo hub

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Keith
content: I have to yell at this device sometimes to get it to respond. Also, powering a speaker from the USB port causes noise to come from the speaker even when nothing is playing. Sometimes when I tell it to play music, it comes from another device in the home.
title: Not quite as good as other Echo products.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Alan Welch
content: The idea of a small plug into the wall unit is great. It is a good size and looks great. The sound is like an old transistor radio with very low volume. Can’t hear it over the running sink while brushing my teeth. Look for these with closeout prices in the not too distant future.
title: Great idea; awful sound

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: JW
content: This small plug in device with USB charging port is a go anywhere plug into the wall. It can be moved from room to room and allows simple Alexa voice access. Sound quality leaves much to be desired so don't expect to listen to your favorite music with this device.
title: Simple small and easy to install

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Mary C
content: I'm truly shocked that little device that can be plugged in anywhere works as well as it does.  Will have to buy a couple more, Great to plug into an outlet in the bathroom even if you only use it for playing music while a nice soak or taking a shower.  LOVE IT!!
title: Unbelieveable Device

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Cindy C
content: I now have an echo in every room and peace of mind that I can summon help if needed. I already love the convenience of these things and use throughout the day. I’m older and living alone so now myself and my son are reassured that if I need help I can call through Alexa. I’ve bought several as gifts and people love them.
title: I’m Alexafied!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Patreace Northrup
content: I probably would have not ordered it if I knew what I was ordering.  I thought it was the same as an Echo Dot but I believe it’s an accessory for it.  It doesn’t play as loud as the regular echo dot.  I’m definitely glad I ordered it.  The only thing is I wish it was a little louder.
title: I still like that I can plug it in with no cords hanging.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Zink
content: Having worked in the audio industry for a bit and having relatively "good" ears once upon a time, I didn't expect much from this - sound quality-wise.  Boy was I right!  I thought it might give my guests the availability of Alexa while in their room - and it does.  But the sound is sooooo poor that I have moved it to my workshop in the garage.  My wife can announce Lunch or Phone Call and it will do the job, but it hogs a valuable outlet!  Craigslist is full of 2nd generation Dots for about the same price.
title: Just don't.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Duffy
content: We got this for our son's bedroom so that he could operate his smart lights. We really like it and absolutely does what we intended! I really like that if you talk to the flex, it only answers you through the Flex rather than having the answer come back through the Alexa too.
title: Nice little smart tool.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Nikhil Sarnot
content: Very disappointing product - much better vision than the actual execution. Voice recognition was very bad, Amazon may want to test in varied voice situations, including rooms with less furniture to account for echo. Speakers are poor quality as expected. The biggest reason and use case to buy is the hardware add-on, which is hugely unreliable and becomes unresponsive pretty quickly. I ended up returning both.
title: Good vision, poor execution from both Amazon and approved third-party

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Randy Watson
content: It's understood at the Job that Im the GOTO for Alexa integration testing and capabilities. I wanted to have my "CREE" lights in the bathroom activate bright in the morning and dimmed late night. My original setup and Alarm system motion detector kinda worked, however using the Flex motion sensor add on to I simply changed my routine "Trigger" to the Flex Sensor.  Lights are reaction time has improved! NOTE: You will need to create a turn Off routine or the lights will stay on
title: Motion Sensor Add-on with Alexa Routine - Problem solved

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: HilLay
content: Product as described. I use it to set my alarm, add things to my grocery list, set timers, night light, etc. This version does not play music but I knew that when I bought it. I would recommend this to anyone who wants to put it in a baby room or bathroom, etc.
title: Would recommend

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Buffalo Bill
content: I wanted to have an echo in the bathroom and this device is perfect.  Of course the sound quality is only marginally better than a cell phone but for the intended use it is just fine. I have four other echo devices and many smart plugs and this works perfectly.
title: Perfect for what I use it for.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Lady Blues
content: Alexa is the friend you didn’t know you needed. I have the dot 3rd generation and sounds awesome.  The flex is  an extension I have in the bedroom.  I hooked up my JBL speakers and play my fave music that sounds great.  Aside from that, too many great features to mention but may I say it’s like having a personal assistant.  Love it!
title: Very affordable

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Denee
content: As I expected, the sound is horrible but if you want one in a small space where you aren't going to play music, it will do the trick. I say small because the voice recognition on it isn't great. I have several other dots and one larger echo plus that all are great for playing music.
title: It is what it is

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Danielle Woodard
content: I'm trying to change the wake word because I have 2 Alexa's in the same area and the app keeps saying that it's unavailable.  Frustrating!  Sound is ok for such a small unit.  Does its job.  Nice to have in the bathroom to listen to music or news getting ready in the morning.
title: Does its job

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: MO
content: I purchased this for an area in my home that didn’t have any Alexa-enabled devices. I didn’t need sound quality for music, I needed something to provide information when I needed it. This works for that reason. If you want something that has sound quality for music, purchase another device.
title: Good device for info; not for listening to music

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Perry T. Foos
content: The Echo Flex is a great unit and works well. It’s a great add on to place that already has Echo devices. I recommend this unit even if it your only unit. The sound quality is good for a little speaker but pair it up with a Bluetooth speaker and it will work well
title: Echo Flex, a great unit!!!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Linda
content: I love this one!  I tested all my most used Echo  features to play my music, play my Audible books, rum my Roomba, control my hue lights, and it works great!  For me in the tiny toilet room the sound is fine. Thank You Amazon, this is great tohave!
title: Keeps getting better! LOVE IT!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Rogelio Saenz
content: Works amazing for rooms like the kitchen, bathrooms, and the garage. Does everything an Alexa device is supposed to but the sound quality sucks however a good bluetooth speaker paired up with it makes it perfect. I love the flex for the rooms mentioned above.
title: A great tool for the smart home.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Diane K.
content: Very nice and works well. Great for a small room or space. I was able to connect easily to a Bluetooth sound bar that was already in the room. Without the sound bar, the sound is low. I would like the sound quality to be a little louder but other than that it’s great and when it’s connected to the sound bar it can get very loud. Does everything the echo can do. I like it and would buy it again if needed and/ or recommend it to others. Very pleased.
title: Great Alexa plug

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: David Brechbiel
content: I have tried all of the Echo products within most rooms of my house.  This is a good example of "You Get What You Pay For".  I won't repeat what has been said by other 2/1 star reviews.  So mine will be short, "Poor listening skills, Below Average speaking skills."  Do you buy?  No!  Just no.  Spend a little more on a dot.
title: No, Just No!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Mary S Moos
content: I can now turn lights in the living room from the bedroom or dining room. Play music get the news be told a joke. Being electronically challenged on alot of things these were easy to set up.  I got 2 of them and found fun and usefulness of the Echo Flex
title: All over the House

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Destiny C
content: I purchased this not really knowing what it does but I'm really glad I did. The set up was easy. It has all the capabilities of the alexa just smaller. Of course the sound is not as bold but it works well. I actually went back and bought a few more as gifts.
title: Who knew!!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Your Mom Reviews
content: We have this in one of our bedrooms and have plans to get more in the future. This is definitely not made with the best sound quality to jam out to Machine Gun Kelly but it’s not what you really want it for. I like the fact that it plugs in and takes up no space. Perfect for bedrooms and hallways. We wanted the echo flex for light controls and notifications. It does it job and is perfect if that is what you are looking for. I dig it and recommend it.
title: This is the bee’s knees for bedrooms

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Lise N. Pellerin
content: I am using these to cover more square-footage of my home to have access to Alexa capabilities. It is working great. I can now listen to my audiobook everywhere in my home. They do hear quite well when I talked to other devices so giving each a different Wake Word helped a lot.
title: So Far, So Good. Valuable Purchase

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: A.C
content: Just what I needed. No wires, just plug and play. No setup required if linked to your Amazon account. Mainly use it for turning lights on and off and set alarm clock. It can also be paired to an external Bluetooth speaker or direct input. Very good product. Purchased three already.
title: Works Great!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Mars
content: I bought the Flex to replace an Echo Dot in the bathroom.  Freed up counter space and reduced clutter. Sound quality of the built-in speaker is poor, but Alexa's replies are clear & understandable. Do NOT plan to use a Flex for music without an external speaker. Microphones pick up commands well.
title: Compact & Functional

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: CKDad
content: It served a good purpose for us to drive one of our Sonos speakers using Alexa.  However, every time you have a power outage or a network outage it cannot reconnect to the network.  Too much maintenance!  All of our other echo devices connect automatically.
title: Can’t reconnect to internet automatically when other echos do

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Lenox
content: Bought this to connect my Echo Glow. I was tired of going back and forth to the nearest echo to change the light color. Now I can change/turn on the light with the least expensive Echo Flex. Hate the tinney speaker sound but it works to adjust my Echo glow.
title: Used For Echo Glow. Speakers are terrible But Alexa is great!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Flamingo Starr
content: I bought this solely to be able to voice control smart plugs and smart bulbs around my house without needing to open an app. Just wanted a smaller unit that didn’t take up a lot of space. It does hear my commands from outside of the room, and it’s pretty loud when it talks.
title: Works for what I needed it for

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Veronica Rangel
content: Very good add to my house now I can use my Alexa at the garage, porch or pool love it I really recommended
title: Easy to use

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Greg Angley
content: Works ok, but really poor sound quality and tends to answer more than others higher quality devices. I keep mine in a hallway between my kitchen and living room.  A lot of times it will answer whenever I am standing in the kitchen. Kind of annoying as it is further away.  Maybe it's the acoustic properties of the hallway and location,  but the low quality device should not prioritize itself over other Alexa devices.
title: Has Alexa, sounds bad and answers too easily.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Dominique Lacey
content: I was reluctant to buy this at first, worried the sound would be poor. Its perfect! I have this in my kitchen and it loud enough to be heard while cooking. I love that its on the wall versus the Echo Dot that needs a holder or sits on a table taking up space. I will likely get one more in my bathroom
title: Sound quality is fine!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Nickie
content: Not my best Alexa product but it gets the job done. Slow on voice recognition and might have to announce twice. The sound was not good. I use it on the bathroom and if I'm on the shower can't hear the music. I connected a small Bluetooth speaker and it works.
title: For infrequent use, small spaces

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: chinnman
content: Like the form factor and the portability of the Flex. Also lobe the optional night light option I attached on bottom. I have it in my Master Bath and it’s easy to hear And speak to. It doesn’t have the best sound but all you need is to be able to hear it.
title: Practicality and Convenience in a small package

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Laura Wagner
content: I like that it plugs in the wall and I don't have to have it sitting on a table and that it was less expensive.  It doesn't seem to hear me like the other ones do.  I have to speak louder.  I don't think it filters out background noise as well as the others. I'm using it mainly to control smart devices like plugs, TV and thermostat.  It works perfectly for what I need it to do.
title: Nice to have to supplement other Alexa's

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Rich W
content: The echo flex is great for smaller rooms or a kitchen . It uses up minimal space and the speaker is good for timers and answering questions. Not really good for listening to music or audio books. It fills it's niche real nice as an add on speaker for a small area
title: Flex works great

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Always April
content: Very small and convenient and I like no wires but I won't be using this because of the sound quality.I decided that the price was too good to send back.So we travel so much and always wish we had Alexa with us but it's too much trouble before this. Now we plan on taking this wherever we go.i think it will work nicely for that
title: Hotel, Motel..Holiday inn?

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Mr & Mrs Clifford
content: What everyone is saying is true, the sound quality on this SUCKS! However I didn’t buy it for playing music, I bought it for controlling smart devices. For that purpose it fits my needs perfectly. Nice and compact, and I like the fact I can connect USB add-ons to it.
title: Does what I need it to do.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Book Mouse
content: I got this so I could listen to audible books while crafting. It works great for my purpose. The only thing I would change is how loud the volume goes. It's not quite loud enough, but I plan to solve that with a bluetooth speaker some time in the future.
title: Nice for the Price

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: G. Humphrey
content: While the speaker output is limited compared to other Alexa devices (no playing music on this device, for sure!) it has output for voice that works well.  I put it in a place that cannot really use a full sounding Alexa device however, it does work well.
title: Localized Alexa

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Pedro Lopes
content: I love the concept of no cables and having a handy echo device in some locations. But the mic on this is so weak that it can only detect a voice if we're shouting in front of the device. Even 5ft away it already fails. On both devices I got it's the same.
title: Great concept, poor execution

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: CAT MOM
content: I put this in the bathroom so I could listen to music, check time and traffic, etc. while getting ready for work each morning and it's nice to have a little nightlight if you have to get up in the middle of the night.  I can also access from my bedroom just across the hall - bonus!
title: nice!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Binkers
content: This is like a direct plugin Echo Dot gen2. I think the product would be better by making it closer to a plugin Echo Dot gen3 by improving the speaker.  It doesn’t need to have an audiophile level speaker but the current speaker has so much room to improve.
title: Basics a plugin Echo Dot gen2

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: rk
content: I like the small profile of this unit. The speaker performance is about what I would expect from a unit this small. I like the convenience of plugging it directly into the wall keeping it off of my counter, while giving me access to Alexa while in the kitchen working.
title: Performs about as expected.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Mark in Oak Cliff
content: Portability gives this device the best value for me.  I have a number of work stations/locations around the campus I oversee.  I can carry this in my computer bag and plug it in at each location . . . which keeps me reachable to the other alexa enabled devices spread through a dozen or more campus offices.  Nice and clean not needing another cable to carry around.  An earphone jack would be a nice addition for future versions.
title: Good value for price

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Turtledagain
content: It the perfect size as it does not take up counter space. It works great just like all our other echoes.
title: Great for our small kitchen

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Jen
content: This little thing is actually pretty cool. I have it in my garage and set the Guard skill as I leave and come home. If I’m outside and think of something, it’s there to add to my list. I can turn the lights on before entering, etc. it’s definitely not a music speaker but it’s loud enough to hear her answer. Nice addition to the Alexa family
title: Pretty convenient

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Bella
content: I love this mini smart speaker for Alexa. I plugged it in and it downloaded on its own it connected to my Alexa products and I placed it in my bathroom so  I can listen to Alexa and her any announcements that I need to hear. Listen to music, news, and the door when someone rings the RING.
title: This is awesome

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Matthew Nguyen
content: I mainly used the Echo Flex for Alexa Drop-In, but it is not recommended to use while listening to music. Pros: - Great design. - Easy to plug-in. - Two easy buttons for mute and Alexa voice recognition. Cons: - Terrible speaker quality for Alexa Drop-In, streaming music, and podcasts. - It does not detect your voice if you have multiple Alexas near-by. - It does not have surround sound speakers. Definitely a needed added feature.
title: Echo Flex

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: avid reader
content: Works as explained. I have the clock plug in. It’s perfect size for the half bath. It is nice when company is over, I can play soft music in there. It’s also fun, I played ocean sounds, spooky Halloween sounds etc. I can make announcements from another room, freaks out my husband. Good times.
title: Works very well for small spaces

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Candida
content: When I purchased this, I didn't know that I would have to pay an extra fee a month to sync this with my other devices for music throughout my house. Lame.
title: Somewhat disappointed..

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Mark S. West
content: Sound quality is the Flex’s largest distractor. Small tinny sound as expected but very useful in the laundry room, garage, closet, anywhere you just need Alexa’s brainpower for some quick info. Don’t expect Dolby Atmos music outta the Flex and you’ll be ok!
title: Tinny sound but hey, look, it’s Alexa in the broom closet!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: sandy fields
content: Originally I was going to return because I could not get it to set up correctly. I left feedback with Amazon and an extremely nice representative called me about my feedback and helped me with my problem. I have never had a company actually call me because I left feedback on their website. I am 100% satisfied and feel they went above and beyond.
title: Pleased 100% satisfied

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: JR
content: Better than I expected. I got it for our kitchen and it's perfect. Voice recognition is great. The speaker is stronger than I thought it would be and easily heard throughout the kitchen. Setup was a couple of minutes. I'd highly recommend it.
title: Great Device at a Great Price

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Terrisue
content: We have two. One is in the kitchen and I plug my phone in using the usb on the bottom of device. I often use as a timer or adding items to my shopping list. Works great. The other Echo flex is in my bathroom. I like listening to IHeart radio in the morning and sound is good. I wish the highest volume was louder but it works well for listening to IHeart radio. The volume isn't loud enough for me to hear if in shower. I may add a wireless speaker and problem solved. It really isn't a problem as knew before I bought it wasn't going to have the speaker sound as an Echo or Echo Show. The size is great.
title: Echo flex just the right size!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: David Pagel
content: Needs to pair via Bluetooth with a speaker, hearphones, or headphones...has a weak speaker. Works great and consistantly.  Use whereever there's wireless and an electrical outlet.  Use with a short extention cord so as not to block other outlets.
title: Great item

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: docinstl
content: 3 star reviews are like reviewing your little sister. I GUESS she's ok, sometimes... Mostly she's kind of annoying. The Echo Flex is a little cheaper than a Dot, and far worse in every way (except size). The microphone isn't nearly as good at picking up commands. The speaker is truly awful (no, I'm not using it to play music - my Sonos is for that). If you need a device this size, go ahead. If you have space for a Dot, it's much better in every way.
title: Meh...

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Andrea
content: Estaba algo decepcionada por que la instalación de mis primeros echo doy fue un problema y al final no lo conseguí pero este aparato funcionó sin necesidad de configurar me encanta tiene el volumen justo para la cocina no me quejó, lo sentí algo caliente luego de unas horas de estar conectado eso es lo único que me preocupó y por eso le doy 4 estrellas
title: Me gusto

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Nukeman86
content: Nice small form factor that plugs directly into the wall. Great if you don’t need the better speakers provided by the echo system. Like other Alexa products, it was immediately recognized by my system and worked perfectly on power up. A nice addition to the system for places that you don’t care about sound quality.
title: Great system… And no cord.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Kelly M
content: So glad I got this!  We have the plug only that came with this and plugged in a hard to get to lamp into it.  SO nice to be able to ask to have the lamp turned on without having to get up and maneuver around stuff to get to it.  Now I need more things to put with this.
title: So glad I got this!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: L.Mata
content: It’s not that loud so it’s basically a mic for Alexa that can also do motion detection and a night light if you buy the add ons. Nice USB port for maybe a needed usb in the bathroom . I use it with a Bluetooth speaker connected if I want music to be heard an added bonus of this is you can just put speaker anywhere it can still connect to flex and really the speaker problem is solved
title: An Out of the way quite Alexa

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: L. Wood
content: Love having this small one in my kitchen to add to my shopping list as needed.  Convenient and takes up such a small space
title: Small Space

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Danielle Restadius
content: I have this set up in my son’s room and for some reason it goes into do not disturb mode by itself over night and causes his alarm to not go off and all features to not work. I have checked and adjusted the do not disturb settings and free time settings and it still happens. I would not buy this again.
title: Always in do not disturb

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: AKVHutch
content: This is everything that it is claimed to be.  An echo that just plugs into the wall.  It is billed as a small speaker, which it certainly is.  We use it mostly for listening to podcasts, talk radio, & generally spoken things.  Works great for that!!
title: Great for the price

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Scott Feldman
content: Connection was very easy.  Voice commands were flawless.  The built in speaker is pretty crummy.  Don't expect much from this other than just voice conversations, it is a good intercom and you can get any Alexa info but to play music thru this is worse than the old AM radios we used to carry around 40 years ago....  AMZN improve this please.
title: Average overall.  Sound quality is inferior by far.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: M.L. Kinsey
content: Gave to mom for her bathroom night light and to control lights and Nest in her home....easy set up....light is adjustable with brightness and colors.....sound quality is not as good as the Dot.....but it works well.....very easy to understand Alexa.....
title: Works as exoected

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Ella P
content: Great to extend the voice recognition area of my big echo. Easy to setup and I set my big echo as the main speaker, so sound is great. As in the description this unit it built to be linked to an alternate speaker. The speaker in it is ok at best.
title: Great to extend the voice recognition of my big echo

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Just me
content: I'm honestly not that impressed with this item 50/50 sound quality is a no go,finally just connected to a bluetooth speaker so I could hear it clearly. I will say if only needing it for turning things on/off or adding to a list it's ok for that.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Rolymiller
content: I've wanted Alexa in my garage, but didn't want to purchase a Dot for the little I use it. Along came the Flex and it's perfect. The audio is not that of other Echo devices, but it's not intended to be. It's a new option for those rooms or areas where you want Alexa but not spend so much money. It's the perfect solution and I'm very pleased with it.
title: Perfect, less expensive Dot alternative

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Anonymous
content: Picked this up on Prime Day for only $9.99.  This little device works very well, better than my other full-size echo devices.  I would have gotten more had I known this little device can recognize voice much better than my other Echo devices!
title: This little device works very well!!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Vincent DeJong
content: I am new to smart home but now have Alexa in all the rooms .  I can call one room from another with no problems.  i can control fans and lights from any room for the whole house if I want to.  I don't know what took me so long to get started.
title: Very easy to use connected within minutes.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: I. T. Chew
content: Easy to setup.  Works as expected.  As everyone noted, don't expect audio excellence.  That is OK since this was used in the kitchen.  Got it originally for under $20 at Amazon.  Should have gotten more since price is now in the $25 range.
title: It does what Echo is suppose to do

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Bubballoso
content: installed simply and integrated with motion sensors. I was even able to make it's speaker use my other alexa device which has better sound for music. Now my foyer light automatically goes on when I walk by the foyer at a certain time after sundown.
title: it's all good.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Lance Dean
content: Great add on for small rooms to help control your systems and home automation. The built-in speaker is not expected to have great sound but as a way to communicate. I have mine set up on the deck so I can control my speakers and sound systems or to control my security system. It works great for those purposes or even maybe in the laundry room
title: Great for patio, laundry room, basements, etc.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Richard Reynolds
content: I wouldn't want to listen to music on a Flex however all the other functionality is in this box the size of a pack of cigarettes. Now when my wife or I come home, we can announce to the house to come help unload groceries.  Add a smart switch and  motion detector and your garage will turn on the light when you drive in.
title: Echo in the garage? You betcha!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Edgar Mendez
content: The Echo flex is quite usefull in areas of a home you necessarily do not spend much time in. Halways,garage etc. Very useful,controling other devices sound quality is not at best, but it is enough to get the job done. Ladies, the echo Flex is the perfect companion to get your groove on when spending hours putting on make-up in the bathroom.
title: Must have an existing Echo-Dot to connect to.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: fryque
content: I got this because I wanted an Alexa extension. Not because I wanted to download apps to a phone that I do not have or use. I have spent some time on the help page but no help on using the device without a phone. NOT GOING TO DO THE PHONE THING!!!
title: I got this because I wanted an Alexa extension.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Bloke
content: I figured the Flex would be perfect  to control in wall speakers in my bathroom via Bluetooth. Perfect when one is soaking in the tub. The Flex was easy to set up and fits nicely. Alas it can’t hear me very well while the music is playing very loud, so I have to yell at times. Perhaps better mic pickup for the next version.
title: Control music while in the tub

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Bonnie Woodberry
content: My daughter-in-law bought two of these for me. One works fine, the other doesn’t work at all. To be sure, I tried it in two outlets. My only complaint is that I’ve not been able to get the sound loud enough to hear it distinctly across my kitchen.
title: Okay

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Rev. Dr. Christopher Robert Archer, DD, NRP
content: Crap to get setup, stuck in update mode for 1hr+, has to call support to get that corrected, the sound quality on an 80's Walkman is better than the sound that this device produces.  I advise everyone to stay away from this device at any price point other than free.
title: Back Away from the device

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Robert A
content: I installed 3 smart bulbs above the medicine cabinet in the bathroom installed the Flex inside the bathroom with the motion sensor. Set a route to have the lights come on when motion is detected. Then turn them off after no motion for 5 minutes. Love it now the kids can’t leave the lights on forever. The fan and its light is a a separate switch that works independently for using the shower.
title: Very handy device to have with the motion sensor

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Di
content: I have regular echo that is great! The echo flex is awful. The voice of Alexa is tinnie. The voice sounds like it is in a tin can. Don’t buy the echo flex get the little round echo. I didn’t plug in till a month after buying I wish I could send it back!!!!!
title: Bad

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Yolanda
content: So for the price I should’ve expected this but the sound is very, very low and grainy! I plugged it in to the kitchen wall and couldn’t even hear it over me washing dishes.. I love Amazon echos so I would get the dot for a few more dollars over this..
title: Sound too low

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Queen Bee
content: It seems less useful than the other echo devices that I have. I bought the motion sensor and later found that the sun from the window in the room negatively effects the motion function. It is perfect for listening to music while in the room or asking quick questions however, compared to an echo dot- not quite the same range of functionality.
title: Good product but not an Echo dot

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: 5MIN2GG
content: Would it really cost you a fortune to put a decent speaker in this? Seriously... it's 2020. Why are you using junky piezio speakers in this? Sounds like crap, very quiet too. Can't hear it most of the time. Save your money and buy a dot instead.
title: Terrible sound quality

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: BASHAH.LLC
content: its very convenient to have a plug in echo. its a great choice for garage and basement where you done have a formal table to house the devise. the only issue is the speaker is very weak and you can barely hear it. otherwise it is a great gadget.
title: plug in is a great concept. speaker is bad

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Russell T.
content: Overall just a basic "Alexa" device. Great for a bathroom but subpar to even the earliest echo dot. Speaker is like that of a walkie-talkie. Definitely not something you would use to listen to even an audio book on. Basic things like timers and Alexa responses is about all that would be tolerable. Haven't tried the motion sensor or nightlight but those accessories might bring more to this.
title: Good enough for timers and basic "Alexa" responses

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Tonya Hatchel
content: I love the ease of this device. I use it in my bathroom and though the sound quality isn’t *top notch* - it’s good enough. It’s perfect for your bathroom or garage or hallway. I have the attached night light for it and I just love it. I will be purchasing another with the motion detector next!
title: Great for garage or bathroom!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: MoH
content: Sound quality is not that great but what else can be expected for this really small and smart device.  I have attached it to an external speakers and it’s working extremely well.  Microphone works fine from the distance and recognizes the voice.
title: Flex is Tiny and Flexible and still smart!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Riley
content: The sound quality could be better, but is as expected from such a small device. I have no use for the motion detection and have nothing to say on that subject. The most convenient feature of the device is the USB plug as my family was always unplugging my Dot to use the micro USB charger. The Flex allows me to plug a charging cable into the bottom and encourage the family to keep Alexa plugged in. My only complaint is that this device doesn't have a dedicated volume rocker, call me old fashioned, but I still like to control the volume by button.
title: Volume Control by Voice or App

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: shampain
content: Great little product. All the function as an echo without the wires and size. The sound is whatever, but i didnt buy it to listen to music or anything.  Just for controlling my lights and sending announcements while in the garage. Perfect for my needs A+
title: Great price, great product

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Thomas Bloxham
content: This product was easy to connect to the house system and it tells me when there is movement in the installed room. I like everything about it but the sound quality is lacking. Maybe since I have Echo and Echo Dot I am spoiled by the sound quality of these.
title: Work well with whole house system

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: da kling
content: The Flex works good for voice activation of smart home devices and for general inquiries. Unfortunately the Alexa motion sensor routine notifications have long delays and the sense no motion feature has stopped working after they updated the APP..
title: Good luck with routines

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: pinwheelsunshine
content: This is a great little device to issue commands for my smart home. I can't believe people are complaining about the audio quality. It's not for music. You can hear Alexa's speaking voice just fine. Come on, people. Of course it's not for music.
title: Great for bathroom

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Old Phule
content: Can’t really go into detail for this item as it was purchased primarily to provide a source of sound to the outside Christmas lights so they would flash in time with the music. By itself the sound is poor - like a very tinny speaker but you can incorporate an addition speaker either by cable or by Bluetooth. By the way, it is not weatherproof so when used outside it’s in a dry environment. Pleased with the product.
title: Portable Alexa

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: R. Rasmussen
content: We would open the door and yell into the house to get Alexa to do our bidding. I found this pared down version that fits the bill. Setup was as simple as plugging it and following prompts. A small thing but it makes home operation much simpler.
title: Superb for the garage!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Mtnman
content: I find the lights annoying next to impossible to turn off, setup gave zero directions in alexa, will probably just unplug at night, maybe return. It has a lot of capabilities, just no idea how to make it work. Should be easy to turn lights off.
title: Difficult setup.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Aaron Corbitt
content: Wish it had more addons and features. And a nightlight/motion sensor combo would be nice. Wish the hue bulbs that they option with them weren't so dim or warm and I guess as they say.. the two pack Hue bulbs are half as bright as the regular white ambience lights...
title: Nice little addition for every smarthome..

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: gb hicks
content: The room to room feature doesn't work very well, where you have music playing in all rooms? The audio during music isn't great, and i wish when i spoke to it, it would answer on all the units instead of trying to figure out which one is the right unit to respond from.
title: good for what it is

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Silhouett
content: This unit works fine but the sound quality is very poor but the price is exceptional.  Of course it requires you have a Alexa somewhere and it will work with zones or everywhere for music. it pretty much is a remote access of an existing unit.
title: Good to have in a unique spot

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Jennifer Champoux
content: It's handy for being a timer in my kitchen when I'm baking or want to hear some music while cooking. That being said, it's 'tinny' sounding, the sound quality is not good at all....which surprises me to be honest. I will keep them just so I don't have to yell upstairs to my Dot to start/stop/restart a timer.
title: It's functional

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Chris P.
content: This has the worst audio quality of any Alex device I've heard. It's tinny and almost inaudible. I like that is has expansion - I use the motion sensor - maybe they'll make an expansion that can output decent audio. Overall, useful for the mics and expansion capability - the audio output is very disappointing.
title: I wanted to like this, but the audio is terrible

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: YnnamofTX
content: This echo flex is quite ok but not that great sound, but still when Alexa is being called it readily gives what you wanted, any command is just like the big brother. But even though the sound is not that great as the Echo plus, I still like it.
title: Echo Flex

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: DivaB
content: Big fan of these little guys. I have 1 in both bathrooms and 1 in the kitchen.  All 3 are connected to bluetooth speakers in each of those room. Getting everything to work properly was super easy in the alexa app. ...ans these connect flawless to bluetooth speakers
title: Love these little things!!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Indymom
content: We wanted it for the bathroom for our son after his doctor recommended it.  It worked  wonderfully for us.  Yes, the sound quality is bad. What do you expect for the price?  But my son can't hear that well and on volume 8 he can hear it fine.
title: Great for what we wanted

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: C. Hurdle
content: I bought this for my daughter's room so that I wouldn't have to constantly yell upstairs to ask her questions or tell her dinner is ready. I use the drop in feature and while she can hear me, I can't hear her half the time unless she yells. It's like the mic does not pick up her voice very well.
title: Disappointed

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: JimmyL
content: This is a nice compact plug-in Alexa device. The sound quality is not very good, but you should expect that. It has a tiny speaker so it good enough for generic voice prompts. Pair it with a good bluetooth speaker and it's a great, inexpensive Alexa speaker.
title: Convenient Alexa device, level-set your expectation

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Tuesdee P Williams
content: This little thing is quite powerful.  I have it in my girls bathroom and they can both hear her when the alarm goes off or when I send my mom message for them to get out the bathroom.  Lol.  It does everything a real echo does which I also have and love.
title: Great Little Giant

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Richard R
content: This is an affordable, low sound quality echo flex, mainly used to drop in on guests in another room (kids playing) and adding items to my shopping list(s), etc. Be mindful this is not for music playing. The optional night light and motion detectors are fantastic!
title: easy SIMPLE echo

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Philly Prep
content: This is a great solution for our baby's nursery especially because of the nightlight attachment. We also use it to connect with our lamp which is connected to a smart plug. The sound quality is poor but then again it's not a speaker. However, it does a fine job for quick songs during diaper changes or if we need to know the weather when getting the baby dressed.
title: Serves its purpose

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Greg W
content: An excellent product using Amazon wireless technology.  I attached a sensor and use it as a night light in there hall upstairs. It can change the color of the light it displays,  the brightness, and many other things.  Is a real value for the money
title: Good way to integrate Alexa into my home

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Tony R
content: I received this free with my Echo Show. I don’t know what to use it for but it’s next to my master bath to play some music. The sound is terrible and cranking the volume up all the way just distorts everything. Maybe someone has a reason for this.
title: It was free

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: C. Moore
content: I will have to say that with such a small device the sound is pretty good, I’ve got it in my basement so laundry day won’t be so lonely, I’ve got my house all smarted up, bulbs, devices, plugs, even the auto set, Alexa in my car, I’m very happy with this one!
title: Alexa plug! Gotta love it...

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: thatCC_girl
content: This thing is amazing if you have kids and a larger home. We bought 2 flex’s during prime days or whatever it’s called and use them as intercoms since we have 3 floors. You can play music through them but the sound quality is extremely poor.
title: Great but sound quality lacks

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: JD Toler
content: I have several echo dots throughout my home. I thought I would give this a try. I was very disappointed. It does not do a great job of hearing me. The sound is abysmal. I ended up giving this to my niece to use in her nursery to tell bedtime stories to her little boy. I’m sticking with the dot.
title: Disappointed

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Rachel G
content: I got this to put in the bedroom so I could control the lights, and it definitely does a great job. I was surprised it would actually talk as well. It can say basic Alexa things, like the weather or even read notifications. It doesn't play music, but I think it's a great value if you don't want to spend money to put another echo or bigger device in every room. It also has a great USB port at the bottom you can use to charge your phone or other device.
title: Does the job

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: kitty64
content: Overall I like this product.  Not happy with the sound or speaker though.  I do like it though. I would tell all my friends and family.  Do not expect much from the sound quality for music though.  If you can get beyond that, it works great.  The volume does not go loud enough in bathroom to hear well in the shower.
title: Great value.  Quick and easy set-up.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: AS
content: I like that this is a lower cost alternative to the Dot. It’s become my household intercom system. I also like that it plugs into the wall therefor I don’t need to worry about having a shelf to place it upon. I am not a fan of the sound quality. When volume is maxed out, it’s scratchy
title: Decent cheaper alt to the Dot, poor sound quality on max

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Dzotte
content: Love the ease of just plugging the unit into an outlet, no wires... It responds quickly and easily to commands. The sound, for music, is not nearly as nice as the dot but the convenience of the flex is worth the price for an additional Alexa
title: I really like it

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Bryan
content: I bought this because sometimes my echo dot, in the living room, doesn't hear my commands from the bedroom. Considering the price on Amazon deal day, which included a smart plug, I am very satisfied. I didn't expect much with regard to sound quality, which is the only improvement I would recommend.
title: Good product but don't buy it for the sound quality

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: BMAK
content: I love the night light adapter and motion sensor option.  I keep mine in the kitchen where the nightlight offers light late at night, sound is not the greatest so i wouldnt recommend it for sound quality but it pairs nicely with my other echos.  Also like that with motion sensor adapter i am notified when away from home if motion is detected.  Well worth the price if combining it with the sensor or nightlight.
title: Useful little gadget.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Eugene
content: Great product for the price. Has a little issue with voice recognition but that’s to be expected because of the price point.
title: Great little product for the price

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: name not provided
content: What a great concept! What disappointing execution :( Maximum volume is far, far too low fur anything but a very quiet room -> NOT PRACTICAL! Even my cellphone,  on batter's (not 120v) is 2-3 louder on max volume.
title: Maximum volume is far, far too low fur anything but a very quiet room

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Andrew Brown
content: This is a interesting product. I really enjoy Alexa, however this one not as much. The sound quality is horrible! Pro: if you have a space in your house you need to be able to give commands to other smart objects. Cons: sound is super bad
title: Just get a Dot

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Bennie Sexton
content: The biggest issue I have with the Echo Flex is that the microphone in it is incredibly sensitive. Despite the fact that it only has one microphone,  it will at times answer through walls before the Echo 3rd generation that is 5 feet away answers. I eventually changed the wakeup word to get around the issue. An adjustment for sensitivity would be most welcomed on this device. Other than this issue it works as well as any other Echo. The speaker is tiny and doesn't put out much power. I bought one for each bathroom. It works well in there.
title: Echo Flex microphone is very sensitive.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: William A. Bennett
content: Unit is great for what I need it for. Controlling basement WiFi controlled lights. Sound quality is like an old a.m. radio with built in speaker. I gave it 5 stars for audio because this is a small plug in unit and can’t expect high quality sound from a small unit, with a small speaker. I do connect it via the head phone jack and connected to an old stereo receiver and sounds awesome.
title: Great little echo....

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: wendy
content: I love the echo flex! I bought several of them for the kids rooms. It’s so nice not to have to shout upstairs anymore! The only thing I wish is that the volume would go up higher because it’s hard to hear sometimes, even with it turned all the way up.
title: Great for multiple kids rooms!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: SD787
content: Got for use by vanity in bathrooms. Sound is small, tinny due to very small speaker. Does not compare at all in sound quality to other echo products and should be priced less than it is. Regardless,  the Flex is exactly as I expected and fits my use case.
title: Best Use Case: Small Room

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: J. Goodnight
content: Audio quality is very poor. I added a Bluetooth speaker (which took an inordinate amount of time) and now Alexa comes through loud and clear. Otherwise, a neat accessory where your primary Alexa can't hear you (as in downstairs/upstairs).
title: Fairly easy to set up

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Luke J. Heller
content: Over the start of the weekend I had appendicitis and had no idea.  As the hours drug on I asked Alexa what were the symptoms of appendicitis and its progression.  Alexa nailed everything right and I drove myself to the Hospital just before my appendix may have burst in me.  Thank you, Alexa Designers!!!!
title: Works Great and Saved My Life!!!!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Jenn
content: I LOVE my Echo!!! It's the cutest thing ever!!! One in the garage with me, one in the kitchen and one in the hallway.  Great sound quality. And because it's a plug in, completely out of the way. No more shouting thru out the house. Can listen to music while cooking, play games, etc.  Economical and efficient and compact.  Worth buying!!!
title: Echo Echo Echo!!!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Wrecklessme107
content: I didn’t expect or realize after all this time that this small thing can do a lot for me.  i thought it is just a ate of money to buy such things but no! With a simple command I get to hear the news, songs that i love.  I am so happy I have this.  It is now in my room and I have ordered the smart bulbs and other items that goes with it.  I owe it all to the Prime Day Deal!  Glad I bought them!
title: Things get done so quickly with EchoFlex

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Te54636
content: I think its a great little Alexa. The voice is clear as my Echo Dots. The night light is a great addition to the flex and having a range of colors you can just ask it to change is great. Amazon did a great job with this item. For as small as it is, I think the speaker is fine for music
title: Its a great little Alexa

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Blitz Krieg
content: Inexpensive and works as well as as my other devices.  Perfect for an extra in the garage.  Speaker isn't  the best but it isn't supposed to be and you can plug in a separate speaker if you really need concert sound.  Great extra device.
title: Works great, perfect for an extra.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: cksmeeth
content: My biggest issues are sound quality and the inability to have a light, motion and clock in one. We wanted a night light that came on with motion. The clock would be an added bonus, but not a deal breaker. Put motion in the nightlight attachment Yall...
title: Limited sound quality, as expected, but limited additional device integration needs improvement.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Robert S. Hackley
content: Yeah, the sound isn’t as good as the other Echos but I don’t care. I stuck it in the guest room/ home office and it works perfectly for my needs. I can do everything a Dot or Echo does and I can still listen to the radio (sounds like a portable one from my days as a a youth!).
title: Great for an extra Echo; tinny sound— so what?!?

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Christin
content: Wow! I thought this would just work as an "extension" of my echo dot, like if I ask to play a song it'd play from both units, but it's like having a whole other dot! I have the Show and two dots at my house, and if I'd known I could have just had the Show and three of these, I'd have gotten them in the first place! Love it!
title: Surprisingly Awesome!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Victoria Heckman
