content: Although the quality of speaker is not as good as the Echo Dot, the plug in mini works great in areas (such as the bathroom) where you don't  want to have dangling chords.  The plug in mini seems to pick up voice commands better than the Echo Dot.
title: No dangling chords with the mini plug in

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Nanci T.
content: The Echo Flex is perfect to plug in to a bathroom or a kitchen - any small room where she can tell you the news, divide a recipe, or even let you know about weather conditions.  She takes up no more space than a plugged-in nightlight and brings all the convenience of Alexa. She doesn’t have the sound quality of a full concert orchestra, but why should she?
title: Perfect small space addition

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Media Mogul
content: I have had no problems with it so far (2 months). I just plugged it into the wall in our master bath and it worked. There was no setup required - not sure if that's because we already have several echo devices setup in the house or not.
title: Plug and Play

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Mango Ramekin
content: I have got this plugged into the bathroom, hooked up with a Bluetooth speaker and it works great for its purpose. Perfect for listening to music while in shower. It is also perfect for emergencies using the announcement feature. I can just say "make announcement" and the whole house can hear me on my other Echo devices.
title: Perfect for the bathroom or garage since it plugs in

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: J.W.
content: I'm using this in the bathroom.  It's nice for playing the news, asking the weather, telling time, etc.  I really, really like the night light add-on feature.  Very pleased with this purchase.  I would recommend to anyone who uses Echo.
title: Nice Little Gadget

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: JJ
content: Since my kids are upstairs, it's very useful to save my voice and have Alexa "announce" than yell.  :)  Also the app allows me to "announce" vs texting my kids when I am out. Worth the money.  If you are looking to use with music, I would get the next level up.  The speaker is just fine.  I am good.
title: Small and Practical  Nothing Fancy

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Tye
content: I love my Alexa she is perfect for my dorm room! I have a Google Home, but it just will not connect to the university’s network. The Flex was the perfect alternative. It functions as a great alarm clock and sometimes it’s fun to listen to a little music while I clean.(The speaker isn’t quality, but it is still audible.) A month or so later and I really do love it. I’ve brought one and connected to a speaker via aux cable and haven’t had a problem. It’s really a great bang for your buck.
title: Depends on what you are looking for...

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: DazzBoomer
content: It is a great little addition to my Amazon echo. It adds an additional smaller version of the echo to another room to expand the coverage. Which is really nice when you have other lights and plugs going throughout your home that you need to you have access to echo to be able to operate those lights and plugs with. I couldn't ask for anything better than my Amazon echo and the echo flex. Great combination and I highly recommend it to anyone that wants to make their life more simplified!
title: Great way to expand the coverage of the Amazon echo!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Razz Man
content: A little hard on the programming side, and I think it’s still not there yet. I used to trigger a Wemo switch. The programming was a little persnickety as was the interface, but it worked. Who’s idea was it to call this a “speaker”?  Hahaha.
title: Needs some interface refinement

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: J. Sohalski
content: I used this in a hallway and it is perfect.  I use it mainly for turning on lights or dropping in when I am working between rooms upstairs.  I wouldn't recommend it as your only device for listening to music, but it is great for those "in between" places where you might want to have access to Alexa.
title: Great for a hallway

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Lloyd McDaniel
content: Got a decent price on a couple of these, no complaints there. Thy listen well and for voice answers are great but I've had transistor radios with better sound. I paired with cheap bluetooth speakers. Your mileage may differ.
title: does what it is supposed to but ouch the sound sucks.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Nick Wells
content: These are perfect for my garage. After pulling in I just say close the garage now and boom. It is small and can play music and do whatever. But I just don’t do a lot of hanging out I the garage, but did need Alexa there. These are perfect for those spots where Alexa is sometimes needed
title: Great addition for Smart home areas

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Cody Rhoades
content: Easy to set up. Done in seconds. Installed in my kitchen to be able to set timers ask cooking/baking questions without having to yell to the next room or have my kids run into the next room to ask my other Alexa device. Works as intended and described. Just the reason I bought it for.
title: Works as designed- easy to install.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: C. Everest
content: This little machine, by far, surpassed my expectations.  I purchased 4 of them for small areas of my home, i.e. bathrooms, laundry room.  I wouldn't use it for a large room, the little speaker can only give so much, but is perfect for smaller rooms/areas.  Money well spent !
title: A lot of power for a little price.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: susan
content: What's not to like about this. I got two plus I also have two echo dots. One being first generation an now a third generstion. There is not a day I don't use them. Have tell or joke or song you a song. I promise it will make you smile.
title: They are fun an really helpful👍😉

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: WilliamT
content: Overall it is disappointing. It does not have enough sound and the quality of the sound is poor. It is like a speaker from the 80's with zero depth and minimal quality. For the price just skip it and size up to a Dot with a wall mount.
title: Tinny sound and not much sound-skip it and get the larger size dot with a wall mount

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: scot stern
content: Great for a bathroom or some other small area.  Good  reception and seems to work well.
title: Small size fits anywhere

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Mist99
content: Love this little alexia. I put it in my bathroom & I use it to listen to music or pod cast while I get ready. Sound quality isn’t as good as the main alexia, but it’s great for what I use it for. It was so easy & fast to connect & I haven’t had any issues with voice recognition.
title: Perfect addition to the alexia without using counter space.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Crystal
content: I purchased three of these during the Cyber Monday sale. I can honestly say they have yet to disappoint. I have family members with chronic health conditions who sometimes have emergencies or and require aid. I have placed these plugs in the restrooms and hallways throughout the house so that my relatives can call for help anywhere they are.  The voice recognition has a fantastic range.
title: Makes my home safe 👍

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Az
content: Though the technology used behind the scenes is the same, you’ll have to yell to make this echoflex listen to you, and still pray you get lucky. With echodot, you can be facing anywhere, and ask a question.  With flex, you have to be in the line of sight so you maximize the chance of your voice reaching the tiny mic, and if properly listened to, the response coming out won’t be loud enough (echodot is a lot better).  The only plus side is the footprint - you can just plug it in anywhere.
title: Pales in comparison to Echodot

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Gregory O.
content: I put one of these in each bathroom so I could have access to Alexa while grooming.  The sound is terrible only because it is very small and, respectively, so is the speaker.  You are able to attach an optional speaker which would address the sound.  Note that it does not come with motion detection or night light; they are "optional."
title: Good for "optional" locations around the home

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Michael Wiggins
content: This is perfect... I put this in my bathroom and paired it with a waterproof speaker.  Now I have Alexa in every room of my home, and I can listen to music in the shower effortlessly.  It’s adding to the range and abilities of my smart home.
title: Now she’s in my bathroom...

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: debbie jones
content: I bought the Echo Flex plug in for my kitchen.  It is so great.  I can hear it just fine and it does turn up alot.  I bought another for my home office.  They are compact and respond to my voice without yelling.  Great product.  I love it.
title: I love it!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Todd Sloan
content: Excellent little item for your bathroom. I use it while I'm in the shower to get traffic and weather reports for the day. Also a little music. I didn't expect concert quality sound so I was satisfied with the clarity of the sound for the small size.
title: Fast shipping

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Jared S.
content: This is a great addition to the Alexa family. I have it in the bathroom. It can recognize my voice when I ask a question during a shower. But it's hard to hear, even all the highest volume. I recommend using a bluetooth speaker if you want to play music from it.
title: Love Alexa Products

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Mobi
content: I bought this for my kitchen because my 1st gen echo dot had a hard time hearing me all the time from the living room. I thought about getting one of those mounts for the dot but didn't care for how big everything was. This flex is more compact and looks
title: A good item to fill the dead areas in your home where Alexa can't hear you well.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: W. Design
content: Wow I would return this device but.... the sound quality is abysmal. It won’t hear you unless your looking at when you speak. The speaker is lower quality than your 80’s mobile speaker phone. It’s bad and get any other Alexa device.
title: Bad recognition, Horrible speaker.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Blake
content: If you have a big bathroom, don’t expect this to be a great purchase if the intention is to listen to music while in the shower. — I’ve got a small bathroom and it works nicely! This item was VERY easy to set up. All I did was plug it in, and in under a minute it automatically set itself up and connected to my main Alexa hub.
title: Very neat item!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Rae G.
content: I got this for my bathroom. The sound is loud clear and crisp. I got it to use as a timer when I do facial masks ,make a quick call etc. I love that it doesn't take up counter space. I just don't think you can have too many Alexas. .
title: Another Alexa..why not?

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Brian Warthen
content: I got this with the intention of connecting it (wired) to a larger powered speaker that  happened to have lying around and it works great for that. The internal speaker is small and weak, it's good enough to hear responses to voice commands and maybe to listen to the news if you're close enough.
title: Works well for it's intended purpose

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Julie Groth
content: I love having an extra Echo device and love that it has a USB plug.  Wish it had 2.  The only problem is that you can’t turn the volume up like on a dot or echo. It will hear you from the next room though. She’s just hard to hear sometimes.
title: Great to have!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Amazon User
content: I placed this is a guest bedroom.  I like that it doesn’t take up bureau space.  I paired it with lighting and added the plug in clock.  Everything works perfectly.  The speaker is a little tinny, but serves the purpose.  The price was very reasonable.
title: Good for smaller rooms

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Monca27
content: I bought this to my kids could listen to music in the bathroom and I could tell them when. It’s time to get out, or set a timer for them. This works great for my needs. The sound quality isn’t at good as a tap but definitely works.
title: Works

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Christine D.
content: Just what I needed in the kitchen to announce dinner is ready to my kids echos in their rooms. No more yelling down the hallway. The speaker is not the best, but it a very small model. Its not good for listening to music, but good for communication.
title: Just what I needed!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Larry Gibson
content: Required a phone call to a tech to resolve location issues (2 homes in 2 states w/multiple devices on one account).  Was told “can’t happen” but ... After 45 minutes and a lot of mistrials out suddenly began to work - neither of us knows why. Bottom line: small, easy to use, like the extra USB port... terrible speaker.
title: Cheap extension of Alexa, but limited

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Andy Nelson
content: The volume is poor  because it has a tiny speaker,  I bought it thinking I could pair it with my dot for surround sound  in the garage and found out it wont do that ,  but it does have a plug in the bottom so can use that to charge my cell phone, I put it in my bedroom and use it for an alarm and works pretty well for that
title: dont know about the motion control.  didnt know it had that

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Theemega
content: For the price, I suppose it is adequate. However, it has great difficulty pairing with any Bluetooth devices in my home and my other Echo devices do not. It also will only recognize you are speaking to it if you are basically yelling at it from less than 3 ft away. Spend a little more, get a better echo. Unless you are putting this in a tiny room that is very quiet, I do not recommend.
title: Disappointed.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: TJ Just
content: It works well, REALLY easy to set up use. The speaker is weak but it isn't a big plug in so you cannot expect much. My only real complaint is I cannot set up the "wake" word. It doesn't come up to do so, I believe it is suppose to.
title: You can't ask for much in a small package.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: PaigeCatherine
content: I got two on a prime deal amazon was doing. sound quality isn't really that great, but i specifically got it for the use of alexa in a guest room/office only. I knew we wouldn’t be needing it for music playback. I use it mainly for turning on/off my lights and lists purposes when i happen to be in that room. Cheap. Works great. I hope they manage in future models to perfect the size of it to something more compressed &sleek, or less boxy.
title: Perfect for alexa utility

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Rodney Sizemore
content: Was expecting so much more.... Guess I had high expectations since it's an Amazon Alexa product. Barely could hear the voice and the sound quality is awful. Hopefully they reconfigure it with better sound quality soon.
title: Not what I expected

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: SB
content: I love the Echo Flex, I use it in the hallway, it fills in the space between my Echo dots. I can ask it to turn on or off lights as I go down the hall ...  And it’s out of the way because it’s plugged into the wall, no table needed!
title: An addition to your smart home!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Ruben C.
content: I like the size and versatility, combined with the low price of $18. What I didn’t like was the volume is around 60db. For a small space it’s not bad but dots are way more louder. I would recommend this in places where you want Alexa active but not for Amazon music
title: Good but needs a more powerful speaker

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Destinee
content: We did not realize how helpful Alexa can be. I always lose my phone and have to use my computer to get ahold of someone to call it for me. I don’t have to worry about that anymore. I am extremely forgetful and have a busy school schedule on top of motherhood so appointments and reminders help me big time!
title: Best item for mom/school life

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Rob
content: This is perfect to have in a location that you want to control lights or other smart home devices as you walk in the door. I ha r one in the garage and one in my shop to control lighting and the home monitor. Easy install, decent size and great voice recognition. Like many others have stated, this is not designed to play music. Overall very satisfied with the new addition to the echo lineup!
title: Echo has done it again. A+++

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Robert
content: I had higher hopes for this piece as I needed it for a covered patio area. The microphone isnt very good And it doesn’t recognized my voice very well and it volume is very loud. Really better used for small spaces Like a garage or bathroom.
title: It only good for a garage patio or other under used space

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: mikey41
content: This was really easy to set up. It quickly found my network and integrated itself. Like other echo devices it recognizes my commands with no problem. I have the light and motion sensor too and both work great. I love the ease of being able to simply plug this into an outlet with no associated wire.
title: I like it!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: TexasTheresa
content: This does exactly what it says it’s going to do. Set up was easy. It interfaces with my Echo in the other room perfectly. I use it in a back bedroom where I can use a quiet voice. I have not tried using an external speaker—the small built-in speaker suits my needs just fine (weather, turning lights on and off, timer, and alarm).
title: The perfect addition to my Alexa family

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: WWM
content: Great for a bluetooth speaker in harsh environments.  I have it in my garage and paired with a waterproof bluetooth speaker and it works great.
title: Great for a bluetooth speaker in harsh environments

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Bunny Momma🌸
content: I have it in my bathroom just to ask Alexa to quickly turn on/off my ac’s and lights. I wanted to use it as a speaker but it’s not loud enough to hear properly over my shower, but that’s okay I can still use her for my other needs
title: Fits in my bathroom outlet and does as expected

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Jason Dunn
content: the sound quality is definately worse than a Dot, but that not what its for right? does what it needs to add home automation to another room at a better price than a dot (got this and a smart bulb on prime day for 10$, can;t beat that deal).
title: fills out the house

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: sue cantrell
content: I have Echo Dots grouped through the house for music.  Wanted something in the bathroom which plugged directly into the wall.  Music quality is fair, but the Flex linked fine with the Echos.  I'll connect an external speaker at some point.
title: Voice recognition is good

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Melissa Taylor
content: I placed them in my bathrooms as the dot didn't seem sensible to hang near water! 😂 they serve their purpose, as do my other Alexa devices. They, to me, work fine once they are placed appropriately and for a specific purpose, mine being a presence in the bathroom. If you are looking for stereo sound, I suggest pairing it with a bluetooth speaker.
title: Suits my purpose.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Penny McCardle
content: Works great does everything the dot does and then a little more it quite but that's an easy fix with just a nice bluetooth speaker I also have the light for it and was able to set time for on and off so my buno dont get stepped on. Perfect and loving it
title: Perfect

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: katherineland
content: Don't waste your money on this, just get the Dot instead. The speaker quality is so poor even listening to podcasts is a bummer and dont even try to play music. Won't connect to my echo show, and doesn't connect to any accounts (YouTube, spotify etc.) Basically it's only good for asking questions.
title: Meh..

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Bailey
content: I bought these on prime day at an amazing price. It helps you contact alexa from rooms in witch you don't have a echo or a echo show or tablet or somthing.... I love it, I can now reach Alexander from the basement or my closets.
title: Love my smart house, you should try it

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: SAMANTHA
content: I had higher Hope's because we LOVE Alexa. Shes basically become part of the family. I got this one for the nursery and disappointed. Sometimes she'll randomly stop and disconnect. Her volume is weird and sounds kinda like its playing a record. Itll work for nap times but they have some kinks to work out still.
title: Has some kinks

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: JohnMac
content: Yes the sound is weak and tinny, nut in a bathroom and basement area they are great.  For voice commands, smart home functions, even drop-in sessions.  If ya want quality sound, just pair it with a Bluetooth speaker when needed.
title: Great for its intended use

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Jokc
content: I've got two of these, I expected a better microphone set up on this device given the price, why exactly is this $30? If I've got to scream at it! I do like the motion add on but that $45 price tag was a little steep for such a weak device.
title: Convenient for small places

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Annjanett Navas
content: I like that this does not need a holder. It just stays out at the electrical outlet.  The sound however needs improvement.  I am having a tough time hearing it from across my kitchen.  Echo door had better sound and i can even play music with more volume and much better sound quality
title: Sound needs improvement

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Glen Mullen
content: Have this outside my 5 yo kids room paired with the motion sensor.  Motion will trigger one ceiling mount hue light so she can see her way when she wakes in the middle of the night.  I like how you can set a time frame for this routine to work so that the light isn’t being turned on during daytime hours.  it’s also an inexpensive way to keep Alexa with in ear shot to control smart home devices.
title: Great for controlling smart home devices

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Bryan McIntyre
content: Makes it nice for places limited by space. Adding the motion detector or night light makes this very useful
title: Works great and a space saver

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Michael O'Hair
content: This is the perfect device for our garage.  We at first didn’t know if we would use often, but we use it daily. Setting our Alarm System when we leave or disarming as we come home. As an intercom, it is the little device that is perfect and we didn’t know it till we activated it!
title: It is the perfect little device, you didn’t know you needed till you activated it!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Richard W. Koscierzynski
content: This is a great idea.  Now I have Alexa in any room I want.  However, the best idea was the addition of the motion sensor.  Now the light turns on when I enter my office.  I hook up a blue tooth speaker so the sound is actually great.
title: This is a great idea especially with the motion sensor.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: kim l fry
content: I got the Flex a day before it was listed to come in and it very eased to use all I have to do was pull it out of the box and plug it in and it logs on to the network and up and running that quick I recommend it to anyone
title: Echo-flex

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Quintin Xavier
content: I should have just gotten another dot. I thought this would be great to use as an extra set of ears in big rooms so we wouldnt have to scream alexa.  Doesn't always pick up. I think my main issue would be resolved with a LOOP instead.
title: Did I need this?

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: AmazoPau L
content: What can I say? Echo Flex another amazing feature from Amazon. Placed on my kitchen counter for up-close use when needed. Easy set up within minutes with an excellent price! My only issue is the volume even when set on high is somewhat inadequate at times.
title: Excellent Value

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: AVMaster
content: Why can’t this be just like a regular dot that just plugs in to the wall?  There isn’t a huge size difference between the two.  The speaker volume is just BARELY adequate at full volume.  It’s shown in kitchens and bathrooms but if there is any background noise in these often louder than usual areas you wont be able to easily hear it.
title: Speaker is total junk

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Cassie M.
content: I was given this as a Christmas gift to pair with smart light bulbs but this little device is my new best friend. I use it as my alarm clock now, and when it goes off it plays a customized feed of date/time, news, weather, commute information, and a daily devotional so I start my day informed and inspired. I listen to my podcasts and music on it. And at night I can ask Alexa to play sleep sounds. And oh yeah, I can turn my lights on and off with my voice :)
title: Super useful! Completely worth the invasion of my privacy!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Tonu
content: Well, Alexa is now almost everywhere in my house. I got this for my basement and it does all the things that you expect Alexa to do. The sound quality is poor.  You can hear Alexa fine but it sounds like 1970's radio clock speaker in there. I did not expect anything better when I looked at it on the website, and my thoughts were that I am not going to use it to listen to music, etc. It is only a voice-controlled remote for me, and for that, it works great.
title: Small and hidden

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Merlin
content: Sound quality is absolutely  terrible.  I am only using it to add the motion detector on it to turn lights when motion detected.  For that purpose it is outstanding, but you are never going to be able to use the flex for music.
title: terrible sound quality

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Kevin T.
content: Great for out of the way places where you may not want to bother with a Dot or full size Echo. I use it with the night light in our basement mudroom. Very handy for adding things to lists, controlling devices and calling upstairs.
title: Nifty Little Doodad

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Lee L.
content: I'm relatively new to Alexa and bought the Flex for the kitchen.  It doesn't take up much room and it's great for my purposes. Some people complain about the sound quality, but I guess my hearing doesn't register the sound that causes those complaints.  If you are on a budget the Flex is going to work just fine for you too.
title: It's small, and it works

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: L. D. Smith II
content: It works but loses connection more than it should. Im having to unplug and plug it back in every day. It feels really cheap. There aren't any useful features that work with other Echo devices so I'm not sure why anyone would want more than one.
title: Works sometimes

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Gaetano Buttitta
content: I like the idea and concept.  The add-on of light, motion detector is great; even maybe a better speaker plugin would be nicer.  The biggest problem is that it drops out of my Alexa universe of control almost daily and needs to be reset.  It also doesn't follow the routine I setup about 75% of the time.  So I wish it was a little more stable.
title: Loses connection often

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Lyall
content: These work great, good way to add Alexa to bathrooms, garages, etc.  You can sync to bluetooth or plug in external speaker.  Form factor is great.  Audio quality isn't bad for most tasks and listening to podcasts, light music listening -and you can always plug or sync a speaker if you need it.
title: Alexa anywhere

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Star Wars Geek
content: I loved this little addition to Alexa for the bathroom.  Plenty loud for this size for a bathroom or small area - but not too much bass but still pretty good sound quality for a single speaker - think of listening to music from your phone speaker.
title: Love it!  Worth the money as an add on

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: LBI Girl
content: I have placed one in two of my bathrooms where I can now get music and the sound is great.  I can also use it to call for help from someone that has Alexa and their telephone number is in my phone which makes me feel a lot safer.  So easy to set up too. I would not have had space for another Echo unit in the areas where I placed the plug ins.  One less thing to add to the shelf!  Thank you!
title: Fantastic!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: bessharding
content: I love this, it reminds me of my bose system only tinier and no cords. So simple to set up I already had the Alexa dot synchronizing it took me a minute but I'm not tech savvy at all so that was amazing I'm really hoping this works as good as I think it will. I'm already two more right now.!!
title: Easy to install

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Paige Robinson
content: I want one for every room now!!!! Love having it in the bedroom w. the amazon plug in for turning the lamp on my night stand on/off and created a "group" so I can listen to music on all my amazons at the same time throughout the house :)
title: A great extension to our Echo

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: chuckntx
content: I love the form factor, and ability to just plug it in where I want it with no cord to wrap up and manage. But, the sound quality is very, very bad. Your going to want to hook up an additional speaker if using it for music.
title: Good addition, poor sound quality.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Aaron
content: I love this addition to the Echo family! We wanted Alexa for our bedroom but didn't need a nice speaker, so this was the perfect solution... And at a great price point! Multiple we're purchased as Christmas gifts this year.
title: Buy this now!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Evelyn G. Duffy
content: I have it linked to my Bose Speaker so I don't depend on the internal speaker. It has an annoying issue of not being connected to the internet and when you give it a command it won't  respond and it says, I am having trouble understanding right now, try again later. The solution to that is to unplug it, leave it out for awhile and then plug it back in. I didn't see this addressed on line, but that solution has worked for me.
title: Does lose connection to internet from time to time

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Bryan White
content: This was perfect to add Alexa and a night light to my bathroom. Most of my lights are voice controlled so this fixed a bit of a dead spot in my apartment. Sound isn't great but it's fairly small and great if you only need it for some basics
title: Perfect for the right use case

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Jason
content: Pretty easy to set up. Not very loud at all. Doesn't respond to voice very well.  I often have to say something more than once for Alexa to answer or do what she's asked. You will definitely want an external speaker connected to your flex,.
title: Not worth the money. Over rates.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: E T HORNE
content: It is compact for travel and worked immediately after receiving WiFi password.  I have the night light accessory which fits perfectly.  I use a lot of Air BnBs.  They have WiFi so I'm immediately connected to music, news, a night light, and clock while I'm unpacking.
title: Extra compact all-in-one unit for travel

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Happy in Cali
content: This is compact, was easy set up , works great, I put in my bathroom so I can listen while in shower, & will eventually hook up with recommended phone service in the event of a fall so Alexa can call 911 if necessary
title: Happy in CALI

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Kera C. McGee
content: Echo flex is perfect for my bathroom to listen to music or a flash breifing while getting ready for the day but without the hassle of carrying my echo dot or show 5 to he bathroom and back each day! I love the flex and also found out there IS volume control it’s just voice activated so saying “ Alexa turn volume to 6” works using numbers 1-10
title: Perfect for a bathroom or kids room!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Hobby Homesteader
content: Fits in outlet. No wires. Bathroom comparable.  If you wa t the sound quality of the dot, don't get this.  If you want a decent speaker in a convenient place with all the flexibility of Alexa this is great.  Absolutely the best solution to get alexa on my bathroom.
title: Great addition

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Ross
content: I plugged it in my kitchen, so now is easy for me to add items to my shopping list and set reminders while cooking. The set up was super easy, I just plugged in and it recognized my other device and did the basically the whole connection by itself
title: Super easy set up

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Carolynn Riley
content: THIS IS AWESOME!! it’s just like the echo(not as loud) but half the price! i plan on buying more for every room in the house!
title: I love Alexa

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Jerie H.
content: The sound is horrible. All tremble and the volume is really weak. I put the speaker next to my shower and I can barely hear a thing. My S10 phone is much louder. It sucks bc I wanted to be able to change the music track with my voice but I'll just settle for my phone playing.
title: Horrible Sound

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Life Through a Lens
content: I really wish I didn’t get it- what a waist of money- I loved loved loved echo echo dot and figured if Amazon was able to create a economical choice like that then surely the flex would be a hit-I was wrong. It actually interferes with my echo dot performing and I have to have the flex now on mic off it’s really renders a useless.
title: Don’t waste your money

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Doncon_Enterprises
content: Well, these are a welcome find. I like these better than any of my Alexa’s. Great sound?......Absolutely not. Better at everything else?.......Absolutely! I’m getting one of these for every nook in the house. Fantastic!!!!
title: A welcome addition to my Alexa family.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: CYoung
content: I wanted a small option to tell me weather, set alarms, and control lamps. This is so perfect!! Considering it’s small size, the speaker is pretty good. I would suggest this to anyone who wants Alexa without playing music.
title: Perfect for master bedroom

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Martin B.
content: Well worth it for 10$ but not @ 24$. I already own other Echo devices but this is a downgrade. Look at it as more of a sidekick that does what it says. I use mine in the bathroom while getting ready to listen to news, music etc. Glad I bought it even though the volume/sound quality is a bit disappointing.
title: Worth buying. Could be better.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Carl Brothers
content: The unit works great, I use it outside mostly to replace the other Alexa device I used to have. The internal amplifier on the Amazon flex is not as powerful as the echo, or the spot. So if you have this hooked up via the 3.5 mm headphone jack into a stereo, the stereo has to be turned up quite a bit more. Other than that, awesome little unit
title: Neat little unit

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Chris G. Werfel
content: I bought a flex with the optional night light add on for the back hallway to our garage. This is the main door we use to enter the house and often walk in to a dark house. The night light add on keep the hallway illuminated and having an echo at the entrance eliminates yelling across the house to our echo v1 (which is now largely deaf by comparison) to turn on the lights. The hearing on the Flex is so good that it often responds to voice commands from the kitchen to which the v1 is closer.
title: Flex is a welcome addition to the Echo line

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Pat
content: These are a great way to add Alexa to any room, closet, garage, etc. They have a tiny speaker which is obviously not its sole purpose. It's a fantastic device designed for Alexa integration, not for music playback. You can however, connect it to a Bluetooth speaker if you wish to improve the quality of the sound and/or add to a multiroom music setup.
title: Perfect way to add Alexa anywhere with an electrical outlet

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Roger Q
content: Very good addition to the Alexa family but sound could be better, I’ve seen smaller speakers with way better sound than this one. Understand this is not for partying but will be better if sound can be more clear and rich.
title: Great addition to Alexa family of things

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Kate Massey
content: My wife always complained that the dot in our bedroom was too loud. She has no complaints at all about the flex!! It is working great for what we needed it for. The speaker is not very loud at all but is just loud enough.
title: Prefect for us

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Charles Winham
content: Thought about sending this back! It doesn’t hear very well so all requests have to be made loudly and often repeated or answered by the Echo device in another room. Tiny speaker sounds very tiny. Get what you pay for. Not recommended.
title: Have to speak up and ask twice!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Purple
content: It is a good concept however my is acting weird I could have done without it REALLY!!!! It is very low and can not be heard to much over running water or the shower. I repalced it with my Google home mini. This item needs much improvement especially since it cost as much as Alexa home mini so sad. Not just a piece of junk sitting around.
title: Junk Junk Junk!!!!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: SDAFOX
content: I like the unit but sound quality is low and I can not adjust  sound level
title: Soft speaker

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Ashley H.
content: Easy to set up - use it in the kids bathroom to help with teeth brushing and announcements. Got another for a guest room where we don't need a bigger device but have lights on Alexa. Love these little guys! As others have said, it's not great sound quality for music but in a bathroom works great.
title: Great little device

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: charlie
content: It's an extension. I love it but don't expect must for sound. it fits a nice need. My microwave is Alexa but I don't have space for a device other than this. It's perfect for my need. My living room and bedroom and dining room will do most things but the flex really helps in little corners
title: Good if it's what you need it for

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Dee Santana
content: This product was just what I needed. I have it in our bathroom, the night light attachment made it even better for my son to be able to use the bathroom at night without hitting himself to get there. Also allows me to have music in the bathroom for relaxation
title: Great buy

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Joshua
content: The speaker is used in the bathroom for music and weather. Sound quality is ok considering it is coming from a small speaker. Have not used the light or the motion sensor for it so not sure how those work. All in all, not a bad little speaker.
title: Great for the bathroom

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Doc Anreb
content: Sound is too low when connected to a Bluetooth speaker. Sometimes volume resets after inactivity so when I talk to it, I can see the blue light flashing, but no sound coming out due to the low volume. I have to then say "max volume" so I can hear the audio. It also seems like the mic is not as sensitive as my other 3 Alexas in the house and I have to shout at it. Will update my review if I can solve the issue.
title: Low volume when connected to a Bluetooth speaker/ weak mic

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Liberty
content: How did I live without this?! I’m 61 and live alone; this is far cheaper than paying for a life alert every month plus I now can play background music/radio, get the weather, etc with a few words. Lovin’ it!
title: So great I bought another

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: R. Fell
content: We put ours in the bathroom. Now for us it works great now dont think your going to get great sound your not. Its almost like a cell phone speaker. For me I can hear it over the shower. Please don't expect great sound.
title: Works

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Allen A.
content: Great product to plug into kitchen outlet.  Does not take up any counter space, and easily provides timers, conversions, etc.  Also used as a sound machine, looping sleep sounds when needed.  Very pleased with the purchase.
title: Great product at great price

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Nathaniel R
content: I bought this to hook up an old set of computer speakers to Alexa via the 3.5mm jack. This thing is garbage, the speaker on it is barely audible and the mini-jack does not output enough voltage (maybe they think you are going to be using headphones with this???) - hooked up to my nice speakers set to full volume, with the echo set to full volume as well, I could not get it to be any louder than a phone speaker. My speakers work fine with everything else and are deafeningly loud at full volume, except when hooked up to this.
title: Poorly designed for what it would be most useful for

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Atypical-guy
content: Horrible mic.  Won't respond even when I shout "ALEXA" 3 or 4 times inches away from it.  Probably a defective unit, not sure.  Sound quality is not as bad as other reviewers are saying IMO.  It's merely "OK" or "meh".  Certainly doesn't match the awesome sound of the Echo Dot 3rd Gen.  Wait fore 2nd gen, the Amazon Engineers usually get it right by the second version.
title: Wait for 2nd Gen, Flex 1.0 is definitely NOT ready for Prime Time

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: LAURA S.
content: USED THIS PRODUCT IN ROOMS AWAY FROM OUR ECHO DOT.  CAME IN HANDY TURING LIGHTS ON / OFF.  VOICE COMMANDS WERE SOMETIMES INACCURATE.  THE MOST HORRIBLE FEATURE WAS THE LOW VOLUME & THE EXTREMELY  T I N N Y  VOICE!!!!!
title: I WISH I WAITED FOR 2ND GENERATION

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: William Brown
content: I don't know why I bought this.  To this day I don't know what is good for or what it truly does. I have a house full of Alexa products and I don't know why I bought this.  It's to late to return so I guess I'm stuck.
title: Stuck with it

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Mellow Customer
content: I knew that the sound would not be as good as the Echo,  the Echo plus, or  the Echo studio. Despite the short comings, I did like the Bluetooth capability which allows me to pair it with other speakers. I also like how you can easily move it from room to room. If you  are into quality sound than this is not for you. if you want flexibility then it is a great purchase.
title: Great purchase value

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Holly
content: Nice compact design with a USB plug to charge phone or add components. Great for the kitchen; I love it for timing food while cooking. I never listen to music, so this is a great alternative to the larger counter-top Dot version.
title: Compact; easy set-up; great timer for cooking.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: digitaldaryl
content: Very disappointed in this Flex unit with light. The unit never stays connected longer than 24 hrs. The "Routines" are usually completed ignored on the Flex. It seems to have a mind of its own. Would not recommend it.
title: very inconsistent. Does not stay connected.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Casey Engelbrecht
content: I couldn't believe how horrible this device sounds. It actually makes my ears hurt. Tried plugging it into a speaker via the 3.5mm jack and it had a horrible frequency output when it wasn't actively playing sounds. Returning asap!
title: Sounds absolutely HORRIBLE!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Tammy Tutt
content: I got a few of these, but haven't placed them all yet.  I did put one in in my bathroom and love being able to check the day's weather as I get ready of a morning or listening to music while soaking in a bubble bath!
title: handy to have

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Adele Palmiotti
content: I didn't know what to expect, but I found out I like it - it plays my Amazon Music and does everything the Dot does.  The only problem is the voice control is a little low, but I'll ask Alexa if that can be change.  Love it.
title: Echo Flex

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: NickPA
content: I got this for the sole purpose of controlling my lights, using timer, and asking questions.  It does a fairly good job at this though I usually have to ask alexa a couple times before she wakes (or understands) me.  DO NOT get this for listening to music or anything like that as the audio quality is terrible (and I don't think that is what the purpose of this is for).  Basically for 10 dollars it does a good enough job if you are looking for something to use as a personal assistant but do not buy if you are planning on using it for more than that.
title: Good for using to control smart home... Not so good for anything else.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: cdphen2000
content: Nice idea with less than perfect execution. It has real trouble with voice commands either does not hear you or understand you sometimes it just stops listening while you are talking to it. I mainly wanted them for our bathrooms to play music through our shower speakers but it's just not very good at it right now. I am hopeful that they will push some updates and fix these issues.
title: Nice but not where it should be.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Dickens Groupie
content: Handy dandy for often used Alexa functions; love having this in a kitchen.  Sound quality only adequate for music or recorded book, but this gadget wasn’t really built for that. I will buy another one for the garage
title: Useful, useful for everyday tasks

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: June A Laughter
content: I just love having the Echo Flex in my kitchen.  It's perfect for everyday use and, as I spend a lot of time in the kitchen, it comes in so handy.  I can listen to my favorite music while cooking or cleaning, I can set the timer and announce without ever leaving the room.  Since it plugs right into the outlet, it takes up no counter space at all. Easy to wipe clean if anything splashes on it.  Just a great little device!
title: Great little device

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Edwin C
content: for what it is and for what it was created (extension) for it does the job.  For ppl complaining that the speaker is weak, it sounds horrible, blah blah... c'mon ppl it says it right on the description of the item "Plug-in "MINI" smart speaker, what do you expect... for it to have tweeters and a subwoofer
title: It works...

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: nija tamarr mckinnis
content: I really love and enjoy the product. It is in my bathroom with my night light connected to it. The only thing i wish for is the volume, i wish it was louder. When running water in the bathtub you can not hear a book or music or anything it is saying at all. Other than that i love it very well. And thank you for making it to use along with the night light. You got it and be proud.
title: The volume is quite very low.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Gregory
content: I bought this before Christmas it was on a insane sale for $12.50 after a code. I have read a lot of reviews on this echo flex  people complained about the speaker. Don't get me wrong its not the best speaker, but yet it's not as bad as a lot of people says. Its a great add on to a smart house or great addition for other echos for people who put their main echos in bedroom and living room like I have. It great for the kitchen doesn't take up much space. P.S. For the people saying the speaker is bad go out and buy a Bluetooth speaker and pair it up.
title: Not as bad as everyone says

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Paul
content: I have this in the bathroom and it's nice not to have all the wires hanging down. Speaker isn't the best, but I can understand it and I use a bluetooth speaker in the shower which pairs up right away with the flex.
title: Works great for me

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Peter
content: Great product. I have an echo dot and a show5 but this flex a pleasant addition. The sound quality is not as great as the other echos but it still does its job. Because it is small and it plugs in to the outlet right away, it is really versatile and where it can be.
title: Nice addition to the echo collection

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Julie D.
content: I plugged this in our office room at home, as we have an Echo Dot and Echo Show in other rooms. It works fine, and was able to connect to Alexa easily. It recognized my whisper the other morning, so that is a plus!
title: Works well so far

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Alex D
content: Used this to plug into a wall outlet. it works ok but has very low mono sounding speakers that are not really anything special. in order to hear the music the room has to be very quite, but its to be expected from such a small unit.
title: Good but not great

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Lovelybrown
content: I got this for my bathroom for music. It’s not loud at all. The sound quality isn’t great. I ended buying the night light accessory and putting it in my hallway. Now I love it. Echo is in the bathroom now. All is right with my echo world now.
title: Not great for sound. Great as a nightlight

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Jbell
content: Great Product, placed in my bathroom. Good sound quality its perfect.
title: AWESOME

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Craig D. Kollai
content: The compact size and not having a power cord  make this great for an outlet in our stairwell.  Alexa's voice seems much more hollow and a bit higher pitched but since this isn't our most used device that is acceptable.
title: Good device for the price

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Jay J Posner
content: Sounds good for speech but tinny for music ( but they told you that in the ad, right)? I should have ordered the nightlight with the Flex but I didn’t, so now I have one ordered! Next time I’ll order both together.
title: Tiny speaker

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: God
content: i got it to extend the range of alexa in my house. it works great, just like any echo device. the sound quality is not as good as an echo or echo dot but i'm fine with that. i didnt purchase it for only listening to music. i use it mainly to listen to the news, weather forecasts, podcasts, and general questions to alexa.
title: great alexa device

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Thomas B.
content: I have almost every Alexa and this one losses the connection the most of any Alexa I’ve owned. Edit: after posting the review above amazon reached out and was able to guide me through getting it working perfectly. This is a great device as long as you understand it’s limitations
title: Flex working again

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Angelica
content: It's a small echo plug in to the wall outlet. It works well in my home. I placed mine in the bathroom to listen to music when I am showering. With the water running I hear the music with no problems, it has great sound.
title: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: mikebw
content: I've got it setup up in the workout room connected to a small external amplifier and a  decent pair or speakers so it sounds great.  Didn't realize something so small could be so ugly, so good thing it's mostly out of sight. Works great.
title: Does the job

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Figaro941
content: I use this with the motion sensor plug-in to turn on a light in our bathroom when getting out of bed in the middle if the night. Works great and I hope to see additional “plug-in’s” that will allow me to use them to create a wireless security system in my home.
title: Works Great with Motion Sensor Plug-In

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Julie Riggi
content: This "unit" is OK.  I wish I could turn the volume up as in my case, it isn't very loud.  The speaker isn't that great but again I am used to my Echo, which has great sound quality.  Still totally worth the price though.
title: Echo Flex

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Holly G.
content: I love the idea of a small plug-in Echo device, but this is not the one. It requires absolute silence to properly understand you. Any background noise and the device will fail to properly recognize you. Also, even when the volume is turned up to 10 it is whisper quiet. Perhaps Amazon will correct these issues in a future version.
title: Great concept, poor execution!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Ernest Penfold
content: Does a perfectly adequate job, but if you want to listen to anything other than the voice responses, you’re going to want an external speaker. Even using a Bluetooth speaker, the sound volume isn’t great. Aside from that sound quality limitation, it’s a reliable Echo device with a great form factor.
title: Wonderfully compact; extremely limited sound

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Irvin Dinkins
content: I find it difficult to play my playlist and ask Alexa to play a particular song on my playlist and then continue playing the rest of my playlist. For example, if I have 10 songs on my playlist and I ask Alexa to play song five...she will play song five but stop playing after song five ends. Whereas, I would want to hear the rest of the songs on my playlist. I hope this review was not too confusing.
title: Meets All My Expectations...Except

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: This one
content: For the price, it works perfect! Needed one downstairs and didn’t want to put on a table or media console and didn’t want to buy a holder for the outlet. You really can’t beat it for just simple commands, time checks or weather. Not made to be an audiophile type device.
title: Great little echo

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Chris L
content: This device sucks. Everything in my house is smart wired. All of my echo devices work fine. I cannot control groups from this device, and yes after five attempts I did actually throw it in the street to get run over. Trash truck comes tomorrow.
title: Just throw it in the street to get run over

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: bls334
content: Overall a cool addition to Alexa I use it in my kitchen the sound quality is poor at best. I've heard cell phones that sound better. But the size is awesome. The microphone is super sensitive it can hear me from the back of the house.
title: Awesome addition to Alexa

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: gflyer
content: Put this echo in my bedroom.  I already have a decent speaker system in my room, just needed the echo device.  The Flex's built-in speaker can handle speech ok, but forget any kind of music.  Works great for Music Unlimited and for a little home automation (mostly lights at this point).
title: Inexpensive and it just works

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Joshua M. Self
content: I bought one just to try out its functionality since we didn't really use it for music in the kitchen and it works great. I like the idea of the USB expansion port on bottom as well. I'll probably get another one for the garage pretty soon.
title: Small and compact without loosing functionality

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Jason Dalke
content: I had higher hopes for the quality of the speaker, it is very tinny and hollow sounding. Of course Alexa works well as it is the cloud not the device. I noticed if the volume is over 6 Alexa has trouble hearing me.
title: Works but could be better.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Regular Guy
content: This is a perfect addition to the Echo family. I can play my Queen tunes when I shower in the morning. Granted, it is not arena quality; but it is still Queen. For those audiophiles, may Amazon can produce a speaker plugin.
title: Perfect Addition To Echo Family

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Christine
content: I am using this in my bathroom and I really like it. If you're expecting stereo sound this isn't for you. It's great for listening to music, news, weather or adding to your shopping list.  I also added the light, which serves as the night light that can change colors.
title: Nice addition to my Amazon collection

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Munoz Home
content: Setup was a breeze from my Phone App. Sometimes I struggle to get my voice-command understood, so I end up yelling at it several times until it responds.  But my number-one complaint is: Not having volume-control buttons built-in on the Echo Flex.  It is ok to be able to ask Alexa to turn the volume up or down, BUT for a task like that, it is much faster & convenient to simply reach out & do it by myself !!  Thank you for paying attention to my review.  HC Munoz, El Paso TX.
title: Easy to Setup  BUT lacks Volume control buttons !!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Wayne A. Naylor
content: I like that you can turn off active listening. I put these in my bathrooms where I can listen to music when I like. The sound is not great but it's good enough for the bathroom. I also have them with  a nite light attached.
title: Great for the Bathroom

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Rickmore
content: It’s just what I thought it would be. It picks up voice well and is small. I needed it for an entry hallway and it fits the bill perfectly. The sound is loud enough for the voice feedback. You will not be using the built in speaker for music, or really anything but responses, which is what it’s for and well suited. I use the motion  sensor with it to run a routine and that has worked well
title: Great for a hall or extra bathroom.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: NYC Mom
content: I'm not in love. I got it as a Prime Day deal, mostly for the added bonus of the smart plug. The sound isn't that great but it serves it's purpose as a "helper" in my home. It's not too good for playing music.
title: It's just ok.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Monalisa
content: Got cousins each one for Christmas. Great for home intercom without needed much space . Sound is not as clear as other Alexas but that was to be expected. Great for small rooms or big rooms for drop ins or intercom like functions .
title: Great Price  & No counter space needed .

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Natalie Ross
content: This is perfect for spaces that a full Echo doesn’t make sense, but you give commands there frequently. For me, my kitchen Echo Dot is a little too far from my front door but I am constantly telling Alexa to turn off my lights when I leave and have to yell. The flex gets rid of that for me.
title: Perfect for smaller spaces

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Onnajurney
content: Unless you're using this to add a motion detector or nightlight, don't bother.  It covers up both plug outlets so it's the only thing you can put in the outlet.  At full volume I can hardly hear it and last but not least,  I can't change the name to Echo like my other devices.
title: Not useful

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Tolicated
content: This product worked a lot better than I thought it would. It's great for the price and very easy to setup and use. The only minor issue is the speaker quality, but for size and cost, it is better than expected!
title: Love It!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: mirm
content: It is so nice having this Alexa plug in.  We have it in the bedroom and it works great for turning the lights on or off, checking the weather, and reviewing what's on the schedule for the day.  It works great.
title: Very convenient plug in

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Mike Payne
content: Has a hard time hearing me when only 5 feet away. The sound is pretty bad but it makes up for it with space savings. The option to plug in an external speaker is great also. Really only good for places where your close to it, like the bathroom mirror.
title: It's ok.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: DanaDane
content: I’m new to the Alexa movement.  But this far I am beyond impressed.  I love the guard your home feature.  My favorite feature is the smart plug.  I easily turn off/on my living room light through Alexa or my app.  Very cool home technology.
title: New to Alexa!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Tony
content: Good volume. Excellent range and recognition. Replacement for my Echo Wands which are about to be "bricked" by Amazon. I have 5 of them throughout the house. Now I will shout to my Flex rather than push a button. Shame on you Amazon, I loved my Wands.
title: Got a Flex cause you dumped my Echo Wand.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: andrew
content: Great addition to my home automation system. I started small using my Brinks Home Security and my daughter bought me the echo dot. The Echo Flex was the perfect addition to the living-room area. Please note: it is not made to listen to music and that is what I use my Fire stick & TV for in my living-room!
title: Flexible

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: MommaCass
content: I purchased this Flex so I could stop shouting into the next room.  The sound is tinny and in hindsight, I should have just purchased another Echo Dot. They both take up an outlet, they both extend your range to Alexa, the sound quality is where they aren’t equals!
title: Get a Dot.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Marvyl
content: The sound is not as good as the Echo, but then it was not meant to bel...I love it as an intercom between the garage and the kitchen.  I have it hooked up to a Sony speaker so my husband  can ask for different music through the speaker while he is woodworking in his garage workshop
title: Use as an intercom

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: BeerNwineGuy
content: Purchased for use in newly remodeled bathroom, along with the night light which plugs into the USB port on bottom of unit.  Easy to setup.  Can control light thru Alexa app, or simply let it turn itself on at night and off in the morning.  So far, this has been working fine and is exactly what we needed.
title: So easy to setup

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Sree
content: I like the size and convenience without a power cable. Just plugin, connect, and use it. It would have been great if it comes with a timer. I have to buy it separately and need to spend more than Echo-flex.
title: Good and Tiny Smart Device.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: WTFUPS
content: Maybe it will be better with more add ons? For now, its pointless, the speaker is horrible. I didnt expect to listen to music on this but I wanted to at least be able to hear Alexa. Better off just buying a Dot. This is just dumb.
title: Pointless so far

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Augusto
content: You have to be close or scream at it, so it can listen to you, it’s nice that you can plug additonal gadgets to it, it is the same system as the other Alexas, on this one you have plug an external speaker via BT or 3.5 mm headphone jack. Does not take lots of space. The integrated speaker is not the best, i think it can be improved.
title: Nice Little Alexa thingy

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: ReignBeau Heffer
content: It’s tiny and mighty! The speaker can and will play music, but it’s small and the sound quality isn’t excellent. Perfect for a small room where the music doesn’t need to be loud. Alexa is always happy to help and I’ve had ZERO problems! LOVE the integrated USB port!
title: Tiny but mighty!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: EMT
content: I got this to go out in my garage that is not attached. I knew that the wifi connection wouldn't be strong and I was right. Some days it works great, other days not so much. However, when it works, it's fantastic. I use it to check weather before getting in my car and to close my garage door. The sound quality isn't the best like other Alexa devices, but it wasn't made to. For me, it's perfect for the garage where I don't need it to give me better quality. Smaller than I thought but perfect size for in the garage. Excellent price.
title: I would buy it again

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Jason S.
content: Love this fact that this is plug in the wall no cords or chargers to take up place or looks cluttered. I added the night light to my flex and place it in my kitchen in a plug above my counter (perfect location). The sensor is on point, once my kitchen lights are off the night light comes on almost instantly. One issue I have is the fact that this could be louder when I have  others in the kitchen with me and playing music I have issue hearing what Alexa is saying and well as music. Overall a good product only recommendation is louder speakers.
title: I expected it to be a louder!!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Carol
content: Already had the Echo Dot.  Took a chance on this with the extra code offered for excellent price. Very easy to set up.  It eliminates dealing with cords.  I was somewhat apprehensive about the sound quality from previous reviews but it is perfectly adequate and yes I have listened to some music.  It does not have a volume control and the Echo Dot has a fuller sound because of the larger speaker but it still is perfectly audible.  It also has a very accessible button to turn off the microphone  just like the Dot if security is of concern.  Very glad I took a chance with this!
title: Easy set up, extremely functional just like Echo Dot

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: NetBloke
content: We are "all in" with Alexa devices and this was a great addition. Great have it is small and simply plugs in to the wall. We got the motion sensor too and have them set up to notify of movement. Pretty handy!
title: Great small form alternative to Echo Dot

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Kelly G
content: Purchased the Echo Flex with the nightlight addition & love it. Bought a 2nd one for the carport to provide a little light & enable me to utilize Alexa to control other smart home features when I first get home from work, or when I’m working around the house outside.
title: Perfect for reaching Alexa from other areas around the house!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: fred washer
content: Work perfect of what we wanted them for with good sounds for the rooms they are in. some rooms as big as 16x20ft
title: Great price point and we have them for listening to audio books and music.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: The Mix King
content: It was unbelievably fast to set up. I just plugged in and Alexa did the rest. I have many smart devices and smart bulbs and this is by far the easiest. The sound quality is good too, close to the echo dot that I Also have. Looks good too.
title: Super easy to set up and works great

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: marcus tyler
content: This is the first echo device I've owned.  The sound quality is more than adequate. I have it positioned pretty high on top of a book shelf and it hears me anywhere in my living room, dining room, and kitchen.  I even switched the wake word to "computer" and it wont respond while I'm watching TV and people on "Star Trek" make a request, but still responds when I say it.  So the tech is even better than expected. All for under $25.  Its so good I'm going to buy echos for various family members for Christmas.
title: Excellent device.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: E CLAYTON BELL
content: A multi function sensor for motion, temp and humidity would be nice.  A switched plug (built into the base unit),  Some of these could even be BLE.  It's a great base idea, but needs a better eco system or needs to be open sourced.
title: Needs more accesories or an way to make your own.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Dealseeker
content: Some time when I am talking it will suggest music to me and start playing it. I will tell it to stop but it just keeps going, forcing me to unplug it. Has done it so many times now I just leave it unplugged and use my phone to turn the light off and on in the app.
title: Starts playing music and wont stop.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Charles M. Wingfield
content: Works as advertised.  I also bought the motion detection attachment.  The attachment is not simple to synchronize with Alexa.  Instructions are very poorly written.  Once I got it to work, it has its hiccups.  Overall it’s good.
title: Works as illustrated, with exceptions.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Chitowntexan70
content: Great little Alexa device. Very inconspicuous and the motion detector module makes it easy to add IFTTT equations to your snare home systems. I have ours programmed to turn on hallway and living room lights to come on upon entry from the garage after sunsets.
title: Modular add ons

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: TWill
content: Device acts like an Echo, but has poor sound quality when listening to music. I added a motion sensor to mine and once I got Amazon tech support to help me with the set-up, I am very pleased with the feature.
title: Works

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Nyla family
content: This is another great addition to the Alexa family, very convenient, I didn’t see any difference from the echo dot. The only down side is the voice clarity, and also I wish if it had 2 USB outlets instead of only one
title: Another great addition to Alexa family, the voice clarity is a glitch

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: heriberto guzman
content: Las cosas que no me gustan de este Alexa flex es Que el dispositivo solo cuenta con 2 micrófonos hay que hablar fuerte con Alexa para que pueda entender. También no me gusta el altavoz incorporado debieron poner otra bocina un poco mejor mi celular suena mejor y más fuerte. El déselo creo que se puede mejorar es muy simple. Cosas que me gustan son que puedes usarlo como cargador para tu móvil o colocar diferentes dispositivos como sensor, luz, o reloj también me gusta que lo puedes colocar directamente en la pared sin cables.
title: Micrófonos y bocinas son muy malos.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Tanya Sutton
content: Absolutely terrible. We have quite a few Echo devices and this one is by FAR the worst. Sound quality is terrible. It has trouble connecting to WiFi frequently. Its ability to hear you is lacking. Spend the extra money for an Echo Dot. There is no reason to have one of these.
title: Do not buy

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Brad1999
content: I like everything about this. I only gave a 4 for sound quality because it is not meant for a lot of quality sound play but I knew that and it was outlined well so I couldn’t justify giving any less because I got exactly what I expected and am very pleased! This is a great addition to our Alexa home. It is perfect for my boys room to use for fun games timers and communication around the house when they are playing upstairs and I’m doing some work outside or paperwork in the office!
title: More than you expect!!!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Ricardo Menendez
content: I love how simple it is to just plug in and have Alexa available to you. Very easy to add these any where in your home with an outlet. I always had to yell across the house for the Echo in my living room to hear me but now I can bring Alexa into any room. The one thing I would change is that i wish it would make a sound when I wake Alexa, the same way an Echo would beep after you called out its wake word. It has a light that blinks, however I feel it may be more helpful if it made a beep.
title: Add alexa to any room, super easy!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: NT NY
content: Love the future use case possibilities of this. For now we have the Night-Light & are looking forward to more "add-on"s for this. GREAT POSSIBILITIES and use cases. A definite version 2 upgrade should be the speakers.
title: Great little addon to the Echo Family

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Sarah
content: I really WANTED to love this product! I have an dot for the kids’ room and it sounds beautiful and an echo show for the living room that works great. I got the flex for the kitchen and wish i would have just gotten another hose/echo. The device works great, but the sound quality is so poor! I have it near the kitchen prep area so it isn’t the distance, it’s just that the sound is more like a generic speaker. I was disappointed because every other Alexa product works so well.
title: Great Product, subpar speaker quality

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Mike S.
content: I use this for music in the shower combined with a bluetooth speaker. Does the job, been using it for a few weeks now and it doesn't seem to have any issues. Connects to my bluetooth speaker automatically when I turn that on.
title: Great for the bathroom!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Dave Robbins
