content: Not a lot to add to other reviews that I checked prior to ordering. Sound quality not the best for music but still adequate and very good for voice as it's clear and plenty loud enough. A cinch to integrate with current Alexa devices even for a non-tech person like me. Very happy with the price and ease of installation.
title: As advertised and reviewed

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Seandog43
content: The small size and ease of plug in is great! Can use it anywhere the is an outlet. Perfect for kitchens and bathrooms. The sound quality is kind of small sounding, like small headphones. Alexa works great. Not great for loud music though. I use mine in the bathroom and it plays over the shower volume. A great little addition to any house or apartment.
title: Convenient, easy to connect and very handy!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Isaac C.
content: I put my flex in the garage where it works perfectly fine. It's not the loudest, it's not even as loud as a laptop speaker, but it's perfect for a small spot where you dont want super loud music. Connected no issues and works great!
title: Great for the garage

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: TalH
content: Placed a couple of these in the bathrooms - this way I can check the time, turn off alarms in the house, announce or drop off on other rooms - and it's so cheap! Great Echo device when you don't need fancy speakers.
title: Excellent for smaller rooms

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Greg
content: Love it in the bathrooms hooked up Bluetooth speakers works great.
title: Great for bathrooms hallways or kitchen.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: OC mom
content: As soon as I plugged it in the kitchen, it automatically synced to my echo spot upstairs. I paired it with my bose speaker using my Alexa app. Must buy if you want to use one echo spot in two different locations.
title: I can use 1 echo in 2 different locations!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Snakeguy_joe
content: These things are awsome. If your expecting a sound system buy one. These are like alexa extenders and the work great. They are not satellite speakers for your echo system although they dont sound bad as tweeters.
title: Alexa can hear me from anywhere

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Donald Scott
content: The unit I bought seems to "lock up" a lot.  Often while playing music, it will just stop and the blue light remains lit.  Also when connected to bluetooth, there is a delay and part of what Alexa has said is lost.  Didn't buy it for the sound quality even though it is rather tinny.  I bought a bluetooth speaker to compensate for the poor sound quality, but the Flex on occasion forgets  that it is paired.
title: Neat idea, should have seen it through development before selling.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Terri
content: ... got the night light with it, since it's for the bathroom. Sound isn't the best but for what it is, it's okay. I'm pleased with it, I get my notifications and it turns on and off lights and it sets up guarding when I need it.
title: Practically set up itself...

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Tina in KY
content: We have an echo in our master bathroom to hear music while we get ready.  We also have a plug on each night table light.  This plug in mini is perfect for our bedroom so we don't have to yell to Alexa to please turn off the bedroom lights!
title: Big little helper

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: leisha
content: I put this in my kitchen just ask simple questions. She can hear me clearly . the only con is its kind of low compared to other echo/alexas I have in the house. Overall nice and got it for a great price.
title: great

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Patty Streng
content: Literally doesn’t listen.  I set my alarm and ask you to turn it off and she doesn’t.  I have to unplug it each time.  I haven’t had a lot of time to play around but so far it’s just like any other Alexa
title: Not really enjoying it.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Big Steve
content: This device works well with my echo dot the announcement feature is one of my favorites I can talk to my wife from the kitchen to our bedroom so I don't have to yell through the house. Not that good for playing music though unless you connect to a bluetooth device.
title: I like the announcement feature

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: HD
content: Echo Flex not like I though! its very satisfy my needs I appreciate I purchased I used it in average room and its have very good microphone despite sometimes TV is on and speaker is just clear to hear reply to answer and use as Drop in service from Amazon. overall its good to someone have this product for average room but not hall of course.
title: Good microphone

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Angela Newman
content: I love that this Alexa device takes no space. I have one in my kitchen and one in a spare room. I still need a few more. I have played a few somes on them. It does fine for a kitchen speaker. I love it!
title: This is great!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Bellota
content: I like the price and I like the small footprint.  Very convenient.  I didn’t expect good fidelity from a small speaker.  It’s located in my bathroom and provides the essentials for my use - music isn’t one of those essentials.
title: A bargain device

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: PGS
content: These are good and handy to plug in around the house. These aren't meant for sound quality unless you pair them with a Bluetooth speaker. But otherwise very reliable and great in picking up your voice.
title: Great to plug in around the house.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: KR
content: Really cool... controls my link amp... like the night light attachment.. I gave the sound quality a 5 because it is what it is... an Alexa interface... no one should expect to be jamming to some tunes with this thing...
title: Super Cute...Super Cool

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: KWiers
content: I bought this for the household 'classroom' so that I could set reminders primarily. It does not respond well to my voice commands. I have to repeat myself multiple times with increasing volume and force.
title: Not as great as my dot

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: moors88
content: Works well and allows you to feel a sense of modernness all around your house as Alexa is everywhere :-) Several privacy options will keep your data safe so dont worry about privacy just consult the alexa ap and adjust your privacy settings as needed. There is also a mute button you can manually press.
title: Alexa integration is Excellent

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Tam MT
content: I absolutely love Alexa, way better than Google. She updates and learns so many things and I program her to know things as well. I have the Flex by my bed and Dot in my kitchen. The reception is wonderful and I have a distance between both of them. I am so happy with my purchase. ^ o ^
title: Smaller version of Echo

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Felicia
content: This echo is awesome.  It’s smaller then I thought which is great.  Only takes up one outlet and doesn’t block the other which I actually expected it to.  I wouldn’t recommend it as the only Alexa in the house but for kind of an extender it’s great.  We put our in the laundry room. Plugged it in it sync to our account and was ready in Under 3 min.
title: Absolutely awesome just what I wanted

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Yehielp
content: Firstly to all the ones who wonder Yes it support 220/240V it was important for me to mention that as I could get an answer here from other reviews. Other than that nice though the sound is flat.
title: Supports 220V, nice but flat sound

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Dan Parnell
content: Voice recognition is, as usual for any Amazon first-party product, excellent.  The speaker is tinny and quiet, but it’s physically the size of a dime, so expectations were not high here.  This does what it says on the label.
title: Another solid Echo device from Amazon for small

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: DebinNH
content: Unless you really need the small size plugged directly in to an outlet, buy the Dot for a much better sound. You can even mount the Dot on the wall, although you will lose some of the sound quality. This sounds really tinny.
title: Sound quality is barely adequate

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: James D. Ballantyne
content: I added the Echo Flex to each bedroom to control the lights and work as an alarm clock for a small B & B.  The renters enjoy the novelty and even get a kick from having the music playing with a sleep timer.
title: A nice addition

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Steve
content: I'm using this with the motion detector attachment. the device recognizes my voice well. the speaker is quite limited in sound quality. I would like more flexibility in the routines that can be built for the motion sensor. it seems somewhat limited, I'm hoping for additional development.
title: it's OK, but....

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Kathleen S Parsons
content: I wanted to be able to get Alexa to put things on my grocery list while in the bathroom...toothpaste, shampoo, etc. The speaker is not great for listening to music but everything else is great.
title: Perfect for small room

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Kim in Texas
content: It's nice having a fourth Echo in the dining room, since I have smart bulbs in the hall light, and the kitchen Dot couldn't always hear me. I got the nightlight, which is OK but not that exciting.
title: Good device with terrible sound and "meh" add-ons

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Morac
content: I didn’t expect the sound quality to be that good from this device, but I expected to at least be able to hear it.  The volume is way too low.  I couldn’t hear it in my shower which is why I bought it.
title: Not loud enough and not worth the money.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Jen630
content: I got this plug to have downstairs as my Alexa Echo is upstairs. Now I can access my Alexa anywhere in my house and I have the smart lights set up as well to work with it. It is so easy now just to manage house settings when leaving using Alexa.
title: Great Alexa addition

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: C. Spears
content: Works just like any other Echo but is just a wall wart. Knocked a star off for the sound quality being as lousy as you would expect for something with suck  tiny speaker. Totally fine for talking to a tinny version of Alexa but even my 5 year old refuses to use it for music because it sounds so bad. Still, if you need a small, cheap Amazon spy device in an extra room, this is a good value!
title: Good value and takes up no space

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Karen
content: I love my new toy. It allows me to "drop in" on my elderly Dad while I'm at work. Got this because he always misses my call. Now, I can just speak to him whenever I want to check in while I'm away from the house. Awesome device. Also I don't have to tell from my room to speak to my hubby.
title: Awesome communicator

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Chad DeGrove
content: This was the easiest setup for anything I have ever purchased. When I pulled up my Alexa App this device was already in my device list. This has been a game changer for our upstairs. As we do not spend a lot of time up there we decided not to get a show like downstairs and I did not want a dot. When this showed up I thought let's try it. Great buy.
title: Small but versatile

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Ron V
content: I spent 2 frustrating hours trying to get this device connected to my network.  I have 3 Amazon Echos and an Amazon Dot connected to my network that connected without an issue.  Something is not right here. DO NOT PURCHASE!!!
title: Just doesn't work

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Sara Muroff
content: Seems to work great. I like the night light addition but I do wish I could use two add one like a night light and a sensor, especially in hallways. I also wish it was a bit smaller- more streamlined with the wall socket.
title: A good edition to the echo family

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Jllipsitz
content: The only thing I don't like is that is that it's a little hard to hear my book over my shower in my bathroom, but that has to do with the layout of my bathroom, not the Flex. Other than that, it's great!
title: Another win for Alexa!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Suzan E. Sweeney
content: Overall happy with it. Great little Alexa, though without connecting it to an external speaker it can be hard to hear.  We're using it in the bedroom mostly for household management at night so it's doing it's job. No issues here with it recognizing its wake word but it is plugged in close to the bed. Nice for the price.
title: Great for the price.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: T L from MA
content: It's convenient to plug directly into an outlet, and the 3rd party motion sensor works well, but the sound quality is really poor. Definitely can't use it for music of any kind and even Alexa's voice is difficult to understand. For just a few more dollars, the Dot is far superior for playback and feedback. But again, the USB driven accessories are pretty neat.
title: Works as it should and it's cheap, but really bad sound quality.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: CleChi
content: I have Echo Dots and Shows all over the house. This Flex is absolutely perfect for the basement, where I also added the motion detector and have it turn on and off the basement lights. I almost never use any Alexa feature that requires the speaker, which for sure is substandard for any kind of music playing. But for the occasional announcement of the time or setting a timer, it's perfect.
title: Functions exactly as expected and needed

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Joe Edmonds
content: All my dogs are connected to a speaker, so I thought this would be a great idea!  Unfortunately the mic range is so bad I returned it right away and went with the dot.  It’s barely more expensive and does so much more.
title: It doesn’t hear you at all

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Samantha
content: I have this plugged in my bedroom as an alarm in the morning and to play podcasts and music while doing chores. The voice recognition is not as good as I would like. Unfortunately, when my alarm goes off in the morning, I have to YELL at Alexa to stop (despite being plugged in directly next to me). The sound quality is what you might expect if you stuck your phone into an empty Solo cup. It’s louder...just a weirdly echoey thing about it.
title: Voice Recognition and Volume sub-par

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: acruzjr
content: Just as described, good for asking Alexa with informational stuff, not meant for music. I have it plugged in the kitchen outlet. Great for asking weather, news, adding to-do’s, buying list while in the kitchen.
title: Just as described

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: David B.
content: It joined the rest of our Alexa devices smoothly out of the box and is a very cost effective way to extend the network to rooms where high quality audio is not really needed - just control and query.
title: Solidly built, synched up easily

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Suz
content: The sound quality is not as crisp as my Dot, but I have no other complaints.  I own two dots and if I would have known about the flex earlier, I would not have purchased the second dot.  The flex is all I need.
title: The Sound quality is

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Phatgirl
content: This does not have a great sound quality speaker like the Echo or Echo Dot, but it is great for controlling the system. You can use this in a less used room to control the speakers or devices in other rooms.
title: Excellent Extender

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Debbie Farrow
content: This is in my bathroom, so very handy. I have music while in the shower, can check the time and so many more things. The speaker is not like the bigger Echos, but it works fine in a small bathroom.
title: Echo Flex

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Annie
content: Really like this little thing. Works great in places where you don't have room for a Dot and have an outlet. Very happy with this as long as you do not need good sound as the speaker is very small.
title: Works Great!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Tina
content: Perfect for my spare room. I have smart lights in the room, now guests staying in the room can turn them off and on. The USB port is great for guests to be able to recharge devices! I have 2 Echoes and a Dot so this was just what I needed for this room!
title: Just what I needed!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: James Hendrickson
content: Echo Flex is easy, cheap and small; so it is flexible. It works great in the bathroom, even while taking a shower! The sound is great for Christian music, maybe others, where you want to clearly hear the words!
title: Sounds great for voice.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Angie Rowland
content: It's great in theory. The sound quality is supremely lacking, accuracy is about 50/50. With some tweaks this device could be incredible. That being said it has its helpful sides acting as a 'signal booster's for rooms without a device.
title: Great, in theory

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: ldiggity
content: Works great, lots of things Alexa can do, although I haven't scratched the surface yet. Sounds great for a little speaker and can integrate with Xbox one and other Bluetooth devices. Great price as well! My family loves it and so do I.
title: Great value for the price.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Ben
content: In the never-ending quest to get Alexa into the entire house,  this along with the Input are the best products ever. No more worrying about running the USB cable or it getting unplugged. Huge fan!
title: Great for the bedroom!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Andrew R.
content: I’m a Brit and so I have to have the UK Alexa. For some reason, these don’t work at all well with the UK Alexa. I can speak directly into the mic, and I may as well be speaking an ancient dialect from Planet Vorgon for the help Alexa gives me.
title: Voice recognition is rubbish

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Check Mark
content: A neat little product, very easy to use and setup Sound quality is not great, but it works very well and recognizes commands very easily The usb is very useful, even for regular charging
title: Neat

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: David Guerra
content: This Alexa Flex delivers right where we need it. Having the two Echo devices in separate parts of the house meant we had to increase our volume for those Echo to hear us. The Flex fills in that gap. Excellent
title: Great Device for the Price and the need

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: KM
content: I like this unit because there is no need for the usb cord.  You can plug it right in.  I use it in the bathroom and purchased the optional smart night light.  It's great.  The speaker is not as clear as the other units, but it serves the purpose.
title: Alexa in my Bathroom

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: JPeppy
content: The echo series of devices ship with limited volume control. The lowest setting is still too loud. When set up in a small room the flex's tinny speakers are loud and annoying. Hopefully Amazon will address this with better speakers and a software update for all echo devices to allow more granular audio volume controls.
title: Sound quality is low but otherwise a great device

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Tim W
content: Microphone is only good for 8-10 feet. Need to shout and have silence otherwise. Can’t focus on one voice.  Audio isn’t good for music, but didn’t expect it to be. Use with a Bluetooth speaker for such purpose.
title: Microphone poor, only good for a very small room

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Gregory Schneck
content: Always wondered why Alexa was not designed like this from the start. Compact, convenient, no cords or adaptors. Just pug them in all over the house; hall ways, garage, every room. Make an Alexa command or request from anywhere. It is like being able to speak to my house vs. an Alexa in the other room.
title: How Alexa should have been designed from the start

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Stacey
content: It works great but sound quality for music is not great. This is about what I expected for $15. I love that it plugs into the ac outlet. I would pay 3x more for one with a better speaker and mic.
title: Good value for the money!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: tyler
content: I use this in my kids room to play music at night and it works for that. The speaker isn't great quality but the reviews stated as much so I expected as much. Its a great device for what I use it for
title: Great for its use

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: puddingpie247
content: Good for what I needed it for. I needed to have Alex in close proximity to my hottub that has Bluetooth speakers. I am able to keep this device outside inside the covered wall outlet box near my hottub. This is a lot more convenient than the using the echo dot I was using previously that didn’t fit in the box.
title: Perfect for my application

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: G C
content: I should've purchased more of these. This was link to my account before I received it and right out of the box and plugged it in, it connected to my system and was working that fast. I'm getting  more! 👍🏼💯
title: Best purchase made!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Vanessa
content: I’m extremely disappointed in the sound quality.  My iPhone is louder then this speaker.  Not at all like I expected.  I have it in the bathroom and if you have the water on you can not hear the music at all. Big let down
title: Poor soubd

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: veronica smith
content: I placed the alexa flex in my garage....but frankly I would've been better off just putting a echo device in its place the speaker on the device is terrible disappointed with the product could've been alot better
title: Terrible speaker...just purchase a echo

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Retwahine
content: I can't stop it.  For example, I ask it to play iHeart.  It plays it.  But when I want it to stop it won't.  I have to unplug it.  I have two other "Alexa" and they stop when I say "Alexa Stop".
title: The sound is not as good as the more expensive ones but that's a given.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Rick Lattimer
content: Very fun little thing!  I get a kick out of being “welcomed home” by this thing. (I have the motion sensor plugged in). Not very good sound quality when playing music, but it’s not really for music, it’s voice quality is good tho.
title: Easy to set up and use.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Dizzy Fizzles
content: I really didn't expect it to be that good.  I am so surprised!  Way better than expected.  I thought the sound would be horrible but it is good.  For the price you can't beat this.  Now I just need a robot dog etc. etc.
title: Amazed!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Ged
content: Small form factor is great. If it could rotate, it would be better. Sounds pretty bad but it is not supposed to be a speaker anyways. We paired it with our bluetooth speaker and problem solved.
title: Good for the price

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Shane S
content: Likes: it plugs into an outlet and stays there, wish the echo dot 3 did the same You can plug a mini jack intomit and use your own speaker Dislikes: it does nothing more than an echo dot does only it's sound is horrible. For 10$ more get the echo dot
title: Bettor off getting the echo dot 3 far better sound

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
content: We actually got this because our rabbit kept chewing threw our Echo Dot cord and it is perfect. I prefer the sound quality from Echo Dot and the Show 5, but this is the best option in areas where the rabbit roams freely.
title: This is a great option for people with small pets

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Retired
content: I like having this in my office, but the sound is not good.  I borrowed a speaker to use. It's Right next to my computer, were I make appointments, Alexa does this so much quicker than I could. Do not use for music unless you get a speaker.
title: Easy to use

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Pat A.
content: Is perfect for what I want it for. I put it in my bedroom and use it as an alarm clock, weather checker and music for when I'm getting ready for the day. Plus its small. I don't use it loudly.
title: I don't use it for loud music

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Charles D. S. Valentine
content: The Flex is a great way to get an Alexa speaker in every room for a cheap, cheap price. I also love the two add-ons try are available for purchase separately. I've noticed that the sounds quality isn't as good as other Alexa devices (doesn't matter to me, just an observation) and I wish the life sensor on the night light add-on could be shut off. It's probably not a huge drain on electricity, but the light comes on ALL THE TIME, even in the middle of the day since I have mine in my utility room with no windows.
title: Solid A product

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Momahen
content: I preordered 3 for my kids for Christmas, we have a show and an echo b for we love. The flex is awful you can barely hear it even setting beside it with ear to speaker and it's worse on the receiving end you can barely hear at all. Safe yourself and just buy a dot.
title: Wish I would have saved myself and bought dots

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Grumpy Munchkin
content: I have a bunch of Echo devices throughout my house.  I added a Flex in my garage for general announcements and in a pavilion by my pool where I have other speaker capabilities.  So far, they are working perfectly!
title: Great Tier 2 Device

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Irish Bell
content: I bought two, one for each of my teenager's rooms, which allows me to get their attention fron the kutchen, where our Alexa is, without needing to yell for them. Their rooms are on different floors from the kitchen, and each other, so also less stairs for me when dinner' s ready.
title: Very useful

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: S. Kornis
content: I ordered this for my front bathroom, so I could enjoy music while getting ready for work.  The sound was so bad, I sent it back.
title: tin can sound

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: michael mclaughlin
content: Sound quality isn’t as good as the Echo Dot but very acceptable.  Mine is in my workout room and plays good music to exercise by.  Also I don’t have to yell to get lights turned when I come home in the dark as it’s located near my garage entrance.
title: Good extra Alexa access for rooms used infrequently.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Blue
content: While getting ready in the morning for the day ahead and in the evening for bed. I just ask for my news briefing. So I get news, weather and sports.There’s no high tech speaker in it, but that’s fine for what I use it for. It may be one of the easiest Echo device I have
title: Good for listening to new, weather, and sports

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: E. Spilker
content: Perfect for the outlet in my bathroom. I can listen to the news while I get ready in the morning. Audio quality is faulty low, think transistor radio but it's fine for the news and weather...
title: Works as expected

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Lourie
content: Great for an area like laundry rooms, ect... just for the little added functionality purpose it word great, voice quality not great at all, Speakers very poor. Voice recognition: have to repeat to many times. Works  great with Alexa.
title: Its okay for added functionality.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Susan MH
content: This is an excellent product for extending the range of an echo plus. I have an open floor plan and my echo plus is in the living room. Instead of buying an Echo Dot for my kitchen, I purchased this echo flex. It works beautifully and paired easily. Highly recommend!
title: As described

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Scott Luther
content: It's very useful and impressive for the price. Only oddity is that we can set the speaker voice volume--except for music playback. What if I want our dear Alexa to use a softer or louder voice?
title: Very handy, but no voice volume control

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Purplebutterflyz
content: I purchased three of these with my Echo Dot.  They are a great extension. Wanting to get a couple of more so I have complete coverage everywhere for my audio books, music, front door alerts etc.
title: Great extension for my Echo Dot

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: MurrDog
content: Just buy an echo whenever it is on sale - sound on this device is TERRIBLE.  Way too big for what it does which is pretty much not much of anything - waste of money when compared with Echo device.
title: Why does it even exist?

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Yamina
content: It gets the job done, right now, I keep it between the bedroom and the bathroom, if I want to hear some songs during shower timer, or if I want some info while I’m taking a nap. But, the sound quality is not very nice like the echo dot I keep for my kitchen, I love that thing.
title: The sound quality is like a tin can, but it’s portable

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: silvertopfox
content: Works just fine with my echo show and dot. It’s in the front room and is barely noticeable on the wall. Works fine for a little guy... but it’s no Bose speaker... but didn’t get it for the music!
title: Cute little guy!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Ms. Erika
content: The speaker size, price and available USB port are what attracted me to the purchase. Using them for internal communication between classrooms, kitchen, and myself on a phone. I followed the recommended location rules - but it still doesn't "hear" me and comes up with the oddest of answers. The highest volume option is not very loud at all. - Continuing to attempt using them as internal speaker system. Oddly one speaker seems to listen to me through the wall and does exactly as I ask the one 2 feet away from me couldn't preform.
title: Needs to be a but louder. Still using 👍

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Greg T
content: Actually a handy little addon to the Echo family. Handy for those areas where the larger units aren't needed.  I added the night light which works very well. The sound is ok, not as rich as the main Echo devices.
title: Nice Echo addon.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: David M.
content: I really do think this fills a gap in the market for home automation fans, but the weak speakers and microphones make it less than a 5 star review. It is nice that Amazon is thinking about a flexible system though. Maybe version 2.0 will be a bit more polished.
title: Handy, but not great

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Ramc
content: Must have device with its low price, good sound quality. This was my 5th Alexa device after 1st, 2nd, Alexa show, Alexa Car. Simple design with plug and play by cutting the wires. Easy to take away with you and play. Easy to connect with Bluetooth speaker if we need better sound quality. Over all, am super happy. Big thanks to Amazon.
title: Go & Buy 2 Pack, it’s worth for your money.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Philip C George
content: The ease of set up and size are great but the best plus is the seemingly more sensitive microphone.  Still the annoying misunderstanding of commands but far less than the original, larger models.
title: Plug and play with better mic

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: MickieDe
content: The Flex is great for the laundry room and closet. Now I don’t have to stop what I am doing to walk into another room to ask Alexa a question. I wouldn’t use it for listening to music but the sound quality is fine for asking questions. I am thinking of getting another for the garage.
title: Love the convenience

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Middletown Metal Fan
content: We got this item when it was on sale and it allows us to turn a lamp on and off connected to an Amazon Smart Plug, which we also got on sale here, with Alexa Voice Commands.  Works just right and was at the right price, so we couldn't pass it up.
title: Does Just What We Need It To Do

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Don N
content: I like the slim profile of the Flex.  However, it is a bit wide, and it takes up a bit more space on a four outlet plug than I like.  I work around that and overall enjoy having the Flex.
title: It works perfectly !

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Albert
content: This is great. The only thing i think could be better is the volume of the speaker. Not for playing music or anything, just so Alexa's voice is a little easier to hear when she responds.
title: Great for the kitchen

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: GTH
content: Great for extending Alexa capabilities to a room that does not need the full range sound of a echo dot or view. Sound is equivalent to sound quality of an iPhone on speaker.
title: Good as a range extender for your nearby Alex’s devices

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Travis Richards
content: This is amazing for the cheap price. The sound quality is not that good but that's what they make speakers for. Also for the really low price how can I complain. I used it to add voice control for my devices in another room and it worked perfectly.
title: For the price this is amazing

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Jeanette milgram
content: I love having this, it works perfectly with my Echo Dot and is easy to connect and use. My only disappointment is the sound quality, as opposed to the Echo Dot (great sound) this sounds tinny, but I like anyway. 👍
title: Doesn't sound as good as the Echo Dot

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Valerie
content: The flex plug works fine for basic Alexa functions.  However, if you want it to play any music or news, the sound quality is very poor.  I would recommend buying a dot or echo instead of the flex.
title: Not what I expected

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: HoosierPa
content: Suitable where a  Dot is not but sound quality in far inferior for music. It is compact for picking up commands and reading you the news and weather. Ours is in a small rest room outlet.
title: Convenient but music quality lacking

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Andrew Morris
content: Used in hotel room while on a recent trip - once setup to appropriate WiFi it worked great.Also brought small Bluetooth speaker for improved sound quality. At current price point it's a good buy
title: Good Portable solution

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: gm
content: Had higher expectations for the sound quality. Echo dot 3rd gen sound quality is far better then this product. There are much smaller, much cheaper products with much better sound quality. This product might be good for a small kids bathroom, but that's about it. If you're looking for a compact high sound quality product look somewhere else. Amazon should discontinue this product or drastically improve the sound quality in the next version.
title: Very poor sound quality

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Raymond K.
content: Great functionality at low price point. The motion detector add-on is the reason I purchased. I keep it in my dining room to have Alexa announce to my dogs “Don’t you potty in here!”...hilarious and effective. The speaker is a little weaker thank dot but great price
title: Great Alexa functionality at a cheap price.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: P. Driscoll
content: Have the night light for it and it does not turn on or off automatically based on lighting. Can’t daisy chain items. No way to add the motion detector onto the night light....not sure if the motion detector has a spot to add the night light.
title: Nothing to get excited about

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Daniel G.
content: I spend easily 45 minutes a day screaming myself hoarse at this thing to carry out a command it just did with no issue 10 minutes ago. It would work better as a paper-weight.
title: The Worst Echo There Is

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: John Davis
content: It doesn't get more simple than this.  I have tried setting up a random echo here or there and by the time I call out to where it would be useful, someone had hyjacked the micro USB fir something else.  Not with this guy!  Sound sux but was to be expected.
title: Perfect tweak!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Libo
content: I like that is easy to plug in and is ready to go after set up. Also que I can turn it into a multicolor night light and dim it down.  It the sound quality, though it is not terrible is way less that I was expecting. I would invest better on an echo dot. It works great as an Alexa and it is a great devices just the sound quality is not the best
title: Good for the garage

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: moi
content: This is great for when you don’t have anywhere to set another Alexa device since it just plugs to the wall. It works well. Sound quality is not the best, but works perfectly fine for basic commands and notifications.
title: Inexpensive solution

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Jes
content: Compact for bathroom wall plugs. Must get nightlite accessory. Great for checking the news, weather & a little background music in bathroom where you not so concerned about hi quality sound.
title: Perfect for Bathrooms

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Dorrie
content: I live in a studio apartment & I have my echo dot in the main living area.  I decided to get the flex for my kitchen so I don’t have to raise my voice or physically walk into the other room to add to grocery list, play music, weather, etc.  The volume is just loud enough & not overpowering for this space.  I don’t have the room for the Echo show 8, so this is perfect.  I highly recommend.  I will more likely purchase another for my bathroom & walk in closet.
title: Perfect addition to small spaces!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Randall
content: I like how it fits in the outlet and does not need separate plug.  it's a little hard of hearing as the microphone needs it fairly quiet to receive commands as compared to an echo dot.
title: As expected

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: TKOSR
content: This is a very small, compact plug-in device. Sound is kind of tinny but it is great for an area like a basement. I set mine up next to my treadmill and it is good enough for that use. It is worth the $10 that I paid for it.
title: Don't set your expectations too high.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Stephen Feather
content: Don't expect to listen to any music on this thing.  But then, I didn't buy it for that purpose.  I bought it so I wouldn't have to shout from the kitchen to the living room.  The alexa voice is clear.  It understands well.  Ours is mounted in an outlet under the cabinets.
title: Great as a receiver, terrible as a speaker

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Dick P
content: I like the idea of having a cheap alternative to the dot. Also like the nightlight I put on it. Unfortunately, it stopped working after about a month in my bathroom. I had an Echo Dot in the same place for a year and a half so it is not the humidity. Tried to get a replacement.  No go. Had to return for credit and buy new. Exchange cost me 5 bucks. Had the second one in for about a month. Still working. Cross my fingers
title: Good idea but...

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: mgcarpenter
content: Works as a mini Alexa for my kitchen, I use it for a kitchen timer. Speaker is mono but still audible for simple things. Well worth the $ if you can still get it for $14 with the code.
title: What I needed for the kitchen

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: TX
content: These things can’t hear you. I have to literally yell at it to recognize me. The sound quality is comparable to a Motorola RAZR from 2005. I do like that they stay on the wall & blend but, i don’t like having to scream at it. Lol.
title: Alexa. Alexa. ALEXA. AALLEEXXAA. *pling*

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Charlene Duffin
content: Works okay. Got for a great price. Maybe my house is too small but my other Alexa Echo’s pick up before this does. Closed the door and whispered to it, it the answered! Not that loud.
title: Works decent

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: RaggedGlory2000
content: I used this device in conjunction with a night light. The small footprint is nice but I would only recommend for voice commands, not for music.
title: Nice size and convenient but sound is only so so

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Steve P.
content: Wanted Alexa functionality in the unfinished section of my basement and this device was perfect.  No need for a decent speaker since I won't play music here - just commands and news.
title: Easy Alexa Add

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Mrs. K
content: Sounds a little tinny, otherwise it’s great. Used for a back bedroom so we don’t have to shout down the hall to the other devices. We also got the first light add on which is a great night light.
title: Great for spare rooms.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Mario
content: Overall great product. Can’t communicate very well when dropping in a call with family. Mics need a bit of improvement. Sound is loud enough for communication and even some on the go music (Like, while passing through a hallway or brushing your teeth on the bathroom) PS: this is not suitable for listening to music while showering, for that I recommend pairing a speaker or a better echo device. Hard to intercom with the mics built-in though
title: Mics should be improved. Overall good product

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Frank Mohr
content: Once again Amazon hit it out of the park I'm using it in my outdoor shed gets it with my wifi I bought a 2nd one for my bathroom works like any other Amazon AI Alexa sound is decent
title: Extremely Happy

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: D. Williams
content: Plug it in and it's basically ready to go!  Sound quality is good enough to hear weather and other speech responses in a quiet room.  I haven't used the BlueTooth interface for it to stream to an external speaker, which I suspect works well. Plug size is slightly larger than typical wall-warts/power bricks, but it is positioned so as not to interfere with the second socket on an outlet.  The USB power enables charging of devices - and powers accessors (like the optional motion sensor).
title: Yes, it's an Echo for interface /w Alexa - plug-in makes it easy.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Matthew J. Faulkner
content: I use this for local control of my office. Inexpensive and easy to set up. I gave it 5 stars for sound quality because the responses are clear and I do not expect to use it for music.
title: So easy to set up

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: T. Grider
content: ...that also serves as a night light with the night light attachment. So, for us, the old night light has become an Alexa enabled night light in our guest bath. It works wonderfully.
title: Nicely compact unit...

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Martin Lazar
content: The Alex Flex has been a good tool to have in my kitchen where I don’t have a lot of space for even a dot.  It normally recognizes my voice fairly well although occasionally the dot I have in my next room will pick up my voice when this misses it.  The only week point is the quality of the speaker.  The quality sounds like a really cheap radio.  It has no quality in any range.  Good for timers, or answering questions.  Not so good for listening to music.
title: Good product but could be better.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Kristina Padelli
content: Bought to have in my kitchen so it would take up a lot of counter space. I listen to a lot of music and thought it would be a great addition to my downstairs. The quality of the sound is good, but it doesn't get very loud. If you want something louder I'd get another echo over the flex.
title: Sound doesn't get very loud

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Paulo Juarez
content: Excelente aditamento para complementar los espacios donde no puedes poner un echo normal. Fácil integración con todos los dispositivos. Muy recomendable.
title: Excelente echo

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Lodis Lulu
content: We have this in our bathrooms. Its not as loud and bass-y as the other alexa speaker devices but it does the job especially when you just want to sit in the bathroom and listen to NPR for a bit. Yeah, its not bad.
title: Good for bathroom

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Jason Fisher
content: It’s okay. Doesn’t hear us as well as a dot or other Echo devices. Sound quality is horrible so it’s connected to a separate speaker. Like how it plugs into an outlet and is out of the way.
title: Meh.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: JOAN MAURENCE
content: Me encanta , si la colocas en varias parte de la casa tienes opción de dirigir los comandos desde cualquier lugar de la casa
title: Fantástico

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: DatGuy
content: Handy, small Alexa unit that performs well. Small speaker that can be difficult to hear. Definitely not for music listening. I wouldn’t recommend it as your “primary” Alexa unit.
title: Handy Little Unit, But Not For Listening to Music

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: George William Kennedy
content: will not work in big rooms. I decided to place it in laundry room since I had room for it. again not for big rooms at all. im glade I got one but also kinda wish it was louder...
title: not great but is ok.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: rodolfo perez
content: excelente funciona perfecto, esperaba menos de el lo hace todo sin problemas, estoy consiente que no es un altavoz para la música , pero los comunicados lo hace a la perfección!!!!
title: excelente

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Randy S
content: I have installed, switches, plugs, door locks and a thermostat to work with Alexa.  I had a void that my Echo Dots did not cover.  By adding the Flex I have covered that void.  I knew from the reviews the sound quality was lacking on the Flex, but that was not important since my goal was to fill the area where my Dots could not hear me.
title: Echo Flex Fills The Voids

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Customer
content: Purchased one for my office and one for my bathroom so I could move my Echo Dots to places where I needed louder volume.  These are perfect for my needs.  Will be purchasing another for my kitchen, soon.
title: Does everything the other Echo devices do, just not as loud.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: James C McLellan
content: This product has performed as I hoped it would. I wanted to have my lights turn on in my home as I entered & I put the flex just as I come in the door & can turn on whichever lights in whichever room I want.
title: Works

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Jay Ashford
content: The sound quality is not very good for playing music. It is very similiar to the sound of an old school pocket radio. The voice recognition is not on par with the Echo Dot. When querying the Echo Flex the Echo Dot in another room will respond. I purchased the Echo Flex for announcing timers and alerts from the RING. It can be intergrated with the Alexa enabled television. The setup was very easy using the Alexa appm
title: The purchase was worth the price paid.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Nana
content: This is great I can drop in with my echo show and talk to kids if I need something best thing is it al let’s me know if someone is in my driveway from my cameras definitely worth it
title: This is great

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Chas NJ
content: Besides sound, the unit performs commands no different than any other Alexa. However, the sound, it is ground floor basic. Expect nothing, in a quiet room you can understand it giving you the time or temperature, but not much more.
title: Understandably -  the sound is low quality

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Kingdom Knight
content: Listening to music in the shower is a dream.
title: Water without electricity.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: D. Morse
content: It works perfectly and is very compact.  In fact, the wifi connection seems a bit more robust than the Dot.  My microwave oven would sometimes block the Dot connection but I haven't had that problem with the Flex. Based on Amazon's description I was not expecting good sound.  I wasn't disappointed.  It really isn't very good, but that's not a problem for the way I'm using it.
title: Nice form factor, so-so sound

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Rebecca Lorenzana
content: Easy to setup with amazon app. Not sure you can use it without setting up echo first, but it recognized the device once i turned it on and now i can speak to Alexa in the kitchen.
title: Must have to expand Alexa at home

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: ron_in_california
content: Love the Alex in this easy to place flexible device, but the sound is like a tin can, reminds me of my old 9V transistor radio.  Yes, you can use an external Bluetooth speaker, but then it doesn't seem to be as good in figuring out voice commands.....not sure why.
title: Alexa is good, sound not so much

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Carl Floyd
content: speaker is very poor for music, and really only for voice. I had intended it for my bathroom for music during showers and what not.... the speaker has left me wishing I had just bought a dot... i would not buy it again.
title: speaker is not for any kind of music

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Woodworker10
content: This device is terrific, plug and play. I bought two and placed them in different rooms,  each with an external bluetooth speaker. Works wonderfully! Practically invisible.
title: Convenient, easy to use expansion device

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: James Freeman
content: I set this in my guest room to control the lights in there. Hears us pretty well but the voice is small and tinny. But I didn't expect it to sound like the full size unit.
title: Good a a secondary or tertiary unit.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: J. J. R.
content: I actually have better luck with the voice recognition on the Echo Flex vs. the Echo Dot, which is surprising. I wish there were a power pass-through or a smart plug built into this device, seems like a big wasted opportunity given the form factor. The sound quality is very bad but you probably won't buy this for listening to music.
title: If you can get it on sale it is a great value

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Amy K.
content: I thought it would be easier to connect because I chose add to my network when I placed the order.  I ended up calling support to get it done after failing to connect multiple times.
title: Not as easy as I thought

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Laikken
content: It’s was a gift for my 77 year old grandpa. He loves it!! Obviously it’s not going to be loud enough for a house party but it’s definitely got some volume to it so you could play music for people within the room to hear. He has fun messing with Alexa, it helps integrate him in with today’s technology.
title: Grandparent friendly

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: ZooLife
content: They do not hear or respond nearly as well as the other Echo products.  Have to call to it several times to wake it up.  Nice and convenient size though,and being able to add things on to it are nice but they are too pricey currently.
title: They do not respond nearly as well as the Echos or Echo Dot.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Deanna Lynn
content: It is a great way to have Alexa but for less money. The Alexa functions are all there! The speaker quality is not great, but its really easy to bluetooth to a better speaker, so that's what I do and it works great!! :)
title: Good product for the price!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: James Pavlick
content: This was incredibly easy to install.  It really was as simple as plugging it in.  It took ten seconds. It can do everything the larger size Alexa devices can do.
title: Very easy to install

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: SEAMAZON10
content: This flex works as designed, but the audio is only for voice commands, and not designed for playing music.  Overall the product works very well and picks up my voice from across the room.
title: Works well, non-music speaker

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Andrew C. Martin
content: This product is not the echo dot. These are OK but overall quality is poor. They have a difficult time hearing you. Along with that the sound quality while playing music is less than mediocre.
title: Some improvements needed but does its job.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Kyle
content: These are okay, but honestly not the best. They were a good deal when I got them, though, so I'll be keeping them. They work well enough in rooms that aren't used much.
title: Pretty okay

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Tylzia
content: I got this device as part of a bundle deal with the Echo. I plugged it into my kitchen and I love it. I think it’s also great for the bathroom to add a nice upscale feel to your home. I really enjoy using the drop-in, intercom, and announcement features. Definitely recommend as an add-on!
title: This is a great addition!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Pankaj
content: Alexa affordable for everyone. Got it under deal for $15. It’s nice to have such a small device with speaker built in. Was ain’t the can’t of echo input but this thing works like a charm.
title: Tiny yet powerful

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Irwin W. Fisk
content: These are great as inexpensive auxiliary add ons for the show Alexa.  The sound quality is poor, but there serve their purpose in bathrooms and other out of the way places in a house.
title: Good Value

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Kevin B
content: I knew going in that the Flex wasn't going to sound as good as the Echo because of a smaller speaker.  I use it in the bedroom for news/weather reports in the morning, not specifically for music, though it is used occasionally for that.  It works well as intended.  If I ever need a more dynamic speaker, I'll upgrade to an Echo Dot.
title: Useful, but not necessarily for music.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: SkoryJ
content: Really like the small size and Alexa responds very well. The speaker is not great, but was not expecting it to be. I will probably change out my dots for these since I don’t use them for music anyway.
title: Nice and nice price

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Be4me
content: This is the perfect addition to the garage - the only place we DON’T have a device.  It works well but the speakers aren’t anything to brag about. But, hey, it’s the garage.
title: Good addition to our line-up of Echos

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Tonya W
content: Bought these to go in our bathrooms. The speakers are meh quality and it doesn't go very loud. So not good to use for shower tunes but nice with a bath or not having to yell when you forget a towel.
title: Good value

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: J. Blackston
content: I have an Amazon Echo and Echo Show. I needed an Alexa enabled device to use in our Home Theater Room to control the lights before and after a movie. The Echo Flex works great. This is an inexpensive way to add Alexa to other rooms in your echo family.
title: Work Great in our Theater Room

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Jennifer A. Ellison
content: I have quite a few of these in my home, and I really do love them.  It makes it easy to control lights in my home, etc. and I love having music in every house with these speakers.
title: Love this!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: E_HILLMAN
content: Ok and good for adding voice control etc. To a bathroom or.other place.not suitable for a full echo but the voice detection is no where near expected or other echo devices.
title: Good but not on par or great

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Heyijustmetyou
content: Your browser does not support HTML5 video. I'm satisfied. I read all the reviews that it's no good but it works for me. I just wanna play music while I'm in the bathroom.
title: Easy set up, decent sound

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: David Brettin
content: Great for late night talk radio and better than the other models They are to deep Bass And just a bit noise At odd times in the night This is more milder than the other ones So, the amp isn't louder and it doesn't disturb
title: It won't disturb ,late night talk radio is it's better side

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Mac
content: Motion sensor will not work with it
title: Motion sensor won’t work with Alexa

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Yoqi Tongburg
content: It automatically joins the wifi and the Echo Dot.  It is very convenient to setup.  Apparently the device is already linked to the account under Amazon Alexa app before shipping out.  Great service! Physically it looks very solid build and the sound quality is good as well.
title: Extremely Easy to Setup

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Jans Read
content: This little plug connects to Alexa adding coverage and easy to get  info on weather, traffic, time etc.  The voice quality is not that great for music but fine for information.
title: Good for the money

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Evansmini2012
content: Very disappointed in the sound quality.
title: Disappointed

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: therosses5
content: Bought this for a 50% off promo. Perfect for our garage. Would not pay more than $15 for another. I hope they come down in price. Would be a great gift for birthdays and Christmas.
title: Pleasantly surprised.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Chelsey Forry
content: the sound quality is ok but the convenience and ease is superb.  if you are used to using Alexa then you will want a plug for every room, especially odd rooms like garage/ attic/ unfinished basement space.  easier than an echo dot and takes up the space of a bulky plug (as in much more minimal than an echo dot), these have become a fave tech gift for 2019.
title: so quick & easy

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Kristie Byrd
content: I agree with the other comments. This thing has zero sound. I purchased 1 for my daughters bedroom for a alarm and to announce in her room but the volume is a major issue. Waste of money!
title: Don’t buy it!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Gary A. Wehrs
content: Easy to add and works just fine.  Added several throughout the house so I don't have to yell for Alexa to hear me.  Example:. I have an Echo in the living room but I need to control an Amazon Fire TV in the kitchen.  Added a Flex to the kitchen area and now Alexa can be controlled without yelling to the living room.
title: Easy expansion of Alexa through the house.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: miTsirraH
content: I paired this with my Bose Soundlink speaker using Bluetooth in my office. Now my $10 flex is the best sounding echo in the house. I bought another one for the garage for when I am working in there. It also doubles as a usb charger.
title: Big Bang for the buck on Prime Day

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: TFITZ
content: I really wanted to like this because I'm an Amazon Echo fan, but this was nothing like the others. It didn't understand me and worked sporadically. There's really no use for it. Just something to have, but not needed or worth paying for.
title: Didn't meet expectations

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: meg
content: I am still unsure if keeping it, sometimes it works and sometimes it does not.  I often have to unplug and re-plug it back in to get it to work, which is really becoming annoying.
title: Unsure

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: rfont125
content: Although I had hoped for slightly higher volume output, for the price this is a fantastic little Alexa gadget. Have it plugged in the bathroom with the auto night light that can emit different colors of my choosing - nice little assistant when I’m getting ready for work in the morning and determining the weather + my events for the day. Sound quality is mostly as expected, lower fidelity but you get what you pay for. Still use it for music streaming as well, and it is somewhat audible during a shower.
title: Nice little Alexa gadget for the price.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Jim Utterback
content: This is a great product.  Very small.  Better for plugins that are higher on the wall, such as in the kitchen.  Great response to voice and does everything Alexa should do.  Only problem is the very low sound volume.  Not great to use for a speaker.
title: Great Mini with little volume

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Stephen Hiller
content: I wanted to be able to stream music in my garage so I was using external speakers so I was not concerned about the sound.  Device works great, however, the sound is very tinny.
title: Great for use when sound is not important.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: A. Warmann
content: I got this for the garage.  I wanted something that was small but connected with my other Echo devices.  It fits the bill perfectly.  I had read the reviews about sound quality and I totally agree, not for listening to music, but perfect for connecting to Alexia and others.  Just what I was looking for, plus the added future capability of a night light or motion detector is attractive.
title: Just right.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Jonathan Tenorio
content: It's a decent smart speaker when it works. The sound is very clear for its size. Unfortunately it freezes occasionally and becomes unresponsive.  I can ask her to set a timer 3-4 times with no response, then 20-30 seconds later she sets all the timers at once. I decided to go back to the Dot which I have never had a problem with.
title: Good form factor and sound for its size, but freezes often

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Phillip Underwood
content: Works well, but.... sound is not there!!! Only way you can hear it is to be in a closet with nothing running anywhere close!! I plugged in a set of computer speakers and it sounds great!!! By itself, get hearing aides!!!
title: Poor sound!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Meeser
content: I have an echo dot in my living room so wanted to add one to the bedroom. I also got the night light that works with it. It remembers to start my nightlight when it is dark and turns it off when light.
title: Easy touse

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: George Grote
content: This is a great Alexa for the kitchen.  Hangs on the receptacle, available all the time.  It also has a charging port on the short side.  All in all a great device at a great price.
title: Doesn't take up a lot of space

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Lauren
content: We bought these to replace the baby monitors in my kids rooms and they love them. Being able to ‘call’ mom and dad is fun and they love the lullaby options to listen to before bed. The sound quality isn’t great, but good enough for a small bedroom.
title: Works great! Kids love them.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Gigi Martell
content: Is good to have in the areas of the house that you don’t really hang out in like I have mine in my garage so when I get home I can ask Alexa to turn on the light etc. love it.
title: Great item

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Jenendra Jain
content: Great idea except you can’t daisy chain multiple attachments, you gotta have one echo flex per each accessory you plan on using. Further the accessories can only be controlled  when physically attached to the flex. $15 accessories that don’t latch on to WiFi themselves is too expensive..
title: Yeah sure, but not really...

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Siriuset
content: I had the Flex about five feet away from me on an outlet next to my couch.  It didn't register any of my commands unless I really raised my voice.  Returned it the next day.
title: Microphone a fail

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Akalukz
content: This item was perfect for the bedroom,  we replaced an echo dot.  Cuts out the cord and clutter on the nightstand.  Would recommend for voice control etc, but not music.
title: Easy to use, space saver

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Sandra adams
content: I was amazed at the quality of the speaker on the echo flex.  I put it in my husband’s office.  I tried to set up a speaker for it, in the process the flex speaker came through. We thought it sounded pretty good for music and for news.  Good enough for some background music in the office. Very easy to set up.  Very pleased with this access to Alexa.
title: Speaker better than I expected.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: J. Lloyd
content: The flex serves the purpose I intended it for, adding to the other bedrooms in my house.  If you don't care about the speakers and the sound reproduction you hear, it's clear and I can understand  the replies so it works well, I recommend.
title: They work well

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Fester
content: Two Echo Dots upstairs, and used this Flex for a basement "Alexa Extension". Works well for that purpose. Neither the Echo Dots nor the Flex are designed for playing music but do well with voice reproduction.
title: Works very well as an Alexa extension for my basement

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Kris R
content: I got this for my boys' room since they kept unplugging their dot to use the charger on other things. It is mostly used to make announcements and drop ins. I can talk to them, they respond but it is not possible to hear them at all, even when they shout. I hear them shouting before I hear anything on Alexa. If you want to add Alexa somewhere to turn things on and off, this is the device, but to use in a room for anything other than announcements, this is not the one.
title: Not for communication

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: T. Mynarcik
content: I use this for my daily alarms and music. It is discrete and easy to use. It does everything the echo dot does. I also got the additional plug in nightlight. I highly recommend.
title: I love this!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: william Vaczy
content: I love the concept for my bathroom buy the sound was like a small transistor radio. What I did is move the echo to the bathroom and get a echo plus for the main room. Good move
title: poor sound quality

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Wisteria
content: This is my first echo and I love it. It's small and easy to keep out of the way. I have no problem getting it to respond or hearing it.  I didn't have any issues setting it up. Plan to get another.
title: very happy

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: SwordSaint
content: This gets the job done. It's being used in the kitchen, and works like it should, the flex light comes on at 6pm automatically and you can change the colours via the Alexa app.
title: It works great

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Hasan M
content: i have 2 of these in my house. really like this . really easy to install and works smoothly . i wish the sound quality would be little better. but overall great product
title: love alexa echo flex

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Coffee Drinker
content: The Flex is small and fits in an outlet well.  It handles all the voice commands well.  It is flexible in that you can add a motion detector or night light to it.  Both work well.  The only downfall is the sound quality is tinny but that is to be expected with such a small speaker.  If you use it for its intended purpose (not for playing music) it works great.
title: A good little speaker

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Cruiser08
content: I put one upstairs in the hallway and one in the garage.  Easy to install in minutes  and now we have total home communication.  I also added the night light to the one upstairs, it is perfect.
title: Versatile and easy to install.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: STEELTOWNGIRLPA
content: I bought the light bulbs for my bedroom but I had yell for Alexia to hear me  so I bought the flex to be in sync with my echo dot ….and extension of the Echo ….just an extra speaker ….very happy with it ….
title: bought this to go with my Echo Dot

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Dilokpat Pilaiputhimeth
content: Need to improve on the light connection as when the WIFI signal is lost and reconnect the light is on all the time.  So I have to take off the light and can not put it all the time which is not convenient.
title: Need to improve on the light connection

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Deana Cole
content: I love my Echo Flex. The voice recognition is phenomenal. The sound quality is great. I call my family and friends on it.  I can also listen to the news and music. I'm going to purchase another one.
title: My Echo Flex

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Maria Briseno
content: Your browser does not support HTML5 video. I love that I can drop in on my kids with their echo dot while they do school work in their room and I’m in the kitchen working . I love it!!!! Wish I would have bought more during prime day. $10 bucks was a steal!!
title: LOVE IT!!!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: LL77
content: Bought this for the bathroom, also bought the night light for it. The idea is perfect for the bathroom but the sound is eh.  I wasn’t expecting it to be as good as the other echo devices but it could be better. Overall, it serves the purpose!
title: Flex

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: John Griffin
content: For the price this is a great unit. Only con is the speaker but the price overrides the tinnier sound. It’s in my garage and.  Is smooth enough not to gather dust or dirt like the echo could.
title: Great for garage use.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: J Gillespie
content: Easy to setup, not a bad product. I wish the speakers were better. They are pretty mumbled and volume is very low through the built in. Otherwise would be an excellent product
title: Not very loud and muddy sound

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Ghastly Tech
content: The device works like it is supposed to. The smaller speaker is okay for the voice responses but not suitable for music. I knew this when I purchased the Echo Flex so it has not disappointed and why I give it 5 stars
title: If Sound Quality is Important Pick a Different Echo

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: kimmykaty
content: Works great and doesn’t take up counter space. I was also very easy to set up. I have one in the bathroom and one on my covered back porch. I am always on the back porch and want to ask Alexa something and now I can.
title: Great addition

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Lorna
content: So happy I made this purchase. It’s plugged in next to my bed. I use it for music and sleep sounds to go to sleep. It’s perfect. I have the smart clock attached, it works as a night light as well. If I think of something during the night I need to do I just set a reminder for the morning
title: Music to sleep by

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: David Fischer
content: I only got it as an additional "listening post".  You can connect a bluetooth speaker to it and play music as loud as you want so that's not an issue but I found myself repeating myself more to this one than my other devices so I had to rate it down but it does what I wanted fairly well.
title: Pretty good but I'd rather have an echo on sale!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Le Lien
content: I'm really glad I bought this. I have a small apartment and it is perfect for what I need. I've connected my bluetooth devices and can turn on and off lights and my security with voice command. It's so fun! Now I have a smart apartment!
title: Echo Flex is your friend

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Brianna
content: Not as voice sensitive as the echo dot but it gets the job done and for the price i would say its worth it. The speaker quality is not great so its a pass for music but otherwise solid.
title: Good

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Raymond 3rd
content: This works great. This product is basically a plug in version of the echo dot. Great for bathrooms, garage, Laundry room and any other place you don’t have a place to sit an echo.
title: Mini Version of Echo - Works Great

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Rickkfl
content: First echo product bought. Really like it. Night light is cool. Was able to setup my Vizio TV to use with Alexa and other items. Pretty happy with Alex. Speaker definitely isn't for music but plays music great on my Bluetooth speakers and sound bar. Going to add smart sockets/plugs and switches. Can't really see a problem. Waiting for my blink security cameras to setup with Alexa.
