title: Works great so far. Easy to configure.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: L.B., Orland Park IL
content: great for my out of the way work area.  Does a great job keeping music playing as well as keeping informed as to what's happening in the rest of my smart-connected home.
title: Small but  convenient.  Good at what its designed for.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: MarcoZ
content: Works like a normal Alexa device and integrates with app; my disappointment is in the Flex not hearing me.  It doesn’t react to me most of the time and I have to walk over close to it so it will hear me, recognize my request, and reply.
title: Why can’t she hear me??

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Dawn
content: I love this! It’s small! No cord!  Same capabilities as dot for half the cost!  The sound quality is about 90% clear/crisp as dot or Echo but awesome for what it is!  Attached the light and it’s perfect for kids room!
title: Best Alexa device to date!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Splen
content: It's not much different than an echo dot except it has an USB port and the sound is not up to par.  I also added the motion detector attachment, but the programming for a set time period is not responding.  Hopefully it will improve with time.
title: Still trying to figure it out

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Bernard Strathern
content: Voice commands would carry far enough in to the living, so we added her to our bedroom. Works really well. I now am trying to add a cable speaker to improve sound quality, we'll see how that goes.
title: added to my Alexa system, she is now in my bedroom.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: William M.
content: Product works well as a hallway light.I have not tried the motion sensor yet but Wii review when I plug it in.I like the fact I can turn it on and off by phone also.
title: Would buy again.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: p.r. deutz
content: This product arrived as stated, after pre-ordering.  After a couple of weeks, I got terrible static in the speaker and Alexa doesn't always hear me, and I have to repeat the request two or three times.  This happens when playing music typically.  I may want to return for an exchange, especially since I bought it before the holiday rate of $19.99.
title: Questionable speaker quality

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: BVM
content: I just wanted something small for the laundry room/garage entrance and this works perfect. I didn’t need something with great sound as I have no intention of playing music. My only intended purpose was for operating smart devices and this fits the bill. I did get it for ~ $10 during Prime Days.
title: Good Size for just wanting to operate smart devices

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: SL
content: I have several echos and shows in my house.  The sound quality of this smaller device isn't nearly as good, but  I expected that would be the case.  I only bought this unit for the convenience of access in  my rarely used guest room.
title: Works great

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Tankman6394
content: Amazon might be on to something here, the idea is great and pretty well executed. The only down side to this is the volume, sound quality is there but max volume is just underwhelming. I purchased this for my bathroom so I could listen to music while I shower. At vol10 it’s just a little to quiet to hear over the water. I saw that had a night light or motion sensor attachment, if they could make a speaker so you could jam out this would me a must buy item if you like listen to music while you shower.
title: Almost nailed it!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: King Family
content: Great for extra coverage anywhere there's an outlet. Handy for my stairs to use commands to turn on lights. Extends voice coverage throught my home.
title: Good for extra voice coverage.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Pipe guy
content: Much lower quality then an echo dot.  both in sound and in operation. She doesn't respond most of the time.  I wanted a wall mount near the door, but this is useless
title: She doesn't listen

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Spykes
content: These are great to add to a shop or work space with out having to worry about destroying a higher end AI. Pair it with a 3.5 aux to a speaker and it’ll pick up where the sound quality lacks
title: Great add on to a work space needs a beefier speaker

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: fluffythepuffy
content: This thing is garbage. Spend the few extra dollars and get yourselves a better wireless speaker. Sound is horrible a DOESNT project well at all. Even in a confined space. Buy at tour own expense!
title: Garbage. Waste of time and money!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: R. Laiken
content: This is a perfect addition to our family of Echo products. We have it in the kitchen tucked in an outlet near the coffee maker...small and so helpful to ask Alexa anything you need while you’re cooking...quick setup
title: Great addition to Echo products

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: LMD
content: Echo is a good name for this item because the sound quality is so poor. It sounds very "tinny". The volume is not adjustable.  It does not respond as well as the Alexa Dot.  I do not recommend it.
title: AleXa Echo Flex

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Vic Mclendon
content: I’m playing with these. I have three, all with the motion detectors now. I am really enjoying playing them and have written little good morning and good afternoon scripts. I got the introductory rate, so the price was incredible.
title: Great Fun device

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: bigb0ii
content: The echo flex plus the motion sensor does everything I need it to do. Easy to set up with zero hassle once it up. Turns lights on and off perfectly. Highly recommended for bathrooms and kitchens for easy handfree entries and exits.
title: Perfect

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Marilyn
content: I bought the optional clock and put this in the bathroom. Keeps me on time and I can add to my shopping or to do list. I’m at an age that when I think of something I better get it recorded right away! Would not recommend this for listening to music, a little tinny.
title: Great for the bathroom

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: DB
content: Works well for intercom purposes as well as just general answering to questions that may arise in the rooms where they were placed. Not the best sound quality, but good for the purpose being used.
title: Echo Flex works great for rooms where it serves as an intercom

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Ms. Kelly
content: Love this thing, bought it to use at Christmas to turn  my tree on and off as the plug in was hidden behind the tree! Now I use it all the time!!! Will buy again!
title: LOVE THIS THING!!! ❤️

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Printans
content: I use the Flex primarily for music.  It's built in speaker is crap, but I use the line out to connect to external speaker systems.  I have Flex modules in both my office and in the garage to listen to music.  I do use it for other things too, and it works just fine for standard Alexa stuff.  We also have an Echo Dot and a Fire tablet in other parts of the house. For what it enables you to do the Flex is a great product.
title: Great enabler

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Timmy the G
content: Nice and small. I run the audio into my giant old fashioned stereo system and I'm rockin' without stoppin'! Until my wife asks me to turn it down, of course.
title: Just What I Needed

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Bells201
content: This is nice for the garage , laundry or mud room - sound quality is poor but what do want for $20 - which is why it is perfect as just a voice controlled device
title: Great for the price just not as your primary Alexa

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: DCF
content: I like the price and no clutter on counter/desktop.  I use to control under cabinet lighiting from existing power outlet with Alexa controlled plug adapter. I access Alexa in my office and plan to add one in my garage.
title: Good price and hangs from outlet.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: asiam
content: I bought this for the kitchen, my kids have the dots and I love that I can make “Alexa make an announcement” and tell everyone clean your rooms, come upstairs for dinner etc!
title: Going to buy another one for my bedroom

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Pburger
content: I installed the Flex in my bathroom. It is up on the wall out of harms way. It works great and responds accurately to my commands. Audio quality is pretty lame, but that doesn't matter in this setting.
title: Does What An Echo Should

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Chester County
content: Picked this up over the holiday on special along with the night light attachment for our bedroom. Works perfectly and is a nice addition to the Echo system in the house.
title: Nice addition to the Echo system - Bonus when paired w night light

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: RRS
content: I was not aware that this existed and I really like it. it's small enough to have out of the way and still have access to the 2nd plug on the outlet. Cost was also good.
title: Solid unit and compact

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Liz Pearce
content: Using as a night light. Works great.  Like being able to change colors.  Bought as a package so only have 1 flex. Would like to have another for motion detector.
title: Great automatic night night.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Nyolka Hunter
content: I love this device. It allows me to connect with my family like using an intercom, play music throughout the house and get updates with Alexa.  The setup is super easy and price point is excellent!!
title: Staying Connected!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Andrew Y.
content: Holy crap these suckers are sensitive! Usually they pick up on my voice for commands even though I’m closer to my regular Alexa device. The night light is also super helpful and allows you to have Alexa in hallways where you usually can’t
title: Fantastic .

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: BuckeyePops
content: Really like the compact size and the fact it plugs in on it's own. Use Bluetooth to a Bose speaker, so the low quality sound of the Flex is a non issue. Got it on a flash deal also, which makes it awsome.
title: Great value for what it does.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Bunkareeno
content: Space efficient and perfect fit for small areas such as a bathroom, closet or laundry area. Simple setup Audio quality is what you would expect from atiny speaker
title: Perfect for small areas such as a half bath

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Dominic
content: When the echo works it work within reason. That being said it spends more time down due to lost network connects then usable operating time. 2 times In the last 2 week alone I have had to restore and reconnect 4 out of 5 of my echos because they randomly lost connection. And that is the 4th time over all since purchasing them. 2 of which are direct line of site with router and others located within mesh network.
title: Don't work unless it has internet connection!!!!!!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: zman0179
content: This little device does the needful. It recognized voice commands even over background noise and the speaker is good enough to hear the responses. The audio jack is nice to add a better speaker for noisy times.
title: Great device

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: S. Woolley
content: Nice size but the sound quality us not anywhere as good for music so a great controller but function is limited - hope they make a add in speaker it's great in kitchens and bathrooms where you don't want a cord
title: Nice addition for control

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Amazons
content: This is a good and price effective Alexa, the only issue is that most of the times I have to repeat the commands more than once, other than that very much satisfied with the purchase.
title: Mini price effective Alexa

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Elissa
content: Adding Alexa to any room couldn’t get any more simple. You don’t need to waste space on table tops with this device. I love the simplicity of this flex and now can listen to music, say commands and ask questions anywhere in the house. Love these!
title: Love!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Stephen C
content: As other had said the speaker or low with out depth. It does the job as having Alexa respond without screaming into the other room Wish list that it does not do. USB port could be remotely controlled. Secondary to main echo, Ie no alerts or notifications.
title: As expected wish it did more.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: A. Stoughton
content: This device has been great. I bought this for my mom and was able to attach a motion detector to it. Now, whenever she gets up in the middle of the night, her bedside table light and bathroom light automatically turn on. It makes late night trips to the bathroom much safer for her.
title: Good for older parents

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: J. Mom
content: Super easy syncing with Alexa app. Speaker doesn’t have a +/- adjustment like Echo dot. I use mainly to give commands to my smart plug from bedroom (Alexa turn on the coffeemaker).
title: Flex is a good portable speaker

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Tony Gutierrez
content: I plugged it in my bathroom and in less than five minutes my echo flex was linked to my account and doing the job just like my other the regular echos that I own. It is true that the speaker is not that good but once you hook it up to a bluetooth speaker then your fine
title: Does the job just like the regular echo

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: M998
content: When on prime day sale for $10 this unit makes sense.  If this was offered regularly for $15 it might make sense.  At the price of $25 just get a dot for $5 more.  The speaker on the dot is easily 3 times better it doesnt make you cringe when you hear it and it has a clock.  I do not see the use of making this product. In summary at $10 get it this is a must have! For any other price get a dot.
title: Pricing is too close to the dot

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: W&A
content: Bought this for my son to use in the bathroom. It works well just like our other Amazon Echos however the sound quality is not as good. Also my son says that the volume also won’t get loud enough that he can hear the music while in the shower. Overall good product for a small space but could use a little tweaking.
title: Good but could be tweaked

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Donna R
content: It’s loud and sounds great! Also has USB port on bottom where you can put your cell phone cord in and charge it so it’s not really taking up space In the outlet
title: Amazing

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: TomHFL
content: Although Alexa sounds a little tinny its a great device for chat i.e., weather, traffic, etc. Not so great with music and song but okay. Can't beat the price.
title: Great input device!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: B. M. Satterwhite
content: Works great, the sound not so much, you have to be standing close to hear response to question or music, I would advise purchasing a speaker to use with it. Easy to install.
title: Echo Flex

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Cheryl
content: Great addition to our dot and makes everything easier to use now that the DOT can now be used in another part of the house. We have it in the kitchen so now we are able to use all the features like shopping list and timers. Just love it.
title: Great addition

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Verna M. pregnon
content: This product just keeps saying go to you Alexa app to install.  It is not showing up o my Alexa app now what do i .... nothing it has no futher instructions.  What a waste.
title: What a waste of money

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Ann
content: Love the small size.  The saying "Good things come in small packages" really applies to this device.  Love how I can now listen to music in every room of my house.....get weather updates, read notifications.  Good price point too.
title: Amazing sound from a small device...

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Roy E. Campbell, Jr.
content: Echo Flex is small with good sound quality. It plugs into an electrical outlet and works just as well as other Echo devices. It is a great addition in my garage, to allow me to get information and weather forecasts before leaving.
title: Great addition in the gargare

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: KenL
content: I purchased this as an addition for my Animal Room....Unfortunately, the sound quality is very poor.  The max volume a lot of distortion occurs and to hear the musics without static etc., it must be very low.  This makes it almost inaudible.  If I wasn't so lazy, I would send it back.....oh well....live and learn.  Stay safe everyone....Ken
title: My experience, or should I say, my animals experience with the speaker

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: candycane257
content: I had never seen one of these. I got it for a super low price during Prime Day sales. So cool! Fits in small places, works like a dot, and has attachments you can add on. Love it!
title: So cool!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Griney
content: It is exactly as expect. The sound is nothing like the regular Echoes, but I didn’t expect it to be. I have it in my music studio mainly to connect devices and for reference purposes. Trust me when I say, I don’t need a high fidelity Echo in my music studio. I’d say I’m covered there. Ha!!
title: Great lil Echo!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Chele77
content: This is working perfectly in my bedroom! It’s across the room, recognizes my voice and I integrated it with NiteBird lightbulbs so I can voice control my nightstand lamps! The speaker quality is fine for the size and what I need.... you can hear music at a comfortable volume but it’s not loud enough for my teenager.  I will be buying more for each room in my house, super easy to install. Perfect price and a very happy customer.
title: Simple to install, perfectly priced !!!!!!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Kenneth Bellew
content: With the added motion detector, it can have Alexa announce on all connected devices that "Someone is in the garage."  It can also inform the intruder that "security has been alerted."
title: I use it to announce when someone is in the garage.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: lo'
content: I was always forgetting to turn off a light in the basement once I came up from feeding the cat.  Now I can turn it off before I go up by using the echo flex.
title: very convenient...

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Paco
content: the quality is not very good, but for the price it is fine, I do not complain, sometimes he does not listen to me so it is momentary, I will buy a better echo
title: Good for value

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Neal S
content: These are great in theory and do avoid the clutter of wires that come with the other echos. Unfortunately, in our bedrooms, music and some responses are hard to hear. We returned these for the echo dot, which produces a lot more sound. I wish there were something with this form factor but the echo dot sound. I'd love something that just plugs into the wall yet produces a bit more sound.
title: Not enough sound, we returned for the new echo dots

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Aumakua
content: Love this device. I plugged it in in the bathroom and it's as good as my echo dots. The speaker could have better quality and still, but I still love it. My bathroom is tiny and this doesn't take up any space. Perfect.
title: USB charger Alexa

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Doreen Swann
content: Alexa doesn't always recognize commands to sync flex for music  in other parts of the house. PIA to keep running back to the echo dot then go back to the other room to see if it's working
title: Have minds of their own

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Fred V. Amundsen
content: The unit works as advertised and is reliable. I use it in my basement combined with the nightlight. I may get another unit with the motion detection option. The speaker is adequate in this quiet area for non-music activities.
title: Reliable access to Alexa

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Fred
content: I got it on sale for around $12 to add voice control to a smart plug for the bathroom. Direct sound output is tinny as expected. Sounds fine with paired Bluetooth speakers. It doesn't support the drop-in feature when Bluetooth is paired.
title: Works Well for Intended Purpose

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Catherine Hankinson
content: Great that I can put this in any room and be able to get Alexa. This helps me turn off my light I have my smart plug plugged into.  Great idea, great price.
title: Love this

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Jeff DeLong
content: Speaker is rudimentary at best. Using it to connect to Bose portable speakers solves that. Wish the mic was a little more sensitive. Integrated this with an Echo for an three echo inputs connected to other blue tooth sound bars.
title: Flex is a good addition to the echo lineup

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Timothy Bee
content: I wish the sensor and/or night light came as part of this product. For the price, without the sensor it is not worth getting when you can buy an echo dot at a comparable price for much better quality and experience.
title: I do not recommend this product without add-ons.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Cindy Hinkle
content: Exactly what I needed to have a central Alexa hub without grabbing my phone. All I had to do was plug it in and within a minute it was ready to go.  LOVE IT
title: Another Great Echo Product

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Mark B.
content: Integration is so easy. Routines for the motion sensor and AV System fans was a breeze. Way fun. Rarely talk to it. Prefer pressing button on phone or iPad.
title: Way fun!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Wingover
content: We use it for voice only because the music in not good.  Great little Alexa for small areas like our powder room. Easy to set up like all the Alexa devices.
title: Nice unobtrusive Alexa for our powder room.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Cynder
content: Really nice plug in integration for alexa and such! If you need alexa put somewhere a bit odd, or with no shelf this is really nice for it, I also bought the motion sensor for it and it's so easy to set up. The sound on the device is just slightly lesser quality compared to the echo dot, but this is still really nice. Good buy overall and a fraction of the price compared to a dot too!
title: Quality Alexa product

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Steve Holland
content: Perfect for the garage. Sound quality got 5 stars because I plugged the audio out into a old Crown D150A amplifier that runs 24/7. Sounds great. Very durable and easy set up. Great product!
title: Simple and Solid

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: stuffed turkey
content: I like that you can plug a speaker in it. Allowed me to hook up my house stereo and rock out in my man cave. Like that it plugs directly in the wall and no power cord.
title: Good buy

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Lori Ann Rice
content: I purchased this little gem for my Master Bathroom and I have been very happy so far. Set up was easy and took only a couple of minutes. As others have stated, it doesn't get as loud as the Echo Dots or other Echo products BUT you can add a Bluetooth speaker for inside of the shower! That's really the only thing I would change about this little Echo genius. I purchased mine on Prime day so I feel like I got a great deal. I will be purchasing another for the mud room next time they go on sale!
title: So Easy

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Gadget65
content: I do not have any regrets about my purchase. As others have stated in reviews I read about the Flex, it is not for playing music because of the sound quality. However, I did not purchase the Flex to play music, I purchased it to control my smart plugs, and it works great!  The Flex responds to my voice sometimes better than my Echo Dot. I wish I had other rooms to place additional Flex devices.
title: Amazon Flex

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Leslie Kuck
content: Love this little thing!! Musics great for in the bedroom and stuff but when asking a question it’s a lil bit low if you have anything else on or anyone talking, however you can connect to another speaker I just chose not to yet. Seriously ordering one for every room without an Alexa though!!
title: Love this little device!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Kripal
content: Not that useful. Need to shout “alexa” loudly in order to get heard. Only thing that is good is alexa integration. Speaker are not that good too. Not useful at all!
title: Not useful at all!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Ellen Gager
content: Basically just like a regular Echo dot, except the sound quality for music isn’t quite as good. The fact that it plugs directly into the wall is convenient in my kids’ rooms. We got it primarily for the intercom (drop in) feature, but the kids have been playing their music and have found some games and skills they enjoy as well.
title: Convenient, works well

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Rick Jackson
content: I spent 45 minures on the phone with Amazon help desk, did not get it working. they assured me someone would contact me and get it resolved. 6 days later, no contact
title: Does not work

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Roy Sekulich
content: Works great and was very easy to setup. I do wish it had a ground plug not for grounding but I think it would help it stay in better. It gets knocked out of the socket easily. Other than that works great
title: Very nice to expand the echo to another room

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Terri McLaughlin
content: I bought this on sale. I wanted an inexpensive way to put an intercom in the bathroom Incase anyone needs help.. works for my needs with elderly mother and 3 kids.
title: it has an intercom that can talk to other devices. Dinners ready, take out trash,  mom you ok?

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Jane Mary
content: I really liked this i have it in the garage so I can set times and talk to pple inside the house with out having to go back inside or even pick up my phone.
title: Small but awsome

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: ebw1636
content: I have several Alexa devices and the flex was the easiest set up yet. Voice recognition is excellent. I was well aware that the speaker was not the best, but it is very adequate. You can't beat this for the price.
title: Excellent Echo, for an excellent price.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Samuel Alva
content: The speaker are far less loud than a cell phone, I wasn’t expecting anything but i was surprised of the low volume. Other than that, great product to get alexa get your voice in a hallway, restroom etc, and paired with a motion sensor for lights or routines makes it an amazing lil product.
title: Good product, low volume.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Hulí Ewha
content: Sound quality is not good. Tin can mixed with early 2000’s quality cell phone speaker-ish. Maybe for this quality it would be worth the purchase at a $15 price point.
title: Poor Audio Quality

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Jeremy
content: This was a neat addition to my Echo Dot. Allows me to use the Dot and Flex together and create an intercom system in my house. It also allows the kids to ask Alex a bunch of questions trough the flex just like the Dot. Works great and a really neat product! If you want Alexa in every room but don't need a loud speaker ( or the cost of more Dots).... then this is what you have been looking for.
title: Great addition to Alexa

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Customer John Doe
content: Asome solution to add to small room if you just need a small speaker on a budget to control smart home and usb big plus note the sound out it is not best if you are looking for better sound quality look in to a bigger speaker.
title: Small on budget solutions for small spaces

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Ali
content: The speaker on this is actually really good considering it’s size. It does exactly what it says it should. We got it for a bedroom and it is used mostly for white noise and sleep music for our son. I thought we would have to use a speaker but works fine without it.
title: Great Little Alexa

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Maiya Deabellica
content: Live this little guy! Needed Alexa in another room but simply for basic needs like turning lights on/off or getting weather and time. Great price and perfect for my needs.
title: Perfect little device for space in need of Alexa!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Jaidun112
content: Overall it’s a nice idea. The sound quality is horrible. Very thin. It’s only good for quick voice responses. I wouldn’t suggest playing music on it at all.
title: Nice but needs a better speaker.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Richard
content: Works great and I think it is mainly meant to pair with BT speakers because I can just barely hear these things. But they do work quite well for the price.
title: Would be great if they were louder.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Anthony Thomas
content: This little echo device hears the human voice quite impressively! It responds to Alexa better and sounds better in my opinion than even the echo dot 2nd generation! Very worth the price!
title: Amazing sound! IMO - better than 2nd generation Echo Dot!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Kat
content: I have several dots and enjoy them, the flex speaker is way off I feel they could have done much better, at the price point ...just get a dot. I returned this item.
title: Speaker is a fail

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Pamela Stevenson
content: I had hoped to use it like an echo dot. I like the fact I can move it around from room to room is nice. irks best along with fire tv for  volume efficiency.
title: Mini echo with choice to turn off record feature

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Zee
content: Oh my gosh this was a steel I’m so glad I bought it I keep it in the kitchen so I can listen to music while I’m cooking and it’s perfect for a small space
title: Good buy

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Susieq
content: I like that it involves no cords and plugs directly in to the wall outlet. I wish the sound quality was a little better but it is great for how I use it.
title: No cords!!!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: lustlilome
content: It hears well but she talks so low I cant hear her responses when sitting a few feet away. Love all my other echoes but wish I didnt buy two of these for different rooms. Actually wish I just bought another echo dot and none if these.
title: echo flex-dont buy if you have any hearing difficulties

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Teri Lee
content: This recognized my Bluetooth interconnectivity with my dots and show immediately. All I had to do is plug it in! Now I can get the weather and news in the bathroom. :)
title: Easy to install

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Jessie S.
content: I swear this echo has trouble hearing/responding to me compared to my echo dot. I have to ask it to turn the volume up 5 times before I notice a difference in volume. Other than that, I like it and am happy with my purchase. Very easy to set up.
title: Small and simple Echo for my bathroom

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: joyce honour
content: The unit was a pain to connect to Alexa. The sound quality is not as good as our main Alexa. An alarm set on one Alexa will not sound on the other one. Great for generating white noise,ocean sounds for sleep. Good to provide cardio music if quality is not an issue.
title: You get what you paid for

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: A root
content: Great device but the speaker is lacking. I keep it paired to a Bluetooth speaker and it's got better sound than the bigger Echo devices I have that way.
title: This is a headline

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Michael Boswell
content: I tried to connect on three different wireless routers. via the application on Android and my PC. None would work. Searching online shows that many people do not have a problem but there are many examples of the issue that i had. I love Amazon Echo devices but the Flex comes up short
title: Could never get it connected

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Patricia S.
content: I didn’t expect much from this speaker since it’s so small so I connected it to a decent bluetooth speaker for sound quality. Now, it works reasonably well. It’s voice recognition feature is not as dependable as my other Echos, but it does work.
title: You get what you pay for

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: TcbColorado
content: The sound quality is not that good but it works for a bathroom or kitchen. I got it in case I fall in the bathroom and I can have Alexa call my daughter.
title: Good

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: The Duty Family
content: I use it to call up my son who tends to hide from his parents and shy away from chores... but if I need him for any reason... I just speak into my Alexa app on my phone and my son can help in a moments notice.
title: Fun and helpful

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Pam Brown
content: I’m sure it worked wonderfully, gave as Christmas gift to grandson and he hasn’t complained. Can’t rate sound quality etc as I haven’t heard it in use.
title: Christmas Gift

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Nissa Darbonne
content: No more yelling around here from the shower toward the bedroom. Or from the closet, when wondering whether to bring a light sweater when it's April 25.
title: So easy

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Sharon D.
content: Tinny, scratchy, low. Bought three boxes. Two have the same problem. The third was a gift. Hope it doesn't sound as rough as the ones I have. Even for the $10 pricetag, not worth it to me.
title: Terrible audio

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Al L
content: Set up an integration of this device was very easy. Compared to my other Echo devices my Echo Flex has trouble understanding wake words and spoken words. We have to almost yell to get it to function properly  I use the echo flex to control lights and other devices in my garage. I added an external speaker system to it which greatly improves the sound quality. I would not recommend it for a high use area.  Fantastic solution for low use areas.
title: Amazon Echo Flex

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Sam Adams
content: When you have more than one device - and a few automation controls - these are very low profile and can be plugged into a corner socket and hidden away.
title: Low profile Alexas

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Star
content: I like the concept, but the sound quality is not quite as good as Echo Dot and have experienced issues with not being able to connect to the internet periodically.
title: Works well

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: MikeAnt
content: I use Alexa for home automation control. The Flex lets me easily add coverage for voice command in places where I’m not planning to play music so I don’t care about sound quality. I appreciate not meeting to deal with a separate adapter and cord.
title: Easily adds coverage

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: RENO the GREAT
content: Really neat gadget! I bought a few to have around the house. So, whatever I'm doing or wherever I'm at in the house...Alexa is always there to help.😁
title: Very nice👍👍

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Drmaverick_tx
content: I bought at a discount , $14, did not have high hopes. Performed MUCH better than expected. Small speaker yet sound was clear. Great for a small room.
title: Small, unobtrusive, works like my other devices

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Norma
content: It works it’s good maybe if you go to a motel or in the office it works good the sounds not as good you could put a little extra money with that and by the Echo Dot
title: Office or in a motel or kids room

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Jaidon Ontiveros
content: Your browser does not support HTML5 video. I love my Echo Flex! Now I can control my room with it! My colored LED lights, and my TV! Even my security camera can be controlled with this! Highly recommend. Enjoy the unboxing!
title: Alexa, I love you!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Donatella
content: Great add on to Amazon echo line. I keep mine in the bathroom. Small enough and has the features as others as time, weather, play news, drop in , etc.
title: Worth it

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: wendyv
content: This is a great alternative to the full size echo dot. It plugs into an outlet so it doesn’t take up any space on furniture. It doesn’t hear quite as well but it’s not a big problem. I like it!t
title: Takes up no space and is out of sight

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: T. J. Del Real
content: Paid $10 during Prime Days. Wish I bought more! Perfect for my aging Mom who can now call me if she needs me while in the bathroom. I play music while in there cleaning too
title: Love it!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Janet Turner
content: I LOVE the Flex. I live full time in my RV. My Echo is in my bedroom, I have Flex in the living area. Takes up NO space at all. Volume and sound are perfect.  One of the BEST additions made to Echo. FAN-FREAKIN-TASTIC for those with limited space. 10+ stars!!!
title: AWESOME!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Gordon
content: Great mini device...just add Amazon basic PC speakers and some WiFi lights...very happy with my Three room setup...I found to setup lights but I having been working in IT for 22 years...just take Your time...and enjoy... Gordon
title: Mini device happiness

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Robert Bennett
content: Very useful product.  It does just what I wanted it to do and then some.  I was tired of hollering at Alex from my recliner into the next room.  Fixed!!!
title: Very Useful

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: rexclark
content: I bought three of them to "fill in" around my home.  Now I have one at my desk for when I just want to know something or even answer the door.  One in my shop so my wife can call me for dinner and one in my 5th wheel RV for whatever!!
title: Simple and easy to install

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Jane
content: Love having this Alexa in the spare room.  The sound is fine for asking questions and getting answers.  I wouldn't want to listen to music with it though.
title: Perfect for my needs

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Redacted
content: I liked the compactness and price, and that it was an avenue into Alexa, "the big computer in the sky."  With hearing aids, clarity and loudness are fine.  However, for use as a bedroom wake-up alarm, ...not so good FOR ME.
title: I use hearing aids; this isn't loud enough for me without them.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: TMan
content: Great way to add Alexa to any room for less. I don’t need to play music in some rooms in my house so this allows me to have Alexa where ever I want without paying for a full priced echo.
title: Alexa wherever you need her!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Sharon W.
content: This is a great little Alexa add on. The speaker isn't nearly as clear as the regular Echo and sometimes it doesn't pick up as well as the regular Echo. But, the plug in is good for a room where there's not a good place for an Echo to sit. I'm happy with it.
title: Nice Alexa Add On

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Mitch T
content: I have it in my garage.  Have a clock add on as well.  Great to have Alexa in there as didn't need an echo or dot as this fills the bill.  Sound quality leaves something to be desired but easily connected to blue tooth speaker I already had in there
title: Worth the price

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Brian L. Veal
content: Slow to respond and just stops responses in midsentence. I won't be getting another one of these I'll just wait and get a dot when they go on sale.
title: does not work as well as the other Echo systems.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Grandma2014
content: Unfortunately its not connecting with my smart plug and i dont think its my olugs because they connect well with my google in the rest of the house
title: I have to stick to google I guess

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Dena perkins
content: The sounds is not loud at all. It's perfect for glass brake sensors. Setting reminders making announcements everything but listen to music and alarms.  Other than note being loud and I expected that it's great. Mostly got it for the glass brake sensor. Easy to set up!
title: Wish it would louder

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: CindyBig
content: I have this in my bathroom and it's awesome. I highly recommend you pick 1 up yourself. The footprint is not large and Does everything that the echo.does
title: Love it

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Lisa F1969
content: Buyers remorse. Speaker is awful. Not sure why I bought this instead of a regular Echo dot which is meh but sounds so much better than this thing.
title: Just get the echo Dot instead

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Raven
content: Motion detector worked for awhile on routine of turning light off but then stopped and only turns light on. Echo flex sound is good for price but doesn’t understand commands as well as our echo dot, echo, and echo show devices. It was worth the $19 we paid.
title: Nice discounted price, motion sensor not so much

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: MMcNeff
content: Love it as it was super easy to use and set up.  Sounds great. It doesn't respond well to volume control but I would still buy another.
title: Easy to use

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Angie
content: I'm ordering 2 more I love these cute convenient devices. The sound is good enough for as far as music wise it's not super loud like a few would like it to be.
title: Love

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Tonya Jones
content: Already had the Echo and added 2 of the Flex to the "family".  Love it so far.  I do wish it was a little louder, but I can definitely live with it!
title: Great addition

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Kelly Pila
content: Great addition to our Alexa family, I used this in our bedroom with the smart plug and lightbulbs. You never realize how easy it can be until I walk in and say “alexa, turn on the lights and fan” would purchase again!
title: Great addition to alexa family

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Rolando Rengifo
content: Me encanto al ser pequeño no pensé que iba ser tan bueno pero me sorprendió, y superó mis espectativas. Ojo no es para escuchar música con buena calidad, pero para un lugar pequeño y cerrado funciona perfecto, aunque yo lo coloqué en mi cocina que es abierta y se escucha bien cuando todo esta en silencio. Otra cosa funciona bien en español.
title: Muy bueno, más de lo que esperaba.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Katie
content: The sound is tinny. Otherwise, works fine. We use it in the guest bathroom. The night light attachment is the main reason I bought it. I like that.
title: Not the best sound

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: BJ
content: Happy with this flex device, really fast & clear. As many have written, definitely not for music, but I can listen to my news podcasts on it just fine, and it's great for reminders & starting smartplug automations. May pick up a few more of these!
title: Fast and clear!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: G3
content: I get this unit to replace an echo input with a bad plug. Of course they don’t sell the input anymore. Anyway, I plug my 3.5 mm auxiliary cable to my stereo auxiliary and the sound Is barely audible. 1/10 the volume of my echo input and echo dot that I previously had connected. I got it exclusively for the auxiliary plug so it’s worthless.
title: Super low volume when connected through the 3.5 mm auxiliary cable

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Llinda
content: Flexi works great although the speaker leaves a bit to be desired, although I didn't expect great sound from it. I may run a cord to allow it to be placed higher rather than by the floor which might help it.
title: It's quiet

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Seasidej
content: Having this Flex Plug-In in my bedroom enables me to ask questions and give commands to Alexa, who is in the next room.  I love the convenience!
title: Added Convenience to Alexa

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Our Family
content: poor sound quality and volume.I use only to control smart devices and to ask alexa for info. Music sounds terrible that is if you can hear it.
title: poor sound quality

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Bill S.I.NY
content: Exactly what I needed.  I plugged it in my bathroom for news, music, weather, time, etc.  highly recommend for small space with limited power options.
title: Perfect!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Aloveforpaper
content: The speaker on this is not worth the price. I can hardly hear it and it’s plug in an 8x8 bathroom. It does its job though. But when getting ready in the morning for work be prepare to to hear music at a whisper.
title: My toilet is louder

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: SoCalAmazonPrimeBuyer
content: Received this item as a gift and was not sure where to use it, as we have Echos in several locations throughout our home. Decided to put it in the laundry room. It helps remind us of times, plays music when dealing with laundry. etc. It's a great addition.
title: Spacesaver Works in Small Rooms

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Jennifer Peros
content: I set this product up to use in the bathroom. It is nice to check the weather in the morning or set a reminder or timer. The sound quality is not good. Good enough for the bathroom and for 10$ on sale, was a good purchase.
title: sound quality not good

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: paris57
content: I actually like the convenience of having it in my kitchen, but it kept interfering with my tv in my bedroom. Internet data package is not large enough.
title: Discovered I'll need to increase my data package with internet provider in order to add this!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Sassylass
content: Nice for places where shelf space is limited.  Works well, but sound quality is functional only, but no less than can be expected from a small device.
title: Another voice

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Jillyn31
content: I ordered one of these for us & 2 more as Christmas gifts. Prior to seeing them in the Prime Day sale, I'd never heard of them. So far, so good.
title: Perfect for smaller areas

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Paris
content: Speaker lacks sound quality and I often find myself saying "alexa" 2 or 3 times to get her attention. I could understand if this product was off in the distance but its plugged into the wall by my mirror in our smaller bathroom.
title: Mediocre

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Charzy
content: Love love love my little echo flex!!!Just plugged it in, waited for it to go through its cycle, and she was ready to answer all my questions!  Works great in smaller places like the bathroom and in the garage!
title: Mini Alexa is perfect for those quiet little corners!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Snuffy
content: Sound not so great, but is very understandable. Keep this in the bathroom for music, weather and news flashes while getting ready.  For the price, it’s fine.
title: Ok product for the price

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Troy
content: I use this device mainly as an extension to my Echo dot. I can give a voice command without having to raise my voice when I might be out of voice range with the Echo dot alone. This is most beneficial when giving voice commands in a large room where you don't have to raise your voice to a level equal to an argument with an ex-spouse.
title: the sound quality of this device was poorer than I expected

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: GSolera
content: Lo compré para probar y colocarlo en un espacio donde nada más requería tener accesibilidad con Alexa, pero el sonido es fatal, y cuesta mucho que reconozca las indicaciones.
title: No me gustó mucho

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Kenny Valentine
content: Great little device. Functions just like all my other echos. Synced well with external speakers and other devices. Great for the purpose it is intended.
title: Perfect solution

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Donald T.
content: It sounds like crap, but I knew that going in. I'm using it with the motion sensor to automate the bathroom lights. I have 2 third gen echo's for playing music.
title: Great

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Carolyn K. Stimer
content: I bought this because I needed a smaller device, and that's exactly what I got so that works, the one downfall is the sound qualify -- wow!  It sounds like an old transistor radio on an AM station!
title: Great Size!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: T. L. Flannery
content: This echo version is great for the garage. Pair it with a portable blue tooth speaker and its perfect. Also allows for using Alexa routines before entering the house (Alexa, I'm home).
title: Great Addition to Garage

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Tee
content: I enjoy this item when I don't want to put Alexa in every room this is a very good alternative very easy to hook up and it's worked well so far
title: Very good product for $10

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Martin Walter
content: Installed in the kitchen and I have to say she listens much better than any other Alexa device!  Highly recommend for any out of the way spots.
title: Listens better than any Alexa device so far!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Nick & Steve Lee
content: Only one flaw, the volume can not be turn up high enough. This echo is 1/2 or less of th4 volume you get with a regular echo device.
title: Too Soft

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: P. L. Shanks
content: I got the Flex for my bathroom so I could set reminders or add to my list while I got ready in the morning. The sound detection isn't as great as an Echo Dot. Oh she also has a really hard time responding to her wake up name. But at the end of the day she gets the job done.
title: Echo Flex

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Moron95M3
content: Running this with a JBL flip 3 - easy to setup and has been working flawlessly for weeks now.  Was hesitant as I was worried it would drop bluetooth, but has been great.
title: Works great with bluetooth speaker

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: WBB
content: I use the Flex for my alarm and find it works well.  The sound quality isn't as good as the Echo's I have but I did not get it for playing music.
title: My alarm

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Michelle
content: I use in my bedroom for alarms, reminders, weather, news highlights, and Ring doorbell notifications.  Sound quality is awful for news highlights, so you can only imagine listening to pandora or Spotify. I’m sticking w my Bluetooth speaker, but I should have opted for an Echo Dot in my bedroom. But I do love the price Of Flex. Probably more suitable for a hall, entry, or bathroom.
title: You get what you pay for

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Marshcoco
content: Like it but doesn't always pick-up my voice, can be annoying to repeat your message. Would have given 5 stars, if it were as good as my Alexa!
title: Doesn't work as well as Alexa! Speaker quality has a lot to be desired too!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Merinda McCalpine
content: My Alex is slow to respond to request. I have to almost scream to get a respond.  Sometimes it takes more one time of saying what I want to get correct respond
title: Getting my commands understood with screaming

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Bev McKenna
content: I wanted a Alexa device in my kitchen.  It works great for me.  I love to be able to make lists, set up reminders etc. as I work in my kitchen. For me this is perfect.
title: Great addition

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: erockr
content: Love this mini Alexa device. The sound is pretty tinny but we just use in the bathroom and it comes is super handy for weather, music and news.
title: Great for a smaller device

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Reader
content: Nice smaller units. Purchased to use with whole-house sound system. Built-in speaker is lacking, but that was expected. Seems to have a hard time picking up voice as compared to the Echo Dot.
title: Simple, yet effective

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Kathy
content: Love this, we put it in our bathroom and it is fantastic, we also added the nitelight.
title: Great for the bathroom!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Theology
content: I liked the add on motion sensor. It alerts my phone when motion is detected while I am at work and you can have it announce whatever you want out of your amazon echo to thwart off intruders.
title: Versatile

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: N. Wright
content: It’s good for what it does. I use it as an “intercom” in the house. It gets the job done along with an occasional request for the weather from time to time. I don’t expect to play music on this or anything as the sound quality is not good enough for that, but it’s perfect when you want to let the family know dinner is ready without physically walking or screaming.
title: Nice addition to the family

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Ojayzie
content: Works great for checking my news briefing and weather while taking a morning shower. Playing music is not bad either, as long as you're not expecting a lot of base.
title: Works well for its size

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: C. T. Grey
content: Works fine except the internal speaker quality leaves much to be desired.  If you add an external speaker it's fine.  However your then spending as much as an Echo Dot (on sale) which is a far better device.
title: It's good for the sale price

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Jeffrey E Strickland
content: Works perfectly for Alexa commands or inquiries, but very, very poor sound quality but I'm sure if this was plugged into a large powered speaker or stereo, the sound would be perfect.  I'm surprised I haven't seen add-on speakers for the built-in USB port.  Would be suitable for listening to news in the morning but that's about it.  New and improved sound quality will no doubt be in the next version.
title: Improved sound version is no doubt in the cards....

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Patricia G.
content: Very easy to set up. We have a FB portal with Alexa, 2 kindles, now 2 echo flex. These are awesome. Especially with a special needs child. Reminders for everything.
title: Echo flex

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Oklahoma28
content: I didn't get this to play music, just for the assistant when I need it with no cords laying around. Works great in the garage and have bought 3 more.
title: Not good as a music speaker but great for Alexa anywhere you need it.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Courtney White
content: Really happy with the flex. Sound is fine for listening to music and getting the weather. Very convenient to have alexa right next to bed. Good for wakeup alarms too.
title: Good

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: KS
content: I was hoping this would be an extension of my Fire TV cube, in that when I'm in my kitchen I have to yell at the cube to recognize my voice. However, I cannot find a way to pair the two. Disappointed.
title: Meh

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Eric Chen
content: Great little thing to have around for the blind spots around the house.  I got one in the garage and am happy with it. For 17 some dollars it's a steal
title: Great add on

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Ron from GB
content: I like the idea of the echo flex but the sound is really missing the mark.  All my other echo devices awesome. Get me a flex plug in with a motion sensor light and a speaker.
title: Back to the drawing board.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Ricardo C. Castellanos.
content: I do not know why I bought them. I was thinking of expanding my echo system to the bathrooms of the house but in reality I should have bought the regular ones.  The quality of sound is much better in the latter.
title: An addition to an echo system.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Alan Shenefield
content: For what it is, it's fine. Have in bedroom to ask to turn on lights and ask question. Not really for music quality but fine for general use.
title: Work great to running lights and general use.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: NA
content: Works great.  The sound is a little tinny, but they warn you this isn't for listening to music (and they're right).  Speach clarity is fine and it works as intended.
title: Does what it's supposed to do.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Caren C Carter
content: It's nice that I was able to add just one more Echo at a budget price.  It acts just like a normal echo and even has a light that changes color for notifications.
title: Good addition to my Echo family

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Kyle L.
content: I got this to attach the motion sensor to for my bathroom but the volume is way too faint.  I don’t care about the audio quality, but it would be nice to turn up podcasts to a reasonable volume.
title: Great idea, needs a slightly better speaker

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: R. H.
content: Dislike that you cannot sync your other echo skills with the flex you have to do them independently through the app. Like that it is small and versatile.
title: Small and fun.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: C. Hess
content: The sound is not as good but it does the simple things that we needed like spread light control and 'drop in' services to our basement/laundry area.
title: A small utility add on to our system.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Mark Edwards
content: With a small Kitchen, the Echo Plus in the living room was not always hearing us. Not a problem in the Kitchen now! The speaker is definitely smaller than a Dot but that was the point.
title: Easy Install, great for the odd space that need it

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Ricardo M Hernandezarocho
content: Functions as well as other echo products but nowhere near as loud as it needs to be. I purchased product because it was a compact plug and play package, but it in order to get an excellent review it needs to be loud enough to compete with the bathroom fan where I have it plugged in. If this gets fixed this may replace some of the dots I have in other rooms.
title: Unacceptable volume

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Norman F.
content: As far as I am concerned, the only thing that I don't like on this device is that the maximum volume is too low.....sometimes hard to hear.
title: A fun resource that was placed in the kitchen and is used frequenty

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Dori
content: I got 3 of these for bathrooms and kitchen. They work great for turning on and off lights, quick checks of weather, time, etc., for checking time, playing music, and setting timers.
title: Echo flex makes things easier.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Didi
content: Works great, links with Alexa, but the sound quality is nowhere near as good as the original unit. Comparable to your cell phone speakers.
title: Works, but mediocre sound quality

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: FogShark
content: I've bought 4 of these on black Friday and deploy them in the garage, etc. Now WE NEED A WEATHERPROOF version, that I would place outside.
title: Great Little Motion Sensor

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Sophie G.
content: Used to light own bathroom when entering at night, and to provide constant night light to visitor's bathroom at night.  Both are simply perfect!
title: easy to install and use USB attachments - do not need teenager to show you how.....

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Scott W. Thomas
content: Don't expect an echo or even a dot, but this product is great for certain locations like bathrooms and garage.  Plus the accessories are great too!
title: Great product for what it is

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Twin1
content: Got this for a gift for Christmas with the night light & I just love it. My bathroom isn't that big, but it's loud. I got it down as far as it will go & can be in the bathroom & hear it fine. The nightlight is a great extra feature too. I may buy another one for another room in my apt. Sound is great.00
title: Love it !

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: SR
content: Fails to hear me most the time, and when it DOES, I'm not activating it. Finally just unplugged it and got a Google home mini for that room.
title: Weak product at best.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Faith
content: I love these!  We have 4 now.  I use it all the time to turn on lights, as a timer, music, weather, recipes and so much more.  Love that they are easy to install and works great!
title: Love my Echos

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: beaners947
content: I put this in our bathroom and it works out perfect, not sure of the motion detection feature but it has great sound for our small space.
title: great add on item

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: T. Smith
content: Great addition to a home that already has an Echo device. Sound quality isn't that bad either, good for listening to IHeart stations
title: Nice addition

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Don Skey
content: Its cool. Doesn't understand sometimes and i get frustrated trying to speak more clear than i already was. When it works its great, when it doesn't, well you just wonder why.
title: Cool

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Dawn Reinhardt
content: I like that I could plug it in and it connected very easily.  I don’t like that if I set a timer on my echo dot in the kitchen, I cannot turn off the timer through the mini in my living room.
title: Initially connected easily

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: SoCalSig
content: Got the Flex as a bundled add on with another purchase. I set it up in a guest room. Once I got the Flex I decided to add the third party night light accessory to make it more useful. I do wish the light had more options to control when it automatically turns on and off. I also hope other third part accessories come along soon.
title: OK, neither overwhelming nor underwhelming

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: RICK H.
content: It works well to communicate with Alex but the sound quality is very poor. Music is very tinned. Have a dot and original echo they sound good.
title: No misic

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Hugh Lichter
content: really? What’s the point?  For only a few dollars more an intelligent buyer will get a real echo device. I have several echo and Alexa enabled products and this is disappointing
title: Really???

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Barbara M.
content: Love having music in the bathroom when getting ready. Such a great price and easiest set up ever!! Just can't adjust the volume.....????
title: Love!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Glow_Phoenix
content: I like it. It’s very convenient. I wish it had more powerful speakers to play music. Even though it will do so, it is not built for that. I have mine in my kitchen go control my yard lights via a smart plug. I’m tempted to buy more.
title: Flex

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: nettie141
content: Works great have in hall by garage door so when I come in I can have Alexa turn on living room lights . Also have nite light attachment so hall isn’t dark when entering .
title: Works great

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Martha Hudgens
content: Great for the price. If your in the shower, the volume does seem low. Our speaker is about 6 ft from our shower and it’s hard to hear while showering (even with the volume up all the way). That would be my only complaint.
title: Great product

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Thad H.
content: Great new product. It was very east to integrate with my Echo and Echo Dots. I have the new Echo Dot/clock on pre-order which I will add to my system.
title: Alexa Connection

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Daniel
content: It works, and it was affordable, but that’s really all I can say. Imagine wanting to change your lights and having to tell Alexa over and over to do it. It usually takes two or three times, and at this point it might be best if I could just flip the light switch. The audio quality can plug into a speaker, but the speaker built-in to the device itself Is very underwhelming, and closer to a flip phone then to a modern smart device
title: Just okay.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: PSL
content: I am so excited to get this new product to me. I played around with it and noted the sound quality is not as good as the dot or echo show.  I am so disappointed..So only 3 stars
title: So so quality ...

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Lora
content: I like having Alexia set alarms and play music. I don’t like that I need to subscribe in order for her to do things like turn on/off my lights.
title: Alexia is a good buy

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Lanny
content: The sound is definitely the worst thing on it. But otherwise it’s a great little option with the add on nightlife. I actually bought it for that purpose for my grandmother and it works great for that. I also feel better having a second drop in device in her house to check in on her.
title: Perfect for when you don’t need a full device

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Kaitlyn Wooley
content: It's great when it works. I knew the sound quality would be less since it's a smaller device, that's fine, but half the time it just. Isn't on. I try to talk to it and there's no listening light, nothing. it's just dormant. I haven't turned off the listening, it just isn't working. And sometimes rather than that, it has some kind of other blue light blinking for some other reason and also can't hear me.
title: Not on half the time.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Claud
content: Sounds quality is not very good, as expected given the size of the speaker, but I was surprised that the voice recognition is very good.
title: Sounds quality is not very good, but voice recognition very good

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: J. T. Linden
content: This is a great concept, and it would be very good in a small space like a bathroom or a hallway. I bought it for the master bedroom, and it just doesn't have the volume or sound quality for space where I'd hoped to use it.
title: Would be fine for a small space - but sound quaility is poor

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: bob
content: just got them today, setting them up all over the house.  they work great, and a lot of fun..  i will get more latter, thanks.. Bob B..
title: just got mine today works great

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Lynn Little
content: This is so easy to use, just plug and sit and wait. I had it already sinked to my Amazon account when purchased.  So it was no bother. I love the fact that I don't have an USB to power it. I hate cords with a passion.  Get it you won't be disappointed. Oh yeah. I don't listen to it for music so the sound is fine with me.
title: Great idea. No cords

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: annabean
content: I got this for our nursery. I use it to play white noise and turn on/off my Leviton Wi-Fi plugins in my daughter's room. I didn't buy the Flex to play music or to listen to audio, so the audio quality doesn't bother me. I also bought the night-light add-on. The night light we had before was way too bright. I like the control the add-on offers through dimming and changing the color.
title: Love the night light add-on

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Tony K.
content: I like that it is an extension of the other Alexa products, but the sound quality wouldn't be any good for music, etc. Overall a good product though!
title: A descent Alexa extension.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Simon B. Morse
content: The volume is not as loud as other Echo devices and I was told, by Amazon, that the speaker is not as capable as other devices due to its small size. That was something I did not expect. Bummer.
title: Low Volume

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Crista
content: Love it’s a simple plug in. I have one in my bathroom. But I agree with other reviews sound could be better. Perhaps they’ll create an add on speaker accessory.
title: Love it but sound needs a bit improvement

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: b88
content: I got this for my bathroom. I can hear it okay as long as I am not in the shower or Running water. The volume is real faint and you have to be next to it when speaking.
title: It’s okay

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: MColeman07
content: Didnt think the internal speaker would be great but I expected it to be a bit more than a whisper...
title: Device itself is good but the speaker could use some improvement

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Rebecca
content: I swear she is such a snoop, she can hear us anywhere in the house! Had to change her name so she would stop answering everything from our upstairs hallway!
title: perfect!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Joshua McKinney
content: I Like That Its great for a stereo AUX or BT... My only gripe is I Would like it to be Louder... Could you make a usb add on speaker like the night light usb plug in thing or sensor plug in thing????
title: Cheap excellent AUX Port ALEXA

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Millie
content: Nice little echo device. It does what it’s intended to do but if you want better sound quality add a speaker. I have mine in my bathroom. Very happy with it though because it does just about everything the echo does in my opinion  and it’s a space saver!
title: Nice little Echo device

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: D Sullivan
content: a great solution to coverage of Alexa around the house. To play music, I linked it to a Bluetooth speaker to better the sound quality.
title: works well

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Hannorah
content: Perfect for my home office. The sound quality is great. Takes up minimal space and still have all the benefits of Alexa! I use it to listen to audio books, music and podcasts, mostly.
title: Nice addition to Alexa!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Mike in PS
content: Quit working 100 days after I bought it. Called customer support and they said it only has a 90-day warranty. They were not willing to refund or replace it.
title: Only a 90 day warranty. Broke after 100 days.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Chipking
content: This is a simple alternative to the Echo dot. It fits the wall directly and no wire tangling mess. Not for playing music but controls!
title: Good quality

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: DMartin
content: Works as expected! We installed it in a bathroom to ask Alexa generic questions that help start the day. Questions about traffic and the weather mostly. While it will play music, the speaker is probably not best used for that.
title: Decent way to add Alexa to a bathroom or garage

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Christopher Jones
content: This little Alexa Flex is pretty cool. I love that there was no extra set up it connected to my Alexa Enabled house automatically. The one thing that sucks is the sound quality but other than the I love this thing.
title: Connected Automatically

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: LBrown
content: This works well in an area where we don't have an echo or echo dot. The sound quality isn't great, but it's nice to put on music for our dogs at night so they don't have to hear any fire crackers.
title: Works well

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: steve
content: Not too happy with the sound. It sounds worse than my normal phone speaker. This is a shame, because the form factor is quite nice and I really want a direct plug in option for the kitchen. It’s just very tinny sounding. I’d rather pay a little more for a better speaker built in.
title: Looks nice.  Terrible sound quality, especially for music.
