product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: The BB Factor
content: It’s not an echo dot but it’s still an Alexa device that fills in great. I’d recommend it for small spaces. We have 2 and would buy again
title: Not an echo dog but a great fill in.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: C. Tan
content: No need to yell from a distance if you have this installed as a secondary mic for Alexa to hear your commands. Speaker is good for low volume listening.
title: Extra control

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: T. Valles
content: I love this but i have to be right there when she talks or i don't hear her. I've turned volume up to max. Other than that this is working really well with my Alexa microwave.
title: Not very loud

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: harley angel
content: This device recognizes movement and notifies me.  I receive a sound and message on my phone.  This is a great addiition to my alarm system.
title: Speak and Motion

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: hk
content: not the best for music, but the perfect lil buddie to ask to start your coffee in the morning, or add something to your shopping list!
title: great helper, not sound a system!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Tanya Allen
content: This baby-sized Alexa works great.  I have it in my office to communicate with the rest of the house when I cannot leave my desk. The sound on it is perfect for background noise music but I do not recommend it if you're looking for playing music loudly, just got with the dot in that case. All around a perfect fit for what I needed it for.
title: Mini Alexa

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Dave from NC
content: What I was looking for was the extended speaker capabilities. The delivered so much more with it's voice recognition, it put my echo dot accessible from other rooms in my house. I have two installed now.
title: Puts Alexa at you finger tips

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Ritz
content: This devIce is useful but I fine the mics on it are poor compared to any other device that I have used. I have to repeat myself constantly for Alexa to register my voice. Not had this issue on any other device.
title: useful device but not the best

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Eric Dryer
content: Really like the cordless unit. Speaker quality is weak but that is expected.  Works well with bluetooth speakers.  Got one for each bathroom.
title: Great little device

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Edward Harden
content: Wish I hadn't wasted the money on these. Thought they would work great as an intercom but the sound is so weak that I wind up calling or texting anyway between levels in the home. Should've spent the extra money and gotten echo dots.
title: Poor sound

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Wild Daddy
content: I was disappointed in the sound quality of this device as it relates to playing music the added night light feature was a major plus, however, this was an add on feature. Over all in my opinion this device should have been sold as 1 unit at the 1 unit price as a night light
title: Needs repackaged and repriced

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Druce MacFarlane
content: Great when you don't need great audio, just the ability to issue commands.  The USB connector below is interested and I am looking forward to learning what other cool devices may be integrated.
title: One of the more interesting additions to the Alexa line

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Shosh107
content: Great product for a smaller room that you need Alexa to reach into. I use it for my bedroom and then use my dot for that main part of the house.
title: Good for small rooms

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Amy Morgan
content: If you are getting this to use to listen to music save your money. The sound is terrible! I thought it would be good for my bathroom.Its not great!
title: This is not great for sound

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Ronna Bruce
content: I got this because I needed an Alexa Closer to my laundry room. I didn’t need great speakers, just voice control for the lights in the laundry room and hallway, and I keep a nightlight in that are too because it is by the garage door. This served both purposes.
title: Works great in my laundry room/entry hall

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Occasional Reviewer
content: Great device.  Excellent microphone-much better than in the echo show units.  Sound is indeed mediocre  but it states that upfront.
title: Great way to bring Alexa to other areas of your house.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Janet L
content: A fun little thing. I placed it in the restroom. We can ask Alexa anything from any room. USB port is cool to charge phones or tooth brushes.  The speaker is toy like but it does work fine. I like it!
title: Fun accessory flex!!! Deal

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Clinton
content: Speaker sound quality is surprisingly bad. Amazingly bad.
title: Spend $10 more for the Dot.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: mprime34
content: Cool device but Amazon really fell short with the speaker. It sounds like it's a tin can.. I do like the ease of placement, I have still not setup any routines for the motion but I'm working on it.
title: Don't buy to listen to music

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Phillip K. Johnson
content: These are fine for the money, if you get them during a sale. I like that you can add hardware features to it, a nightlight and motion sensor so far.
title: Not bad!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Rick Thomas
content: Great price and a good option, especially when you consider the add-ons.  It replaces the large units and covers gaps in coverage.
title: Good idea

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: JP Buchanan
content: This Flex device is indeed tiny and convenient, but the speaker is garbage.  Sounds like an old radio.  Don't buy. You'll be disappointed.
title: Tiny and tinny

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Andelu78
content: The sound is horrible. I tried adjusting the volume with the Alexa App for Drop In's. I can barely hear anyone even at max volume.
title: SOunds like Alexa is trapped in a can of beans

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: T. Moore
content: Great product.if you don't care about the sound quality. Perfect for kitchen use to add items or notes for shopping lists etc. Not for listening to music unless you don't mind the sound quality.
title: Great little product for the kitchen

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Donald B Todd
content: Have it plugged in my laundry room so I can easier arm my ring alarm system and Alexa’s guard before exiting the door into the garage, as well as when I return.
title: Works great for instructions to Alexa

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Brandon Ross Friesen
content: This device fills a long standing gap in the Alexa product line.  You buy this device for listening capabilities versus sound quality.
title: Works exactly as expected

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: fritz
content: Works well if paired to a Bluetooth speaker.  Also useful to extend your smart home capabilities into other rooms without a table.
title: Another way to accomplish same task

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: SocraticMethod
content: Hard to resist such a great economical addition to our Alexa-empowered home! Enables us to fill in the gaps all around the house!
title: Great economical addition to our Alexa-empowered home!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: ema
content: I use it in the bathroom for playing music.  The speaker quality is really bad.  And I have to shout when I want to stp the music.
title: Not good compared to Echo Dot!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Steve Hughes
content: sound quality is less than other amazon devices, as expected. otherwise, a handy way to add alexa to areas at a reasonable price.
title: handy for what it is

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Kirk M. Palermo
content: It's good for Alexa integration, as expected and described, speaker is not high fidelity... lol, I do use the usb port quite a bit.
title: Works good, like the usb addition!!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Ethan
content: This product has been great to add to my bedroom so that I can turn on and off other smart devices, or to listen to audiobooks or the news in the morning.
title: Great way to start the day

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: J Wayne
content: Seemed like a good introductory price to add a unit but DOT was same price on sale for the Holidays so it was not a good buy at this time. :(
title: Was Not Good Buy at This Holiday Season

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: jailee
content: It's nice. But the sound is too low. It's lower than the echo dot. Not only that That extra piece I paid  $15 for I still don't know what it does.
title: The sound is too low!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: John McInnis
content: This is fantastic to put in small places. Not going to listen to music, but does everything else you need the echo to do, Love it
title: Very Useful

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Chance
content: Get a small blue tooth speaker to go with it (any will do), the speaker in the echo is pretty bad (not good for listening to music on at all).
title: Great with an external speaker

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: HENRY CARROW
content: Easy to install. Great in bathroom
title: Great for bathroom

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: JP57
content: This device volume is very low. In many case I had to repeat the Alexa command many times until it heard me. Not recommended in places where there’s other noises in the area
title: Volume too low

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Walter Betances
content: Voice recognition and sound quality very awful. I would only use in a very small area and buy when offered at  is 50% off or lower.
title: Not worth full price.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: G Clanin
content: I use this in the kitchen for information only at a low price. This should not be purchased for music options. It is great for answering questions such as date, weather, or similar types of information.
title: Non-music information in kitchen

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: EricT
content: I already had 3 echos and bought a 3 pack of these to fill out the rest of my house, it will hear my anywhere now. Setup was literally as easy as plugging it in and that was that, it found the network, the account and synced up all on its own. Big fan of the echo in all its forms.
title: Used for a ubiquitous experience throughout the entire house

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: DesireeO
content: No where near the quality I was expecting. The sound quality is very poor often soundig distorted or muffled. Being an extremely satisfied owner of the echo dot and the echo input I was expecting the same type of quality and satisfaction from the echo flex. Sadly I can't say this is a product I would recommend to my family and friends or that I would be wanting to purchase again.
title: Disappointed buyer.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: P. Clark
content: It is perfect for my use. Tone is not good but I only listen to talk radio. If you want to listen to music, I suggest one of the other Alexa products.
title: Great for talk radio

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: randyradar
content: Love this Alexa as a second system. Price is great, Bluetooth connection works great. This I my 4th Alexa...all different models. Works perfect when using a remote speaker.
title: Works great as a second Alexa

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: CJ
content: put one of these in the bedroom so the gov't can get a more complete picture of my family's private life.  I have little doubt the NSA will be pleased.
title: I want you!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: PATTYCAKES
content: Great convenient device. Only complaint is the sound quality. It sounds metallic and pingy. Wish that the speaker was better quality. Would be amazing to listen to music from the device.
title: Great idea, poor sound quality.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Gina
content: Sounds quality not as good as others. It’s small which I like so it won’t take up any space but the sounds is t very good to listen to any type of music or using as a timer or alarm
title: Not quality sound

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Andrew Altman
content: I love these little guys. The speaker isn’t so great but I put them in the garage, bathroom, and on the back porch to help with my whole home sound.
title: Love it

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Mickey A.
content: Just as easy to hookup as any Dot. Sound was disappointing. Very tinny. Cured with my Bluetooth Boise speaker. Nice for a bathroom. Plugs into any ac receptacle.
title: Nice product, but sound.......

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: FeFeTay80
content: The speaker is awful... If you plan on using this to listen to music, then you’ll be sadly disappointed. The volume is very low, even when it’s put up to the max level of 10. Although the speaker quality is awful, if you’re just looking for a simple Amazon/Alexa  smart assistant to boss around and integrate with your other home devices, then this is for you. It connected to all me other smart devices with no problem.
title: Don’t expect to hear it...

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: SM
content: Handy space saving echo perfect for bathrooms and other small areas plays radio stations and communicates if needed. Also works great in the car with ac/dc adapter. Bought two so far!
title: Convenient and so easy to use

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Georgia Beltran
content: Set up was easy. Sound quality is great. For it having a small speaker it is pretty loud. You can control the volume in the Alexa app or by the sound of your voice. It does the same thing as the Alexa show8.
title: Great sound

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: F. MISLA
content: Excellent for completing whole house integration of Your Alexa network. Really great for use in a bathroom, especially with the nightlight attachment. Sometimes when you are showering something comes to mind, that you can have alexa remind you of later or ask her to add to your calendar. She pretty much installed herself...the easiest Alexa I have ever added.
title: Another Alexa for a useful area

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: May
content: We have one in every bedroom now and we use it as a voice calendar for the kids to keep track of their schedule for remote learning.
title: We love Alexa

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: dsummer
content: I don't use it to play music so the sound quality doesn't bother me but  the sound is a little tinny.  Otherwise this little gadget works great.
title: makes a nice addition

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Christopher Williams
content: It’s okay, kind of expected better sound quality from an Amazon device. Would I buy again??? Probably not. Twenty bucks, oh well.
title: Poor quality in sound

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Parker S.
content: 3 stars because of the terrible sound quality and volume. I chose to connect mine to a sony bluetooth speaker. When connected to a speaker it's great.
title: Good But Not Great

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: mrshryan1215
content: Love it plugged into outlet it was ready to go nice speaker also has a charging port! Everything the dot can do excellent price
title: Awesome wall smart device

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Tasha
content: The speaker is not as good as the echo, but I really like the nightlight attachment. It is super bright and changes colors really well. The speaker is ok for when Alexa answers and with spoken things, like news updates, but it is definitely lacking for music. It is ok for rain sounds. It isn’t as loud as the echo, either. If you want an Alexa enabled night light, pick this. If you want a speaker more, then get an echo.
title: Good with night light, speaker is disappointing

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Steven Kollerbohm
content: Quite enjoyable and easy to set up. Pretty much cheap enough to buy to seem like you're living large. Just need to have wifi. At minimum. And try to not overindulge for more than 1 room.
title: A cheaper way to have alexa.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Emma
content: I'm using these mainly to control the lighting in most of my house. They work very well, no issues at all with voice control, installation was immediate and for 20$ you cant beat them.
title: Great addition to home voice control

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: UnicornMom
content: Fits directly in the plug so easier to use in some spaces.  Does not have a plug on the outside so you do lose an outlet.  Speaker is not so great.
title: It's okay

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: AKA94
content: I bought 2 of these speakers and put one in my bedroom and one in my bathroom. The voice recognition is great and love being able to use Alexa throughout my condo.
title: Love this speaker

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: SanibelMike
content: The device is simple, compact, has good Alexa integration. Voice quality is horrible which sometimes causes misinterpretation.
title: Echo Flex is Basic

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: emily
content: Pretty cool. Alexa set it up all by herself. It was automatically integrated into all my Alexa enabled units. Very easy. Just what I needed.
title: Just what I needed for my basement.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: CoolEngineer
content: I have this in my travel bag and plug it in next to my bed when I'm away to get time, weather and things to do all before I get up.  I use the optional smart plug to control the lamp next to the bed and it's just like home.  The sound isn't great but it's plenty good enough ;-)
title: Great for Travel

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Elizabeth Herod
content: Pretty neat little device.  Put one in each of my bathrooms. Does what I ask of it and can play music on Alexa and both Echo Flexs by giving Alexa a command.
title: Easy to stream music everywhere!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Phil Mikesell
content: I purchased 2 for me and 2 for my kids, we love them. This is a nice extension of our Echo. The speaker is not super loud, but it's not intendid to be like the dot. Works great.
title: I love my Echo Flex.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: K. White
content: I love the Echo products, and I bought this one knowing it was just to our in a small space, not to have the beautiful sound of the Show. It's in my kitchen, helps me control my lights,can tell me weather, set a timer,and all the other Alexa skills we know and love.
title: Just what it says

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: RoeN
content: Have it plugged in by my hallway on my way out the front door. It’s small and fit’s my needs of walking back to my kitchen where my Show is located.
title: Love it!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Swede
content: It is what I expected.  Works well with Alexa, plugs right into an outlet.  Sound quality is bad, but good enough for my use.
title: works

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Zach H.
content: I got it to expand my Echo network in my home, and especially wanted to use it with the separate motion sensor. It was super easy to set up, and I created a routine for the lights in the room to turn on when motion is sensed after 5pm. It works perfectly and I’m glad I got it.
title: Very pleased

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Satinder Pabla
content: Good alternative to echo device , it would be nice if the unit has an outlet so something else can be plugged into it & controller via voice .. sound quality needs to be improved
title: Value for money

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Alfredo Suarez
content: Lo utilizo para controlar dispositivos de domotica a través de alexa en cualquiera de los dos idiomas. Inglés y español. Responde bien a ambos. Además como luz de noche en pasillos y otras areas
title: Sus prestaciones y calidad

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: KCatanzarite
content: This works out well for me because I don't have room for anything else on my night table. I plugged it into the wall and Alexa basically set the whole thing up for me. Doesn't get any easier than that.
title: Just plug it in

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Chris Lara
content: Purchased 2.  One for my downstairs powder room and one for the garage.  Allowed me to get rid of Echo gen 1's.  Clean and easy to setup.
title: Exactly as expected

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Noel
content: Sound isn't great, but synced with my Bluetooth speaker fixed that. Now its great. I got the nightlight, should have got motion detector.
title: It works, sound without external speaker is poor.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Jer
content: Walk into our bathroom, light amd exhaust fan turn on, lights turn off 5 minutes after you leave and fan 15 minutes after motion stops in bathroom.  We absolutely love the automation!
title: Super easy setup for automating bathroom lights and exhaust fans

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Trevor Skoczen
content: The Flex is useful in the bathroom and other small areas where voice echoes easier. I used it to play Amazon Music and control lights. However, in a larger room it did not pick up voice as well as the Echo Dot I have in my bedroom. I recommend getting the Flex if you are less likely to buy a full-size Echo Dot when it is impractical for the cost and coverage. Otherwise, the Echo Dot is best as a primary Echo device.
title: Great Dot Alternative

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Helio
content: This device is so weird but it works for me in my garage with the light just don’t get why my light is is on when I go in garage
title: Idk

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: db
content: Does the job! Sound quality is not great, but I hooked it up to a Bluetooth speaker and now cooking, dishwashing, etc. in my kitchen is “swinging”!
title: Sounds Like Alexa is “Phoning” It In!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Johny5ol
content: The sound quality is lacking, but I guess that is the trade off for the small size. It is perfect for the little guest bath we put it in, but wouldn’t be good in a room any larger. The other echo devices - such as the small Dot - have MUCH better sound.
title: Ok

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Roy T
content: I like it. I also, purchased the light that connects to it.  It was a good price and I like the Alexa devices very much. The only down side to this is the sound quality of the music. I know it not a big device so I will have to get used to it.
title: Nice to have something small in my kitchen.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Saylarry
content: Your browser does not support HTML5 video. It works perfectly fine and Alexa is so responsive 😍 and the microwave is not too big but medium no regrets so far
title: Worth buying

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Lisa D
content: This a great addition to the Alexa lineup. We put one in the bathroom to turn on our hot water circulator pump that is plugged into an Alexa plug.  It’s perfect for a cheap Alexa source. The sound quality isn’t great but look at the size and price. Great for what it is and what it’s for.
title: Perfect for what it is and what it costs.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: DealMaker
content: As with all Alexa devices, voice recognition is ehh. Sound Quality is an unfair question as it is not supposed to sound great. Overall ok
title: Does what it was designed to do.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Jeanne Chambon
content: I read a few reviews before purchasing and wasn’t really sure if I should purchase. But I am so glad I did. I have this in my bathroom and boy does it come in handy. I’m able to find out the time and play music. The sound quality surprised me.
title: Worth the money

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Wesley D Perino
content: The product works well for announcements, but that’s about it. Basic Alexa commands such as telling the time is a decent way to use this product but the speaker is not very loud. Often times it is difficult to hear replies.
title: Great for announcements

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: ScoutMomOf2
content: Just perfect. Biw indent have to buy another echo. I already have 6 lol. So these are amazing. I wish the sound could be louder. I love the other echos for their volume but this one stays pretty low.
title: Prefect add on.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Deborah Loretto
content: Just plug it in and it sets up itself! I have 4 other devices and it’s just as easy to use!  The sound isn’t great, but it’s clear and satisfies my needs! It’s nice to plug it in and still have an outlet available!
title: Great Addition to the Echo Family!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Mariano Piñeiro
content: Este producto está bastante bien si uno quiere familiarizarse con la familia Echo de Amazon Alexa. Es bastante útil para ambientes donde uno no quiere tener cables entre el producto y la tomacorriente. Es fácil de enchufar y listo. Lo único malo es la baja potencia de sonido, pero eso te lo detallan al comprar. Recomendable para ambientes chicos.
title: Recomendable para empezar a probar los productos Echo de Alexa

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Jenna
content: I use my Flex in the kitchen and it’s nice to have it out of the way and not taking up counter space. I mostly use it for music and timers when I’m cooking, cleaning, etc. so if you’re looking for something basic - this is perfect.
title: Efficient Space Saver

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: JTStraus
content: Although the sound quality is not nearly as good as the other ECHO products, my ECHO flex allows me to listen to radio or music in my bathroom.
title: ECHO flex increases your area...

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Heather Heim
content: The speaker is very tinny, and doesn't even come close to the quality of an Echo Dot.  It was difficult to get to sync initially with the Alexa Echo, and when I lost power, I couldn't get it to sync again at all.  Currently sitting in a drawer unused.
title: Buy an Echo Dot instead

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Justin Arney
content: Everything about this was amazing. It plugs straight into the wall outlet which makes it a super easy plug and play. The only thing i had a gripe about was the sound quality wasn't where it should have been. The speakers are not powered enough for overall sound ability.
title: Amazing mini alexa but poor audio

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Noelia Vela
content: I use this in my restroom, it works perfect. I use it to turn on and off lights. Ask for the weather that morning as I am getting dressed. Speaker is nothing like the other echos, so playing music on its not so great. All in all I love it for what I wanted it for, A smart night light. I would buy this again for another small area in my house.
title: Great for small areas.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: HPK
content: Flexible so you can plug and go anywhere in house, but with such a small speaker it is limited.  Works great in bathroom!!!
title: Goes all over house just plug in!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Carlos Castillo
content: I find the echo flex to be a very convenient device. I purchased two of them, one for my bathroom and another one for the kitchen. The setup was fast and easy. I think it’s good as a secondary device for smaller spaces/areas as since the audio quality is just enough for such kinds of spaces. I don’t think it would work well in larger spaces. For me, it works well for the intended space that I put them in (bathroom and kitchen). Overall, a good device.
title: Convenient device

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: IdaBro
content: As long as you're not using the Flex for music it fits the bill perfectly for me.  I get Alexa integration without the cord and it was at a great price point.
title: Great for using Alexa

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: James of Kirkwood
content: PROS: ▪︎ Mounts on wall in outlet in rooms where counter space is limited. ▪︎ Responds most if the time ▪︎ Reasanable value CONS: ▪︎ Unacceptable speaker quality  for music
title: Good Value for Rooms that Have Limited Countertops

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: khalia Spencer
content: I love everything about the echoes as soon as I see one I’m ready my house is like an Alexa house I have nothing bad to say about them
title: I am a fan

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: SkyRocker
content: I like that it plugs into an outlet, not a separate device that needs plugged in.  Ours is currently in our kitchen and totally out of the way.  Easy to forget it's there until it's needed.
title: Easy to fit into smaller spaces.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Michele Bello
content: Nice, small, compact, works as expected.  I just plugged it in and it worked.  It required practically no setup.  It was amazing Amazon.
title: Nice, small, compact, works nicely

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Tim B.
content: I am using this unit in my bathroom. While I do wish the speaker to be better on it, it work as well as my echos when requesting information.
title: Nice small size unit

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Warren Wooledge
content: But one of these and put it in my bathroom it works great for a night light. I liked it so well I bought another one for my other bathroom
title: It's an echo and a Night light.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: GeoSteve
content: Great little device. All the abilities of Alexa in a wall plug. I got the light accessory and it gives me the ability to get some light in the garage when the automatic lights associated with the opener turn themselves off, with me in a dark garage.
title: Great flexibility

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Roger
content: Very nice little product. Voice recognition is great even im noisy areas. Small enough it doesn't block the other outlet. The only downside is the sound quality for music, it sounds like an old transistor radio, pretty poor.
title: Great unit but not for music.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Takes The Cake
content: We knew sound quality wasn't going to be as good as a dot, but did surprise us. It's a close second. Love that there's no cord. Sometimes mic is a bit sensitive and will respond from across the house. It was everything we wanted.
title: No cords and responsive mic

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Kathy G Davies
content: I am still working on it but with all have got done it has been good.  I love listening to the radio and the special sleep sounds it plays.
title: Glow

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: S.M.
content: I love that I could add a motion sensor to the echo flex that I could set to turn on the lights when it sensed motion. The installation/connecting process was simple. The speaker is not very loud, but that is my only complaint.
title: Easy set up, useful,  but quiet if you're looking for sound

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: S.  Farrer
content: We use the echo flex for announcements and drop in ability. We have Tap downstairs and it doesn't have that ability.
title: Mini Echo

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Patrick J. Rogers
content: Neat little device.  Have it in my garage for general use and to activate some Alexa controlled lights.  So far so good.
title: Neat little device

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Shawn Dorris
content: Absolutely wonderful! Perfect replacement for my annoying alarm clock with the bothersome glowing light at night. Alexa wakes me each morning with either the sound or the hilarious comedy routine I choose. I don't like having a tv in my bedroom but with the echo flex it's easy to ask Alexa and find out the time and weather as I rise. Good low cost investment!
title: Great value for so many uses

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: BloodyJester
content: Use mine all the time for pretty much everything got several wireless plug synced to it so I can control everything in my room
title: Amazing product

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Pawl
content: Even plugged into amplified speakers it sounds bad, tried other devices with the same speakers and it isn't the speakers
title: Not for music even with add on speakers

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Marilyn G.
content: Love it for what it is and it started our smart home journey does what it says and will get more after i get the echo 5 and ring door bell
title: Perfect for what it intended for

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Kris M.
content: Great for the flash briefing while brushing the teeth...and with a bluetooth speaker/light bulb combo, also nice to listen to music in the shower.
title: Great for the bathroom

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: ATLien
content: Added the Flex to a room in my basement that is not close to my echo. I use it to turn on the lights in my man cave and it works like a charm. Recognizes all commands and controls all of my connected devices. Wonderful addition to the echo family!!
title: Add some Flex to your Echo Family

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: James Williams
content: I like everything about it but the sound quality is horrible you got to be right next to it to hear it and sometimes it doesn't recognize my voice I don't know why but it happens sometimes, it does what an Alexa supposed to do I just wish they made it louder.
title: It's ok.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: GREG ZUPAN
content: I finally found a solution to adding Alexa to the lavatory to allow music for my two year old during bath time.  It was even better after adding the USB add-on night light component. This device that is useful and a great deal.
title: With night light, great addition to bathroom

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: David Ponce
content: This is maybe no it is just for a baby’s room or a child’s room. The volume on this thing is horrible! I wouldn’t recommend it.
title: Sound Quality Stinks

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Humble & Kind
content: Unbelievably clear speaker which is basically a mini echo.  It does everything the echo does and more if you add the accessories.
title: Basically a mini echo

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: William C. Likes, Jr.
content: When they say the speaker is nothing to write home about, they are not kidding. The night light accessory is nice
title: Don’t buy it for the speaker

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Randal Cormier
content: In the bathroom! Where I can sit and listen to news or music have farts sounds make noise while friends ask if I’m ok!
title: In the bathroom!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Dale R. Shaw, CPS
content: We use it for an additional speaker and nightlight controller as well as a motion detector in three areas of our home.
title: Cool addition to your home

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Alex007
content: Very convenient. Speaker is too small to hear any definition in your music, otherwise just like the other echo products.
title: Just like other echo products

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Randy & Angela
content: Massive piece of trash, Never works says "i can't play right now" etc buggy since I got it months ago.  Save money don't buy.
title: Junk

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: CajunWaffles
content: Sound quality is horrible... can't hear the thing. Also standing three feet from it I can't get alexa to work.... literally need to yell.
title: horrible sound quality

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Leticia
content: I am really impressed by the ecoflex it works really well it's super compact and easy to use. I would recommend this as a gift for anyone and the price is outstanding.
title: I love it

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Brady M.
content: Love the ability to drop in on my kids and tell them dinners ready rather then having to climb over the baby gate, don the stairs and knock on their name.
title: Great device to replace a home intercom system

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: dtg
content: This unit when asked to play my music... starts and says it is going to play and then goes silent. Or it starts playing and then just stops. My other devices do no do this.
title: quits playing

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: mikelauren2011
content: Awesome device.  I keep it in my garage and have it Bluetooth to a nicer larger speaker. Great for applications like that, where its outside and you have Bluetooth speakers already connected to it.
title: Awesome product

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Believe Me or Don't!
content: If you're using Amazon echo etc in your home these handy little devils will really help. Small, efficient and work like a charm.
title: Good Product

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Steven
content: This is just a unit to use in your kitchen or such so as you can get information as needed but don’t rely on out for exceptional sound
title: Functional

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Daniel J.
content: This is my 9th Echo device. Sometimes I have to repeat commands a few times before Alexa takes action, but I very satisfied with the Echo Flex.
title: Echo Flex small issue but overall a great device

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Gator
content: Amazing item. Immediately connected with WiFi. Answers questions, plays music just like echo. Well worth the price.
title: Great item.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: LT.DAN
content: I love Alexa products in general I do like the easy set up that the flex offers , not recommended for music unless u connect a blue tooth speaker ,
title: Easy set up

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Michael B.
content: I have a back bedroom and got tired of yelling to get my Kitchen Echo to turn the light on. I saw this was on sale and solved my problem. It is cute and works well.
title: Compact and Functional

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Godschild..
content: Never able to use. Even with the help of tech support. Usaually good customer support. But not on this one. Just did not work.
title: Not for me... disappointed.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: shejeeper
content: Reminded me of my first Philco transistor radio back in the 50’s.  Lots is static and hard to tune or obtain right volume level.  I have requested authorization to return.
title: very disappointed

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Abrion bell
content: Using Flex to connect to the other Echo Dots in my home. It’s working great thus far and the sound quality is great. Very fine product.
title: Echo Flex

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Mr. Rob
content: Sound is mediocre at best but is NOT designed to work as full size/full function device. "Listens" better than expected.
title: Works as described

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Gigi
content: I like it because I have a plug close to the bed and there's no wires so the voice is close to the bed so you can hear it
title: No wires does it take any space on dresser

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: VickieC
content: I really like that this plugs in rather than sits on the counter.  It is really unnoticeable but there when you need it.  The price was right.
title: Smart little thing

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: D. K. Johnson
content: A nice way to add an "input" to your Alexa smart home.  It's small, sounds pretty good, and has a USB charger built in.
title: It works

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Joyce Szewczyk
content: I love it!  I bought it to integrate with my Echo Dot and use as an intercom between floors in my home. It could be a little louder but it works great!
title: I love it. Could have been a little louder, but works great.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: @RODr
content: If you are integrating this to a bigger stereo and you want it to have Alexa, which is why I bought it, it’s perfect to integrate your non Alexa/Echo sound system.
title: Only buy it if...

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Don Butler
content: A nice little extension of Alexa into other rooms... best for smart device control or intercom function w other echo devices. If you want this for music or speaker quality, you’ll need to purchase up to at least Dot. But I love it for my purposes!
title: Love it as Alexa extension for smart device control.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Ke Chen
content: The sound quality is really poor. Better choose Echo dot 2nd edition or Google mini speaker instead with a similar price.
title: not recommended.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: PeaceVA
content: This Alexa has hearing issues - you have to shout to be heard and her voice is weak! My kids’ time out closet is the best place for her to work.
title: Social implications

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Joseph A. Preusser
content: I have multiple Alexa devices and added this one for the night light add-on feature in our stairway.  Surprising how good the speaker is.  Great for an add-on type device.
title: Great Little add-on speaker

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Pook
content: I wouldn’t buy this for the sound. The function of it seems as good as my Dots and adds locations where a dot isn’t suitable. The motion sensor is great for turning on light groups without any verbal commands.
title: Great for out of the way locations.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: destanye
content: I really liked the idea of this but it is very far behind the echo dot. The voice recognition is not nearly as good and the speaker is just... bad
title: Not there yet

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: BurrSir
content: Great little echo plug. Poor audio quality, so it’s meant more as a small microphone. But for $20, it gets the job done for a small space.
title: Great microphone, so-so audio quality

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Greg Nelson
content: I am using this in combination with my security system. I use the Flex for making announcements in the kitchen. This takes up little space, has a USB port for charging my phone and the sound quality is good enough for my needs. Music is handled by Sonos so music fidelity was not a requirement.
title: Works perfectly  for my scenario

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Biff Richly
content: Excellent portability and flexible location make it a useful addition to my legacy echo devices. Add-ons are a bonus.
title: Portable and flexible

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Autumn Gangelhoff
content: I got this product because we needed something for the bathroom that would allow us to still use the bottom outlet. I got the smart light add on as well for a night light. I'm totally impressed! This is showing the light at about 10% light because I'm very light sensitive at night. You can also change the light colors. And I was able to hear it great from the shower. For such a small speaker it sounds awesome! I'm very happy with this purchase.
title: Works great upside down!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Walter Ferreira
content: Love the compact for factor and lack of a cable.  The speaker volume is very low, making it a strain to hear reminders or timers in a medium to large room.  More suitable to a small bedroom, den or office.
title: Speaker could do with a bit more volume

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Luka
content: All good. Dont think the primary function is playing music so don't expect or complain about it. Ours works well with all the smart home tech.
title: No conplaints

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: William  VanStaveren
content: Can share a wall outlet .  Love the small size footprint.  Does not have a high-fidelity speaker.  Can plug in a ext speaker.
title: Works just fine with Alexa.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Eugene Evans
content: What I love is it does not take up much space and it serves the purpose of bringing music to the kitchen while I cook. Greatest buy of the year!
title: Packs a punch

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Christina Morgan
content: I love my echo flex. She’s polite. Lol. I seem to have more trouble communicating with the echo dot. Her speaker isn’t the greatest but considering that it’s just a portable Alexa that plugs in an outlet. I have no complaints. I haven’t really used any of her features beyond turning lights off and on or setting alarms.
title: I love my Alexa Flex!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Dan M
content: You pretty much have to speak facing the echo flex. The speaker is too small and the voice is shrill to some extent. For listening to music a Bluetooth speaker is recommended.
title: Poor Mic and Speaker

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Capt. Davo
content: I love this little version of Alexa; it's very responsive to my voice.  I use it to turn off lights; I have Amazon plugs for quite a few of my lights.  The speaker is very small but that's not the purpose.  It extends my Echo.  I would highly recommend this product if you want to make sure Alexa hears you.
title: Great Amazon Product

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Dan
content: This little unit is quite impressive. I hooked up some old PC speakers i had from the garage and the sound is great!
title: Works great!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: chloegirl
content: Took a little while to get them all set up, but now it’s great, have two story house so now we can communicate easily
title: Great little device

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: hard to please
content: I put one in the bathroom and the other in a guest room. I love it, gets me my weather so I know how to dress in the morning. I can listen to my flash news, the speakers are ok, but not the best for music. My guests love it as well. They were very impressed with it.
title: Perfect for getting ready in the morning

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: JaeMahal
content: Just use the app and installation is easy. Pick the alerts you like and it also send notifications to your device when you are away. We use it with the sensor.
title: Works well

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Marietta
content: Its nice to have the same capabilities as the Alexa in my home office.  Only fall back is the speaker is hard to hear because its a smaller version.
title: Flex

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Omar López
content: Amazon needs to improve the microphone and audio, interacting with alexa becomes disappointing on the EchoFlex. My echo dot works without problems for many years but my new EchoFlex don’t responde to simple commands like turn on / turn off the lights and timers. I’m looking for a little one to fit with my coffee maker plug I select EchoFlex and I very disappoint.
title: Interacting with alexa becomes disappointing

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Dharmonithe evra
content: Great for placing in obscure places! Sound quality isn’t the BEST but i use these in my bathrooms and on my balcony, places you don’t need the greatest sound. (I have an echo device in every room and all the other ones have amazing sound) I love the convenience of being able to place these anywhere.
title: Great addition to obscure places!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Jeff Hills
content: Basically installed itself. Sound is not as good as the other units but it works nice as an intercom for us. I am very happy with this.
title: Easy to install

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: VICKI CARROLL
content: What a great product and I got it at the discounted price which makes me love it more. Works perfectly with my echo dot.
title: Great Product

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Carlos
content: It is great for keeping on the bathroom or garage. It would be nice if one of the accessories was a better speaker
title: It is convenient but the speaker is lacking

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Dr d.
content: Works very well. I like that it's compact. As others have said Don't expect high sound quality but it works great.
title: Handy

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: T. Minor
content: Sound quality is low and hard to hear... but it'll do! I have a lot of devices and this is the worst sound quality
title: Decent

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Jason Downes
content: I placed this in my bathroom area and plug speakers into it so I can get music while I shower and shout random commands if I need to. Works okay for the most part just that it does not respond sometimes, Hence why I gave star short.
title: It's okay

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Edward Daly
content: The flex could be a great product if it came with a better or louder speaker....they tell you it's not good for music......but it's also not great for voice either....over all I'm happy with this product .
title: Good....but could be better.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: RGonzalez247
content: Great for having Alexa in your hallway, bathroom, guest room - but only for commands, not good to hear music with.
title: cool little gadget

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: HIPam
content: It's great! Got it as a Lightning Deal to accompany our two other Alexas at home. Set up took seconds. Great deal!
title: Convenient and Space Saving

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Jordan N.
content: This device needs a serious speaker upgrade. We have a hard time getting it to respond and also hearing it. Many times an Alexa in the next room will complete the command and this one won't even recognize we spoke.
title: Doesn't fit our needs

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Don S.
content: It’s not loud enough. Works great but in a busy kitchen it’s not very good. For a bathroom it might work better.
title: Needs to be louder

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Kewalo surfer
content: Works well, sound quality not all that good. That's my only complaint, everything else works fine and as expected.
title: Sound quality is OK, not great.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Christina F.
content: Portable and easy to use, just plug into wall socket. Not the best sound but seamless integration.  Helps to keep my routine while traveling.
title: Alexa on the go to feel at home

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Mike K.
content: Very portable, and works well with voice recognition. Speaker is a bit tinny though. But to be expected for price. Overall a good product.
title: Nice and portable!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Bartoomann
content: This product does a great job.  It is priced right and well constructed.  I would recommend heartily. A real buy!
title: Price is right

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: KHM2011
content: With a smaller kitchen and my want to not have a ton of things on my counters this is perfect. although the sound quality is definitely laking compared to my other Echo's. I knew that it would be different due to its smaller size but its big downgrade.
title: Perfect for the Kitchen

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: chance G.
content: Convenient. Not quite the sound quality but very functional and small. Good addition if you already have the dot.
title: Works well

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: John d L
content: A regular ALEXA  except sound not as good as regular Echo dot  don't take hardly any space no wires around  GREAT
title: GREAT UNIT

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Paul Gagnon
content: I find this device just as good as all my other alexa, echo appliances. I like its appearance and functionality, its performance exceeds my expectations.
title: Great new echo device

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Suki
content: It worked for a while and then stopped. I have only had it about two months or so. I cannot get Amazon to replace it. NOT HAPPY
title: No support by Amazon if it goes bad

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Judy S.
content: I have several echo devices mainly in my living room and bedroom that have better sound for listening to music.  I use the flex  in my bathroom and spare bedroom mainly to listen to the news getting the weather. The fact you just plug it into any outlet makes this a great addional devise.
title: Convenient

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Clark Kent
content: This product works great in my master bathroom. The sound quality isn’t the best when in the shower but it works perfect for my routine in the morning.
title: Great Product

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: My Humble Opinion
content: This stopped working after a couple of weeks so I sent it back. When it was working the volume is very low so I wasn’t very happy with it. An echo dot is a much better choice.
title: Didn’t last long

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Melissa H.
content: I like this handy little device, it makes my home automation easy and super convenient! The speaker is small, yes, but it is not distorted and plays quite wonderfully.
title: Extra home automation

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Dee stew
content: I like the idea but I have 2 and Alexa kept connecting to the wrong one and they would both work in different kids rooms as one instead of 2 different.
title: Not a fan

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Randy
content: The small form factor is ideal for rooms where there is limited table/counter space for tube or hockey puck Echos. Its great for the kitchen. The sound quality is surprisingly good for its size.
title: Space-saving Echo solution

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Toni Monti
content: Able to plug in by my bed so I can easily ask for an alarm or the time etc.. It's very handy. The price is really great.
title: Great plug in for my bedroom

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: lesbians rock
content: It serves me well. I use it in my bathroom. I love listening to the news while doing my hygiene routine. It’s great to add things to my shopping list, always think of items when I’m showering. Even though it’s not meant to use for music I still do, guess I’m not picky. Lol
title: Serves me well

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Earl M. Parker
content: I purchased Echo Flex to use in case of an emergency - then found that I couldn't put phone numbers in Echo Flex without a smart phone. There are quite a few seniors that really need this service and don't have smart phones. You are really missing the boat. This would be the most economical service for seniors. Please do something for all of use that need this service.  Earl Parker
title: Seniors without smart phones can't use Echo Flex for emergencies

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Stephen Mann
content: I will be buying at least one more Flex, but I also have the Echo clock  in two rooms.  Bummer- the Echo Flex is "incompatible" with the Echo clock.
title: Almost the best Echo device in the house.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Sergio Mauricio Jimenez Muñoz
content: Se integra fácilmente con Alexa y demás dispositivos. La calidad del sonido es regular a mala. No es para escuchar música pero puedes enlazar con otro equipo que tenga mejor sonido y muy bien. En espacios grandes no reconoce bien la voz toca gritar. En realidad es un intercomunicador que facilita la comunicación con Alexa y demás dispositivos. Cumple mis expectativas para el uso que le voy a dar.
title: Muy buena integracion con Alexa

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: J Muschett
content: They are perfect the bridge that has Alexa in every nook and cranny of our three story home. Even in our shed. No more heads around a corner yelling "Alexa ... ..... ...! " we have 5 about the house synced with and echo, a spot, a dot, and a fire TV cube.. They control 30 devises and growing. We added the USB night light add on in certain places.
title: They fill in Alexa's gaps.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Lon Sander
content: I use echo flex to play soft night music to help me relax when I go to bed, and echo flex provides me with a nightlight dusk to dawn so that I don’t stumble during the night.
title: My other best friend.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Wink
content: Nice size, extends the Alexa environment to other rooms.  I use with the motion detector and its a great combination.
title: Very happy Alexa addition

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: AvidGamer
content: I love the convience of these! Im now able to put Alexa in areas I otherwise wouldn't be able to. The caveat is that the volume level isnt that loud. Otherwise, this is fantastic!!!
title: Love it!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Andrew Young
content: I bought two of these and I cannot figure out what they do. I attached the night lights to them and they work well.
title: I have no idea what these do, but I like them

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Adriana Nicole Williams
content: I don’t like having to YELL ALEXA, several times, before receiving a response!! Nerve wrecking!! I don’t use it because of this. It’s just plugged into the wall, running up my light bill 🤨
title: Voice recognition is HORRIBLE!!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: SandBox's Dude
content: Echo flex is the cutest little addition to the house. I got several for all the rooms around hone. WONDERFUL!!
title: Echo Flex is the vest little helper for Alexa

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Grant Belgrave
content: Based on other reviews and the specs I knew the sound quality wouldn't match the Echo or even the Dot - but for the price, it's a good add-on device (as long as you don't want or expect high-quality sound.
title: Knew it won't have a great sound system

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: TIna Cubero
content: Alexa sounds different alittle more tinty but for use to turn on all lights and other commands of automated house.
title: Works great for all commands and as the intercom.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: R. Franklin
content: The speaker is great for an out-of-the way area in our home where it's nice to stay and remain connected and also to manage our ring system.
title: Space saving design

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: fred zabala
content: I already expected what the sound quality will be on the is device, but that wasn’t my main purpose on why I purchased this.  I placed one echo flex in the garage.  I love this device because it’s so useful as a bridge to all my other echo devices.
title: Great add on for all existing echo devices.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Jeremy Collins
content: This product is great for bathrooms,the kitchen,garages or places where you'd like to issue voice commands to various smart devices around you house. We have it in the nursery which it's a great fit for. Also,if you'd like to add a night or motion sensors to a space. The mics picks up really well. I wish they add better sound quality/output in the next gen as well as making the accessories stackable.
title: Flexible!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: David Logiudice
content: All the things you love in your Echo, but with the extra convenience of not needing a surface to sit on. Great for travel, garage, basement. The (huge) downside is the sound quality, compared to other Alexa devices it’s tinny and high-pitched, not what I expected.
title: Portable and functional, poor sound quality

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Joe Stone
content: This product is convenient as an access to Alexa but the sound quality is poor in comparison to other Amazon Alexa products.
title: Good product with limited sound quality

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Mitchell S.
content: We have several echo devices in our home but I wanted something smaller to plug in near our robot vacuum. The sound isn't that great but it's a tiny speaker and it does it jobs well!
title: Great device

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Vinny
content: Este Echo flex no es un Echo Dot, el sonido es muy muy limitado. Sin embargo es ideal para lugares en los que no necesitamos usarlo para música. Aunque la verdad es que en lugar de comprar este artículo mejor poner un Echo Dot. Sin embargo se le puede instalar un sensor que trabaja muy bien.
title: Echo Dot vs Echo Flex

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Cef
content: I bought 3 of this on prime day for $9 and it’s a great great catch. Put one in all our bedrooms. This is must have!!!
title: Wow

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Alma Narvaez
content: I actually like this smaller Echo Flex. Works perfect in the bathroom. Just like my other Echos.  Great sound for a small room. I love using it when I am relaxing in the tub, also I love listening to the news, weather or music when putting on my make up! I also bought my daughter one for her home office. Great gift. Would order again. Perfect.
title: Great for bathroom

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Loretta S.
content: Love this. I added it to my bedroom so I could use with my tv and lights. This also allows me to hear my music
title: Great purchase

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Brooke mclain
content: Honestly it doesn’t have a great speaker for playing music but it is not awful. I only wished it was able to connect to more bluetooth speakers. I have a cheap $10 insignia Bluetooth speaker but was unable to get it to hook up to it. But great for my kitchen to add things to my to do list, drop in with other rooms and setting hands-free timers.
title: Good

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Grant
content: This is great for a small room that doesn't need total immersive sound, but you still want Alexa capabilities.
title: Great addition to our Alexa home

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Robert Griffin
content: Can't use as a nite light light on front will not stay on different than shown on your sight also can not adjust volum
title: Light and volume

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Ryan Hwang
content: I purchased Echo flex to use at my unfinished basement to control smart work lights. It is great for my use because it can directly connect to the outlet at the ceiling joist. Sound quality is not great but perfectly fine for my needs. Great product.
title: Great for basement

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Corey D Robinson
content: I love these devices. I got them on serious sale on Prime Day. I then saw them on a One -Day sale for 9.99 and bought three more. They plug directly into an outlet and can do all the same things as the echo dot. However, the echo dot has better sound quality. This is a lot of bang for for the buck. You will not be disappointed.
title: A lot of bang for the buck

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: RollingRoll
content: Love it. Perfect for the garage to turn on and off lights. I have it Bluetooth to a speaker. Will buy more.
title: Love it

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Kevin I. Medley
content: Easy set up. Purchased with nightlight. Was able to write routine for turning light on at sunset and off at sunrise in less than 5 minutes. Great device for master bathroom.
title: Echo Flex - Gr8 device good value !!!!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: The Queen Bacon
content: I have a small kitchen and no space for a dot or bigger.  This is perfect for setting timers, asking questions and making announcements that dinner is ready!
title: It's perfect!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Paul Geanta
content: Got those for the bathroom. Sound quality far from an echo dot but paired with bluetooth speaker they are perfect for the bathrooms eliminating all wires
title: Perfect for bathroom

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Fannie Mae
content: Added to the bedroom as a clock and alarm.  Don't need a good speaker there, but wish I could make it louder.
title: Great addition to the bedroom

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: robert morales
content: I’ve attached a Bluetooth speaker to it and use it in the bathroom. Works great
title: Bang for the buck...SCORE

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Tana Williams
content: My family installed it and showed me how to use it. Hands free day and night operations makes my life better and easier.
title: Hands-Free

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Alberto Ong
content: Echo Flex is excellent for small room for price. The sound is decent and not that loud BUT enough for my room.
title: Decent Echo

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Connor
content: Originally I had an Echo Dot in our bathroom, but it was getting all musty and we needed a nightlight. This is much better suited to the bathroom and we got the add on so the nightlight is perfect! The only drawback is it isn't very loud while we're showering, but honestly, it still does the job there too. It helps a lot when we're stuck and need to call for help, or at night for bathroom trips.
title: Great in the bathroom

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Mommi
content: Not what I had hoped for. Sound is harsh, not high quality like the Echo. It doesn’t always hear or understand, and volume is limited. Disappointed. May return and wait for another sale on the Echo - nothing like the original.
title: Disappointing

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: John Parypinski Ris
content: Paired with the nightlight in the bathroom. Great for morning news and night light is bright enough for nighttime bathroom use.  Just depends if you want just an automatic light or an alexa enabled device with automatic light.
title: Great, can’t wait for more accessories.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Nuno Castro
content: It works very well. You have to be aware that it is a little pickier about where you are facing when you talk, since it is mounted flat on a wall.  But as long as you face the wall, I never had any issues. The speakers are perfect for a small room, or if you keep it right next to the bed.  You are not going to have a Rave, but they are loud enough to listen to music while reading or to get notifications.
title: Excellence in a small package.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: yu2K
content: Need seperate module to detect motion. Unable to use motion detection and light module at the same time. Poor speaker.
title: Impractical

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: JR-Texas
content: Added this for the kitchen area.  It was easy to install and set up and worked great first time it was used.
title: Easy Install

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Jufrancis Sofia Marmol
content: Es un equipo estándar a veces no reconoce nuestras voces y al reproducir música o al respondernos no se entiende a pesar de tener un buen volumen
title: Bueno

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Violeta
content: Amazon echo flex is the perfect addition to my kitchen. Works great with clear and good volume for commands.
title: Another amazon great device

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Greggrey Cudworth
content: It works great. The sound is a little tinny but that's what was expected considering the size of the speaker
title: Good buy

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Tan
content: This little thing is great! I have it in my kitchen And  it’s wonderful. Don’t expect good sound quality but when using for commands and questions, she’s perfect!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: monica
content: I have several Amazon electrical devices in my home.  I didn't have one in the kitchen and this is perfect.
title: Its the best

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Ellsworth Geiwitz
content: Convenient to plug anywhere.  Voice is fine, but for music you might want to BT link or plug it an external speaker.
title: Great to plug anywhere.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Helmet098
content: Doesn't wake consistently. Activated for no reason at all. Started playing music when no one was in the room. Wierd.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Christine M. Dallas
content: It’s perfect for where we have it. The sound is tinny, but I expected that and it’s worth it for the convenience. When I want good sound quality, I play music through our Sonos.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: K. Morrison
content: I have my Flex plugged-in in the laundry room. I can use it in this "remote  and lonely" room  to put items on my shopping list.  Convenience...
title: Convenience

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: LUIS SUMAN
content: Trabaja bien la tengo en la cocina, que la echo está bien la sala y la foto en mi cuarto con eso cubro toda la casa.
title: Mi tercer Alexa, pronto viene para el Auto.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: A. Morton
content: So much better than a Dot! Not loud or great sound quality, but neither were expected for a control device. Love that it just plugs right in and take up little space.
title: Finally!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Drew007
content: Sound need improvement. Blue tooth speaker connect’s very fast without drama.i also love the night light !!
title: Flex Bluetooth external speaker connects fast!!!!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Keir
content: It's not bad. Definitely to be used as a quick voice chat rather than a speaker. Sounds quality isn't bad. But it's not good for music.
title: Not too bad

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Erica
content: Sounds quality is okay. I do wish it could hold more than one USB port, but overall I love it. Purchased for my daughters room and works perfectly.
title: Awesome addition

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Jess
content: I love it I have it in my guest room the sound is just perfect everybody in my house can enjoy the benefits
title: Alexa every where

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Alicia M Berkbigler
content: This worked very well for giving extended control for Alexa in a room where the door is generally closed and there were smart devices but no speakers or microphones.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: meiliqunli2000
content: I put this in the kid bathroom, Alexa has become a very fun part device for my kids, even for my 2 year old..
title: Add on fun

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: wendy ramirez
content: It perfect for the kitchen. I play music when washing dishes or cooking, when I want to hear music but don’t want it to be too loud. It doesn’t hear me as well as I would like though. I have to say Alexa several times before it acknowledges me..
