product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Lois
content: Love this because you plug it right into the wall. It does not take up room on my counter. I can plug it in my living room and it’s in the perfect place.
title: Love this flex!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: R. Aponte
content: I put this in my garage, does the trick.  Crappy little speaker bit that's okay I didn't buy it for that reason.
title: Great deal!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: KevinWilliams
content: I USB'd it to a soundbar and remedied all possible issues with sound quality. It has a little difficulty understanding me over the blaring tv, but that's understandable.
title: A USB soundbar addressed any potential issues

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Gary L. Jackson
content: Amazingly flexible design.  I put it in my garage with the motion sensor option.  It now announces "MOTION IN GARAGE" 4X in garage along with dog barking sounds as a deterrent- and announces 1x in various house speakers for situational awarenss.
title: Deterence and Situational Awareness

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Marlen Garza
content: Purchasing the Echo Flex was the best decision I have ever made! I have one in each upstairs room and Iove the voice recognition feature. I have Echo in the kitchen and I can simply say “Alexa announce lunch is ready” and it will do it for me. No more yelling for me. I also love that I can drop in. Oh and my hubby likes that he’s able to to listen to music, the volume  is fair. I definitely recommend Echo Flex.
title: Best Purchase

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Kathleen
content: This Alexa Flex is a good little addition to our system. The sound quality isn't fine enough to play music, but otherwise its good.
title: Nice little addition

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: user947
content: we had to go upstairs to for Alexa to hear us, she is in our bedroom. now we can ask her from kitchen. Nice!
title: nice addition to Alexa

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Christine A. Sexton
content: Good little addition to my Echo family. I put this one in my kitchen, makes adding to my Alexa Grocery list easier
title: Good addition to my Alexa family.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: James Richardson
content: got this for the bathroom with the rib light it is awesome sound is so so but did not get it for the sound
title: amazing product

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Karen Jacobs
content: I was impressed with how clear the speech is on such a small device. I would highly recommend this device.
title: Clarity is excellent

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: joanClayton
content: Could be a more functional device with Alexa. A lil bulky, so have concerns it may get knocked over if someone doesnt know its on the same outlet as upper light switch. Also sound quality is really poor. I would still buy a second one if i could control the sound more. Seems to max out at a pretty low volume.
title: Poor sound quality. Bulkier device than expected.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Freddy A.
content: I love the small speaker in my kitchen.  It works nice for some quiet music or news when I'm in the kitchen.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: The Duke
content: The sound quality is not amazing but that's by design. This little guy is perfect for those places you need your Echo out of the way.
title: Great little device perfect for connecting any external bluetooth speaker.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Rocky
content: Love this product! Such a neat way to integrate Alexa in every room for a killer price. I use mine in the bathroom for little reminders and listening to music. The only thing I would say is that the sound quality could be a little better. Compared to the other Alexa products it’s not as good, but it is also just a plug-in speaker so I guess you can’t expect too much.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Gwen B.
content: It works well for timers, notifications, and adding things to lists but the speakers are not really up to par for music

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: C. McNally
content: Doesn't work as well as the Dot or Echo. Little bummed. If I drop into the room to talk, I can't hear then back.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: C. M. Carlson
content: LOVE IT, LOVE IT, LOVE IT.  SO CONVENIEN. I CAN  go in my room and ask Alexa for some Moody Blues and in an instant I'm there
title: Brilliant, Conveniet, and Versatile

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Johnny
content: Nice design. very minimal and convenient but the sound quality is lacking. It gets the job done but it isn't the dot.
title: Good design but sound is disappointing

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: david
content: I've tried many speakers and talked to Amazon, but cannot get any credible sound out of any eternal speaker, using the mii-plug port.
title: cannot plug in external speaker

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Lon
content: This does exactly what it claims to do. I have my stereo plugged into it to listen to Prime music. Easy set up.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Kevin C.
content: Great device - great for bringing Alexa All through the house - favorite is using the intercom function

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: ash917

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Tina Brock
content: I love it! After reading reviews about the poor sound quality I was pleasantly surprised. My God people what do you expect out of something so small? I ADORE mine!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Marsha
content: Love how it fits in the outlet so is up off the countertop.  It's a little wide so the outlet next to it will only take a standard plug (not one like a hair dryer).  We got it for our bathroom so we don't need a radio anymore and it's perfect.
title: Love it!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Dale Kayser
content: We have them around the house - So handy to have one in the garage and by my nightstand. You need these!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: dave
content: Good for small rooms. Sound quality is subpar but can be easily paired with external speakers.  It's a less expensive way to expand alexa to other rooms, especially if you already have good speakers that pair with alexa.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: CLadage

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: srklop79
content: Speaker is not good. But I did get the night light that is nice but could have done better on speaker

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Lawrence
content: I love the direct plug in so that it doesn't take up counter space.  It works great, but the speaker is pretty bad.  It is OK for voice, but useless for music.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Sharyl Tribble
content: Does just what I wanted it for in the bathroom...I did add the clock attachment (which is great also)...does what the regular Alexas do minus sound quality (which I don’t mind for bathroom) even though I do listen to music while getting ready and it’s fine for that...doesn’t take up any counter space because it’s on the wall outlet...Totally enjoying this purchase.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Tim Lumsden
content: I use in bathroom takes up one outlet.  Sound is poor, but it was expected.  But serves it purpose.
title: Cheap way to get Alexa in bathroom, but don't expect great sound quality.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: TLR
content: Setup was easy.  It works as expected.  We have it paired with a speaker/light bulb in the shower and can give use voice commands to play music in the bathroom.  We have the night light option and the light is brighter than our previous light bulb.  Overall I'm very happy with the item.
title: It works as expected.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Gary L. Westcott
content: Wow. Great buy at around $9. We have two echo’s and added this to go in the kitchen. Really like it there. Just ordered two others fir other rooms.
title: Small and unobtrusive and very handy.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: ESterling
content: It doesn't always pick up my voice especially if there are significant background noice. Bathroom vent and shower. Also for some reason, it's not recognizing the video skills. It wall turn on the TV, but not select netflix, 2 of my 3 devices are doing this.
title: To be expected. Needs just a little refining

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Joseph R. Shivak
content: it's 10 feet from the wifi and it is plugged in next to the electrical box.. maybe interference idk
title: constant alerts it's disconnected from the wifi

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: The Toppers
content: The product is good, but only if you have a bluetooth speaker to pair it with. You can barely hear it even when you're right next to it. I put it in our guest room, luckily we have a bluetooth jukebox we could pair it to so our guests could hear her. Do not recommend without the speaker.
title: Only can be heard with bluetooth speaker

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: David Lee Hedrick
content: Kind of a tin sound, but guess I really didn’t have high expectations for this product but were a good gift for friends.
title: Good but sound is what you would expect at price.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Zer0 Divide
content: Great Product, especially with the nightlight attachment. Built-in speaker’s pretty basic but can attached larger one.
title: Great Little Device!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: wolverine
content: My kids love these things. They listen to music and ask Alexa thousand of questions. Also connects to our Ring door bell.
title: Smart purchase

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Shirley
content: It does everything I want it to and more, but the sound is terrible. I to have learned to live with it though.
title: It obeys

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: S. Shattuck
content: The sound quality is good for price and size of unit, but is not of the level that I would use it to listen to music.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Diego Monroy
content: Perfect everything except the sound quality is definitely not the best compared to the dot. Works well if you just want it to turn things on and off around the house but as a speaker to listen to music, not at all. Definitely buy an echo dot if you want a good speaker. But I loved the space that it doesn’t take up, very small and simple.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: moodygirl
content: I ordered 2 of these thinking they would be good for smaller spaces like the bathrooms album the sound quality is not great for playing music while in the bath or shower.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Roberto Ylla-Diaz

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: David V.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Leslie
content: I love that it allows me to speak instead of yelling across the house. Could play music, but the sound is like an old transistor radio.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Richard Nagel
content: I had to call in to get the smart clock attachment to work.  Had to load the app before it would work.  Instructions that came with it was not any help.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Danni's mom
content: My Flex arrived today and it took no time to set up.  Unlike some other reviewers I found the sound quality to be better than my regular echo.  I would recommend it.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: D. J. Sledge
content: Realize this doesn't have good sound, but I connect it via bluetooth to a better speaker. Works great. Love being able to move from room to room without a cord. Plugs into wall outlet.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: edwin decamillo
content: Price is great, sound quality is not great but I connect to Bluetooth speakers so it is of little consequence to me. But it seems the microphone is a little less responsive than other echo products. I use it with the connected motion sensor which is very cool. I’m Happy with it

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: @LSieu
content: I wish that this device has been released earlier, before I bought all those Echo dots to extend voice control for Alexa to areas where I pass thru more than hang out.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Tony T
content: Easy to  pair. But everytime you want to connect to echo you need to push the button in. It's not a one time thing.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: RYAN
content: I got this item to pair with my Harmon Kardon speaker.  The speaker is a google device but I subscribe to Amazon Music which was not compatible.  My solution was this item paired to the speaker and plugged in nearby.  Now I have an awesome sounding Alexa enabled speaker! Best of both worlds!
title: Harmon Kardon Speaker is now an Alexa speaker

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Mr. Moik
content: My new Echo Flex turns on my lamp in the living room with the help of a smart plug. Love it.
title: Nice addition to my Echo Dot

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: ChefThyme
content: I would put this in the garage or bottom of the stairwell to call upstairs but not in a room used to play music.  I gave it a try.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Amazonian Customer
content: This is a great option if you want Alexa in another location  & don't care about superior sound quality.  It does the job without frills for a great price.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Jessica Somerville
content: These completed my whole home Alexa system. One of them keeps dropping off the system and I don’t know why. The other doesn’t but it’s sound quality sucks. You can usually make it out or we are so use to the reminders now that when it goes off, we look at the clock and we know what it was supposed to say.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Elena Smith
content: I like it very much. I can continue to listen in a kitchen to what I started to listen in my bedroom without missing anything.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Jennifer S
content: Love that this is an extension to our Alexa. We use it to control the lamp and also give us updated information such as weather and time.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Luis V.
content: It is hard for me to get this device to hear me. I have to speak too loud in order for the device to hear my voice. Also, the sound quality is terrible, don't expect to have this for playing songs or anything like that.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: S. WECHSELER
content: Nice little addition to the smart home. Speaker not that great but very convenient and easy to set up.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Harrison Tooley
content: The sound quality is fine enough for the bathroom I placed it in but I think better speakers could have been used to attain better sound quality. But the versatility of the Flex is enough to consider buying again.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Larthebear
content: Kitchen under cabinet use. Nice night light . Convenient location. Good for timer. Like direct plugin.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: David A Fair
content: the companion motion sensor has a fairly limited range, and the routines that are available for motion sensor triggering are not exactly optimal, but the real downside is the terrible speaker.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Jpsjeep
content: We put ours in the bathroom and it works very well. We get the travel reports, news and music while in the shower.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Elsie S.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: mrconstantia
content: Absolutely,  the worse!! I can be standing right next to this device. Complete silence in the room,  and have the echo dot in another room  reply.....microphone is garbage, imo.... very disappointed!!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Dukasmama
content: I really do like these. As some have mentioned the sound is not fantastic but they will do.  Fast shipping

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Terry Follette
content: Item works well, but the speaker is not very loud. They already know this and provide a connection to add an external speaker.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Leland T. Crenshaw
content: The ease of installation and automatic setup far overcome the inability to control volume to acceptable level. Works great in controlling device.
title: Easy installation and voice control is great.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Sizzle
content: I don't know if my expectations were too high for this little device but it's way too quiet. Not good for music, radio, audio books, etc.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Edward Brown
content: Very nice, easy to move around, sound quality is decent, music sound is ok but not as good as an echo

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Corey
content: Works great in my garage where all I need from it is smart home light controls.  The output speaker is the only weak point to this echo.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Justin W. Sperry
content: The Flex is very functional.  I use it in my garage and it works well even from across the garage.  Obviously this is not a device meant for high quality sound reproduction but it is a functional, low-cost way to add Alexa to less environmentally friendly areas.
title: Functional

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Timothy Braddy
content: Awesome product. I use these with the motion sensor to control my lights. Also have them connected in speaker groups to add that little extra. Super easy to setup on the Alexa app to use in routines.
title: Great product

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: HotRod
content: Works great as a cheap additional Alexa device in the home office next to the computer where asking Alexa questions is much more important than music sound quality.
title: Easy solution for adding additional Alexa device

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Ravinder Soni
content: Sound quality is not great. I do not know how to make it a sensor light, no clear instructions about that.
title: Great Idea but needs improvement

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Robert Hoffmann
content: My wife and I love this inexpensive device. We use it as an automatic night light (ordered separately) which is programmable, and we use it for shower music. We expected not great sound, but it’s not our main music. I can check the time, listen to news, check the weather, etc. while getting ready for work. We have all the other Alexa devices throughout the house!
title: Inexpensive but sufficient

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Jonah Bragg
content: This model is much better than the normal dot because it plugs straight into the wall sure it's not as loud but its still better
title: Great little echo

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: S.H.
content: Not so good for music because of sound quality, but great to add Alexa abilities to bathroom and kitchen.
title: Nice to add Alexa where space is an issue.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Andrea K. Pitts
content: Love it! Was going to buy more and then price increase. Disappointed. Waiting for price to go down again,
title: Need mire

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Cori Williams
content: Ehhh I thought the sound would be better definitely need a Bluetooth speaker.  And I have a Dot, but for some reason they won’t both stay connected. It’s one or the other. 😩
title: Ehhh

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Trisss34
content: Works great. Easy to setup and glad we have it. Might get another other since it's so easy to use. Good price too.
title: Great extender for Alexa

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Joseph V.
content: I have seen some reviews where they say that the flex does not have great volume but I’m here to say different. The flexes volume is actually incredible for how small of a device it is. It is a great addition to any smart home.
title: Incredible sound

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Charles E. Williams
content: It's a unique product and I have it in the garage which I use to activate ring,when I leave home.
title: Excellent product

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Jessica McCormick
content: I keep this in master bathroom and it's perfect for getting ready to go to work or out in general.  I can get the outside temp and listen to music while getting ready.  The sound quality isn't as good as the echo, but that is expected seeing how the device itself is so much smaller.  I also intend on using this in our camper come spring/summer.
title: Perfect for small spaces

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: M. Rosenthal
content: Compact and plugs right in, no dangling cord. The sound is mediocre, but good enough for what it is. I also got the First Light, which I really like, but wish it had the ability to cycle through the colors on its own.
title: Nice Little Unit

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Scuba Su
content: Love this in place of another Dot in the room. Hearing on it is very sensitive! Will buy more!
title: Great addition to my smart home

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Catherine / CAT ×:)
content: This is just to good to be true . If you want to hear Alexa everywhere in home buy this now.
title: Alexa’s helper

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: bonnie whitis
content: I have it in my master bedroom.  Sometimes I move it to my mast bathroom.  I play amazon music through it and for my bedroom and bathroom it is loud enough.
title: Love my flex.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Debra Young
content: It was perfect for my room. I have it hooked to bedside lamp so I don't have to turn on the overhead. Sound is not as bassey as the dot but its not used for music but just conveience. I also got the night light adapter which can change colors and a little added bonus!
title: Perfect for an out of reach light in the dark for sure

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Steve Skye
content: We placed this device in our kitchen to help us update our shopping list and it has become essential.
title: Useful Addition

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Nicholas Cavitt
content: If you're looking for Alexa presence in a convenient way, this is your solution. We use these to play music in our kid's rooms at bedtime and being able to plug them right into the wall is fantastic. Unobtrusive and a great option!
title: Convenient

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Mitch Reed
content: This little plug in is awesome! This voice recognition device is small and out of the way, but works wonderfully!! Love the sound quality from this alexa device!
title: Awesome device that I would recommend!!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: nikkee
content: Excellent product. It will sound a little tinny playing music but that is not what it is made for.
title: Excellent product

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Spike M.
content: I have many amazon alexa units and this is a good addition. The addon motion detector is very good
title: Flex does the job

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: J.D.
content: Just plugged this Echo in and in a minute it was ready to program and part of my household system.
title: Easiest Echo to install yet.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Will Jordan
content: I bought 2, one is in a little used outlet in the kitchen; the second is at an outlet between two bookcases near the entry (it shares that outlet with a wifi extender. They are used mostly in passing or for paging.
title: Convenient small package the tucks away yet provides convencience

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: William Scott Bell
content: I like this because it's just like my old echo dot...but many times that I ask it to turn on my smart lights it doesn't know what I said, or it puts something on my shopping list, or something else ridiculous! That seems to be the only problem, because all else is nifty!
title: Echo flex needs better voice recognition...

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: P. McDonald
content: Smaller than expected. Doesn’t sound great but adds voice control to a less frequently used room.
title: Nice product

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: George k 43
content: Easy and inexpensive way to take Alexa with you when you travel, but a dot has much better sound!
title: Tiny speaker, but great for travel

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Djernie2
content: works great, i placed it in my garage and attached a blue tooth speaker and it is great. i now have 1 echo flex and 3 echo dot (3)'s.
title: Works as advertised

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: H.E.R.
content: I brought this as part of the Prime deal. It picks up sound really well but the quality of Alexa’s voice is at best average.  It was a great addition to our home but definitely wouldn’t pay more than $9.99 for it.
title: Great Addition but subpar sound quality.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Sean George
content: I’m not sure why but she won’t play music when I come home like my alexa does in my room. She always says music is playing on my alexa in my room when i tell her to play music on the flex.
title: I dunno

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Victor Bueno
content: I specifically purchased for the kitchen so that I can add items to the shopping list as I think of them.
title: Convenient

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: José Daniel Rosario P.
content: For the price is a great product. it gives the functionality of Alexa everywhere without expending lots of money. Of course it's not ideal for music, but sounds very good for it's size (like an upgraded smartphone speaker).
title: Great Product

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Chris Ahumada
content: I connected this little Buddy to a Subwoofer and gave my echo show a nice boost and the big boom!!
title: Works as it should..

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: amy757
content: I have the Echo Flex in my bathroom and kitchen. It works very well with my other smart devices.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: LiveLife2Laugh2Love
content: I have to admit Alexa has made me lazy. I have three all through the home. Makes my life easier!
title: Life is easier! Works like a charm...

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Tiny
content: Your browser does not support HTML5 video. Loveeee it can’t ask for better it’s not a beat box
title: Great

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: PDFero
content: I love it's unobtrusiveness, which is important in places such as the living room. I also used it to play music via Bluetooth to my minispeaker and it worked flawlessly.
title: A big capability in a small package

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: DK
content: The device was placed in a combined kitchen/living room area (in the kitchen area) to better "hear" commands for the 1st gen echo, which is placed in the living room area. The 1st gen echo recognizes commands better from 20 feet than the flex does from 8 feet. The two flex units will likely end up in the drawer.
title: Voice recognition well below par for other echo devices.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: snowman
content: it was a great gift from my son that I did not know existed and now that I have one I can see how valuable it is.  Easy to set up and easy to use.
title: Small but powerful

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: MIKE
content: So far product works great, easy installation, works flawlessly. Will update if i run into any problems
title: WORKS GREAT

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: S. DelGrippo
content: I was looking for something to not take up space in my kitchen. Not the best in sound but it will do.
title: Great for the price

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Virginia Riosnunez
content: Like the size and convenience. Enjoying it. I'm disappointed that while the echo show is on the other cannot be used.
title: Surprised

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Jodi Larson
content: The sound is grainy.  I have it in my bathroom and it is nice to have for music, weather...etc.
title: Could have better sound

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: J. Davis
content: I use it in the bathroom where I have a wall outlet at counter height. Just plugged it in and because I already had an echo dot, setup was automatic. The on board speaker is pretty basic, but you can plug in external speakers for better sound.
title: Simple and easy.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: ScootySteele
content: Also not very good on volume. Didn’t expect miracles but sounds very tinny. Just not worth buying stick to dot or Echo.
title: Sound is poor. Stick with Dot or Echo.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Tami L Rios
content: Due to all of the bad reviews I wasn’t going to try these... Then I noticed the sale and honestly had to give it a go.... and I’m so very glad I did.l!!!!!! I agree with the comments concerning the mini built in speaker performance. Other then that it does exactly what it says it will do. .
title: Great product

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Snow
content: The sound quality sounds like you’re playing it from your phone but even less quality. It’s handy to have but not for playing music or for the sound feature. Don’t expect it to be like the other echoes.
title: Not for sound quality

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Pops
content: We needed something simple for another room, just plug and play with our system. Works great !
title: Perfect for our Alexa needs

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Danny Martinez
content: Love thid for the night light. Tried to use it for motion sensor when I'm away but couldn't get it to work.
title: Great for night light but not for motion sensor.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Arun
content: Its good, does the purpose and recognizes voice easily but the sound quality is so bad and very low.
title: Sound quality could be better

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: DCSN22519
content: Very convenient. Takes no counter space. Great for kitchen.  Just don’t expect good sound for music.
title: Great gadget. Not for music.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: labmom
content: This is a great little addition to our Amazon Echo.  It's nice to use for little things like sleep sounds or the weather.
title: Helpful

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: J. Brandt
content: This is not an Echo or Show, so sound quality (even voice) is tinny.  Have not tried to play music through it as it was added in master bath area for Alexa control only.
title: Works for what purchased for

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: yvonne
content: Not a good speaker is barely audible it keeps turning off On its own terrible quality not worth puchasing
title: Non speaker

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Wade A
content: I love this speaker it is a great add on.  You can play music from all over the house if you buy several.  The Echo Dot is also needed for base sounds.
title: Great add on speaker

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: chris king
content: Small, works great with little presents.  Sound quality not good for music without additional speaker.
title: Works great.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: None
content: Easy to install. We just use it in the bathroom because the sound quality is so poor. It works just like the Big Sister Alexia, but again the sound quality is horrible.
title: Sounds is terrible, but it works

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Angelika Everett
content: Love the new echo flex I use it in my bedroom.  It is very easy to set up and very easy to use. I love it so much that I ordered a second one
title: Easy set up within seconds and very easy to use

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: C. T.....   GA
content: Good entertainment  and keeps old  & disabled ladies  somewhat in touch with what's going on in the world.
title: Aren't  compatible with my original  Echo Dot/Alexa

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Jose Angel Lupercio Jr.
content: Very hard for Alexa to understand what I ask for. Sound quality is ok, being used for office setting, so not too loud. Using the USB connector to charge, very poor, very slow charging. Freezes up a lot, have to disconnect and reconnect. Have to remove from devices on Alexa App, and re-install. Not happy. Not what I expected. Expected more.
title: Doesn't function as i thought it would

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Selena
content: This does not get as loud and clear as the standard devices but it is def fine in a small space!!
title: Worth it

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: toastboy
content: My husband has hooked everything to Alexa I am getting so lazy but it is truly convenient and makes things easier
title: Getting so lazy

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Pem
content: The volume is just okay for a quiet room. Nothing at all fancy, but it suits my needs. It's in a guest room, so it doesnt bother me.
title: Suits my needs

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Barbara Sink
content: I love the convenience and size of this little speaker but the sound quality is very poor.  It works for what I use it for And the price is right but I would not order it again.
title: Sound quality is very poor.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Mrs. J.
content: Nice and compact for use in cramped spaces.  Timer is perfect for my wife to use in cooking.
title: We use it as a kitchen timer

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Sharky Senior
content: The setup was perfect, the unit was basically plug and play. I purchased it with the motion detector, which worked better than expected. I can’t really write about a con. It would be great if the though in a small camera into this package.
title: Home Run Smart home accessory!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Plainwell Clipper
content: Hard to hear & can't adjust the volume up. To be fair, this was listed in the reviews as a deficit. We do like the convenience of it, tho.
title: Alexa has ears!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Wes
content: The sound quality is about as bad as it gets, The good idea for input to Alexa with shopping but poor idea for any type of sound output.
title: Sound quality lacking

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Brady Schwartz
content: These are such great little Alexa boxes. Much better voice recognition than my Echo dot. Great for kitchen and bedroom.
title: I have 3 now! Better than Echo dot.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Russell J Fascenda Jr
content: I already had an Echo.  This was a great add-in for about $10 on Prime Day, to extend use of the Echo system to another room.
title: Great deal on this item

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Jeremy S
content: I would have liked the speaker to be a little louder..I may use this in my bathroom instead of my office room at this point..
title: What was I thinking

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Dizzy
content: Works fine to listen to the news while you get ready, but even standing next to it sounds tinny. It was really easy to set up though.
title: It is okay. Dot is better

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Elizabethan Yvette
content: I'm sorry to be rude but if you don't get one of these for every room in the house you're DUMB! I didn't say that, I think Alexa told me to!
title: YELL AT ALL YOUR KIDS JUST ONE TIME!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Triecy Jackson
content: It's a speaker yet the sound and volume leaves a lot to be desired for the functions are awesome but the sound quality and the volume are the weak qualities
title: Room for improvement

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Jonnytpb
content: really use it mainly to turn lights on & off.. not enough time of go into other useful benefits.
title: got it on special.. so rick was low.. coordinates with alexa echo upstairs.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: John G Marriott
content: I needed a new nightlight.  This works and does give color options in addition to intensity.  Can use it to do the usual Echo commands.  But, sound output is poor and not suitable for music or streaming  podcasts.  It was cheap and does fill a gap in my Alexa coverage in the house.
title: Not up to other Echo devices

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Brian Hess
content: The size of the Echo Flex allows it to be placed in many locations that would not accommodate other existing Echos.
title: Convenient Size

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: GatorMan
content: Good product.  Adds Alexa with a speaker to any outlet.  Recommend external speaker for music
title: Good product!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: William  K.Howell
content: Used in bathroom with limited space and electric plugs. Works well for the area simple to set up and use
title: Easy to set up

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Stephenie
content: This device is a great add on but the sound volume are very low. I can barely hear it with the volume all the way up.
title: Great add on device!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Tom
content: For a small wall plug and with the motion sensor added it has worked great.  Sound is good enough but I would not expect more from such a small device.
title: Gadget port makes this a great addition

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Daniel Stubblefield
content: I absolutely love having the flex in my bathroom.  It works perfectly.  Just please improve the motion sensor
title: Perfect for the bathroom

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: D. Myers
content: This solved my problem of constantly yelling for my two teenage boys to come eat, do chores, etc. Now I can just send announcements directly to their rooms. Easy to setup and nice extension of Alexa.
title: Great way to cheaply build household intercom

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Paige
content: We use this as an intercom and music player in our daycare.  We have 13 devices.  It does glitch some when everyone is using it but that could also be a wifi issue as well.  Speaker sound is good.  Sometimes it's hard for others to hear you in our noisy environment but this is not a fault of the Echo as it was not meant for such noisy rooms.  It's been a great help to us and improves the safety in our school.
title: Great option

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Anj
content: Awesome I got the dot alarm in my room put this in my son's room with smart bulbs it's like having his own I thought my dot would turn on and talk in my room and his but it's like his own unit he loves it
title: Awesome

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Daredevil
content: The sound quality is terrible if you want to use this as a speaker, but I needed it in my garage to just use to activate smart appliances. So it completely satisfies my need for it.
title: Perfect for what I need it for

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Chuck
content: Since the native sound quality is not very good, I like that I can pair it to multiple speakers and other devices through Bluetooth. It's really great for my small bathroom.
title: Great Alexa Device for Small Spaces

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: A R
content: Love the plug in feature plus the usb slot for charging.  Speaker not great but good enough for where I have it.
title: Great addition to e h

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Vickie Jarvinen
content: Easy to set up. Literally does it on it's own. Just wish it had a little louder volume.
title: Just great to have additional "Alexa's" everywhere

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Robert Batts III
content: I really love this product, I am a first time user I have the Echo Dot. I love them so much, got plugs and light bulbs.
title: VERY IMPRESSIVE

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Eddie D. Hubbard
content: I use it for coming home at night to turn on a few lights. Works perfectly and on schedule.
title: I use it with motion detector

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Shawn M. Navarro
content: Speaker is loud enough to hear notifications but as noted, not to be used for music. Did find that voice recognition is difficult if its in lower outlet as opposed to an outlet closer to your voice.
title: Great little echo, perfect for small places.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Perry
content: Takes one electric socket rather than electric socket and counter space. You can add hardware that I’m sure will continue to improve.
title: This is how they should have started

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Phillip Thompson
content: Sound isn't music quality but isn't for that best for use as an intercom although it could be used to occasionally carry music or conversation to a porch or work shop.  I have one in the downstairs office and one in the kitchen.
title: Quick intercom, or additional speakers

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Ollie5
content: I'm very surprised with the sound quality with the flex. Of course it's not as loud as the other echoes, but it's perfect for our kitchen. I can be in the dining room which is the next room and use the flex.
title: Surprisingly good sound

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: cjninct
content: It's ok but sound quality not so good.  Spend a few more for $ for a dot or higher level echo.
title: It's ok.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Coach
content: My new Echo Flex work just as I hoped. I  am using it in an area where another Alexa device could not fit. Also, I am making it a third part, along with my two Echo Dots, of my music group.
title: Echo Flex plays well with others

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: bob buckey
content: Works fine ,volume is low need to have an additional speakers, otherwise I don't see any problems
title: Small alexa

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Howie
content: Speaker quality is poor compared to Echo. Convenient and easy to use for controlling smart lights, etc.
title: Convenience and lower cost

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Adam Fennell
content: It's a great concept and keeps Alexa in anyroom in a tidy way. Unfortunately, the speaker is just too small to be heard well over normal noise levels in a home, especially if you have children. We have many reminders set throughout the day to help us stay on schedule, but from the flex it's very hard/impossible to hear even over moderate tv or game play.
title: Speaker too quiet for practical use.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: sha-kira caldwell
content: I have a few other echo devices and they all worked amazingly but this one is a complete waste. The sound is horrible. Its soooooo low. Volume ten on  this device is like volume 4 or 5 on this one!
title: Disappointed

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Cathleen Colbert
content: Lovely for all kinds of small spaces like my kitchen. The only drawback is the lack of volume control. It can be hard to hear.
title: Almost Perfect

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Zeb343
content: Tried two… They don’t hear very well… You’re way better off buying a second generation echo dot.
title: Junk.. Almost as if it’s a prototype of one from five years ago that never worked right

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: 001jeff
content: Works well. Sound quality is not great, which I expected. Voice recognition is quite good.
title: I like it.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: J. Sims
content: The night light application at 5% is still a bit bright for midnight trips to the bathroom!
title: Another nice Alexa additions!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Reggie Karikottu
content: Just got this today.  Set up was a breeze.  So far it's working like it was promised.  Will update later if I have any issues.  Hopefully this device won't disappoint like the Echo Show 5 I bought several months ago.
title: So far so good....

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: J.M
content: It works just as well as my echo dot! Bought one for my sister also and she just loves it.
title: Works as well as Echo Dot etc.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Miss Connie Ohio
content: The product did what it's supposed to do, but sound is not good.  I replaced it with an echo for better sound.
title: Sound is not good

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Kurt Rotcavich
content: It does not pick up my voice and the sound quality is sub par from the other echo products that i have used.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: A.T.
content: I like that I can put this in my bathroom. Do not expect quality sound. It helps connect you . Get a Bluetooth speaker if you want good sound.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Peggy
content: Love my mini speakers. Only thing, would have liked if speakers had a better sound quality.
title: Excellent Product and Look for the price.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: bob franklin
content: I intended to use the Flex as an extension for my Echo Dot but half of the time I have to three-peat whatever I'm saying. Sound quality is terrible. My advice would be to spend a few more bucks and get the Dot.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Thom Workinger
content: This was a nice addition. Easy to install. Works for everything except music. Very tinny.
title: Nice Addition to my home

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: sam termine
content: I love it! I have a Jaquzzi in my bathroom and it can be steamy . Nothing disturbs it!
title: Most responsive! Very Inexpensive

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa

It would also be great for a bathroom, large hallway, or even an entryway.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: mitchs4

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Isa and Ruben

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Amaze Balls

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Scarlet Lark

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa

The speaker is the only drawback of this unit, however I do not intend to play music on this device

For the price, it’s a great device!

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa

I love it, and recommend it.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa

I would definitely buy another for another part of my apartment like my kitchen that doesn’t need a big echo

author: Blubaugh5

Definitely spend the extra money on the Dot so you are not as disappointed as I am with the flex. I will probably just give it away.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: A Buyer
content: Very Low Volume Mic is not sensitive - have to shout very close to it for device to accept command All my other Alexa devices have good listening response - except these Echo Flex that I installed in various places in the house. I will not buy any more of these Echo Flex

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa

If you want good audio quality - look to some of the other Echo models.  Smallish size, fits under the socket well (USA).  We use it in the bath to get weather, issue commands, etc.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Really, True and Sometimes Right

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Xiaowen
content: Low sensitivity mode, that is the key to the bathroom. Motion sensor can detect the infrared from different heating source like vent or shower, which can lead to the mis-trigger. The clever design of this little gadget allowed me to unplug and plug the USB 4 times to set the sensor to low sensitivity mode. (You can see the LED blink slowly when boot up) This is perfect to overcome the issues with bathroom environment. Love this!!!
title: definitely worth it

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Tony Foglio
content: Plug it in and connect. It works far better than I could have imagined.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Ron Doyle
content: Speaker  quality  is  fair but it conflicts with  our echo dot and show

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Teri K

title: Bad sound quality.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa

The constant loss of connection makes it pretty useless.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa

I love having an alexa assistant tho

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa

content: This echo Flex is awesome. If you are looking for a cheap but yet reliable echo, this is the winner. Definitely going to get a couple more.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: LittleKindleLover

author: TS7BROS

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: W. Herr
content: I bought this to replace a Dot in my bathroom and slim down the physical size. That part is fine. The sound quality is so atrocious it lasted only one day. It might be fine to use as part of an smart home system, but NOT as a smart speaker.

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
author: Jay Kay

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa

product: Echo Flex - Plug-in mini smart speaker with Alexa
